Content: Loved my surf lesson - so much better and cheaper compared to the US! The beach is clean and very beautiful, cool but not freezing water, and the cafes along the beach are great.
review: love surf lesson much well cheap compare u clean beautiful cool freeze water cafe along great

Content: This beach is used for many different things, religious ceremonies, family group outings (on Sunday as it's their day off), and of course for tourists parading their new swimwear!   Every few metres is a bar, some have food others have loungers, and a lot of them have public toilets.  Some charge a few coins others are free.    On our last day we noticed groups of workers on the beach collecting litter and debris from the previous days' high tides.  Nice to see.
review: use many different thing religious ceremony family group outing sunday day course tourist parade new swimwear every metre bar food others lounger lot public toilet charge coin others free last day notice group worker collect litter debris previous day high tide nice see

Content: Once upon a time this beach was fabulous and a place to watch the sunset orange over the ocean. And I'm sure it will be again once the Balinese gov discover the benefits of sewage treatment...
review: upon time fabulous place watch sunset orange ocean im sure will balinese gov discover benefit sewage treatment

Content: We went to Seminyak Beach twice. Both times at Sunset. Beautiful view! The beach is clean and family friendly. The fresh corn available at the entrance...not to be missed.
review: go seminyak twice times sunset beautiful view clean family friendly fresh corn available entrancenot miss

Content: The beach in Seminyak is okay. It's not the best but it's not bad. The waves are very strong so you have to be careful when staying there. The sunbeds sometimes get waves underneath them as the tide comes in very fast and far. However the location is very good as there are lots of restaurants and market stalls near.
review: seminyak okay best bad wave strong careful stay sunbeds sometimes wave underneath tide come fast far location good lot restaurant market stall near

Content: Corse sand and rough waves don't be fooled by hustlers selling seats a towel is still a great ideal. People selling aray of small gifts for your friends back home. Restaurants near by and drinking allowed whoah
review: corse sand rough wave dont fooled hustler sell seat towel still great ideal people sell aray small gift friends back home restaurant near drinking allow whoah

Content: Beaches of bali are best in the world. There is zimbaran beach where you can go for the evening fun, there will be live shows and open restaurants where you can enjoy.
review: beach bali best world zimbaran go even fun will live show open restaurant enjoy

Content: The beach have everything! Nice place chilling with frds, with beers, sunset and food!! Some restaurant got live band :)
review: everything nice place chill frds beer sunset food restaurant get live band

Content: Lovely, kids loved the day. Tide is really strong, so hold onto the children. Downside, beach chairs can be very expensive, so best to bargain and or take lots of towels. Could not find anywhere to wash feet once off the beach. Also, quite hard to get hold of a licensed taxi (bluebird). Recommend, but be prepared if with children
review: lovely kid love day tide really strong hold onto child downside chair expensive best bargain take lot towel find anywhere wash foot quite hard hold license taxi bluebird recommend prepare child

Content: The beaches are small and crowded but clean. good place to drink and eat alongside. Sometimes too many vendors spoil the fun but overall good experience
review: beach small crowd clean good place drink eat alongside sometimes many vendor spoil fun overall good experience

Content: If you like your swim in the sea a little bit on the rough side this is a great. Kid took surfing lessons, the waves and current were a bit rough; we were immediately warned and pulled back whenever we ventured a bit too deep. The beach is clean and so is the water, don't know why some visitors have expressed otherwise. I loved it.
review: swim sea little bit rough side great kid take surf lesson wave current bit rough immediately warn pull back whenever ventured bit deep clean water dont know visitor express love

Content: We parked ourselves at Mumma Rondas chairs over a few days during our stay. She is one of the loveliest most helpful and grateful ladies I've come across. Chairs with umbrella cost 10NZ for 2. She has fresh fruit salad, 3.50, Bintang and other assorted drinks including fresh coconuts. You do get the Hawkers trying to sell to you moreso if you sit in the loungers than on the beach. As the sun is so hot I would recommend grabbing a sun lounger and fending the hawkers off. Waves were too big for body surfing for us but we still had fun. There's a public toilet across the road, very stinky but find me one that isn't in Asia!!
review: park mumma rondas chair day stay one lovely helpful grateful lady ive come across chair umbrella cost 10nz 2 fresh fruit salad 350 bintang assort drink include fresh coconut hawker try sell moreso sit lounger sun hot recommend grab sun lounger fend hawker wave big body surf u still fun there public toilet across road stinky find one isnt asia

Content: We visited this beach several times on our trip, both during the day and the evening. The water is clean and the sand is soft. The beach was busy but we always found a sun lounger to rent or a space in a bar. This beach is a must in the evening before 6pm to watch the sunset whilst sat on a colourful beanbag with cocktails in hand. A real experience with music and the hustle and bustle. There are many beach vendors selling various bits and bobs, we just learned to wave them off and not be bothered by it. The water is too choppy to swim but great for paddling or body boards etc. We read reviews before our trip to say the beach was dirty but we found this to not be the case. We ate there several times and found the food to be great, but a little pricey in comparison to off the beach.
review: visit several time trip day even water clean sand soft busy always find sun lounger rent space bar must even 6pm watch sunset whilst sit colourful beanbag cocktail hand real experience music hustle bustle many vendor sell various bit bob learn wave bother water choppy swim great paddle body board etc read review trip say dirty find case eat several time find food great little pricey comparison

Content: Not really a picturesque venue....But the massive waves are good, brilliant for surfing especially it being so close to Canggu. However if your here for the ambience lol yeah just get a bed & drink coconuts lol..... You'll need it. Also a bit crowded so but well, at least you get the beach
review: really picturesque venuebut massive wave good brilliant surf especially close canggu ambience lol yeah bed drink coconut lol youll need bit crowd well least

Content: The beach was good to watch the surf as there was lots of massive waves ideal for surfing but there is no swimming along much of the beach and lots lifeguards.Many many bars along the beach that get very crowded at night.Beach is not ideal for young kids as sand dirty and the waves are far too big for the kids to be able to swim.
review: good watch surf lot massive wave ideal surf swim along much lot lifeguardsmany many bar along crowded nightbeach ideal young kid sand dirty wave far big kid able swim

Content: The beach is clean and nice . But the tide timings should be kept in mind . The tide timings differ everyday . Its available on the resorts on the beachside like potato house and W.

Content: There's not much going on here. Sand is dark, not the prettiest beach. Head to a beach club or a lovely pool instead!

Content: Very enjoyable beach paradise with many beachside restaurants and bars good food and drinking options.Lots of shops nearbyGreat poolbars restarantsMassage spas etc
review: enjoyable paradise many beachside restaurant bar good food drink optionslots shop nearbygreat poolbars restarantsmassage spas etc

Content: Nice large Beach area, but not very clean. The sunrise/sunset views were the best. We had a short walk from our hotel to the beach. It wasn't immediately obvious how to access the beach, but we did find an entrance pass the police station. There was a lot of activity in this location, there's a place to rent scooters and enjoy street food. There was a lot of people in the area selling local fair. The grilled corn stand with the brown sweet butter, drew a crowd.
review: nice large area clean sunrisesunset view best short walk hotel wasnt immediately obvious access find entrance pas police station lot activity location theres place rent scooter enjoy street food lot people area sell local fair grill corn stand brown sweet butter draw crowd

Content: Huge endless beach with many activities going on... from surfing  to horse riding and live music... amazing sunsets good vibe fun and relaxing at the same time😊
review: huge endless many activity go surf horse rid live music amazing sunset good vibe fun relaxing time

Content: The beach is clean and nice but the facilities not too good. Kuta beach or Nusa dua is better and more fun
review: clean nice facility good kuta nusa dua good fun

Content: Great views and waves, one of the best surfing spots in the world! Its always vibrant with lots of restaurants by the beach, plenty of activities going on, enjoy a game of football or jump on to a karaoke machine and sing away. For those who seek quiet just stroll down the beach away from all this and sit on the sand and enjoy the sunset!
review: great view wave one best surf spots world always vibrant lot restaurant plenty activity go enjoy game football jump karaoke machine sing away seek quiet stroll away sit sand enjoy sunset

Content: Our nyuh luxury villa seminyak offered free shuttle to this beach and definitely the cleanest and most happening beach in bali...went to a shack with bean bags...amazing sunset view
review: nyuh luxury villa seminyak offer free shuttle definitely clean happen baliwent shack bean bagsamazing sunset view

Content: This beach disappoints. Small coffee bar. Waves to surf, but I did not see anybody doing it. Not too many people around. Prefer Kuta beach.

Content: A good beach minus all the crowds and food stalls of kuta. Good for sunset views too. Potato head beach club is very popular here
review: good minus crowd food stall kuta good sunset view potato head club popular

Content: Seminyak Beach, jalan Raya Seminyak, 24 hours. Seminyak Beach is a beautiful white sandy beach situated in north of Legian Beach. The white sand stretch 3 km from Tuban Area has made it as a fascination for tourist to visit this place. Seminyak Beach is favored by the great wave that is ideally for surfing adventures hence many surfers visit this beach to conquer the waves and enjoy the surf adventures. This beach is also featured by beautiful panorama to the Indian Ocean, the wide white sand, complete public facilities, the word class hotels, international restaurant and more.
review: seminyak jalan raya seminyak 24 hour seminyak beautiful white sandy situate north legian white sand stretch 3 km tuban area make fascination tourist visit place seminyak favor great wave ideally surf adventure many surfer visit conquer wave enjoy surf adventure feature beautiful panorama indian ocean wide white sand complete public facility word class hotel international restaurant

Content: Seminyak beach is a nice large beach to walk along with lots of bars / restaurants to enjoy. It is not an overly clean beach - we come across a lot of dog poo! And the sand isn't golden white. We wouldn't attempt to swim either as the sea is very tidal and wavy. However, it has beautiful sunset views, is lovely to walk along and is very wide. It's definitely worth a visit but it isn't your relaxing beautiful Caribbean beach.
review: seminyak nice large walk along lot bar restaurant enjoy overly clean come across lot dog poo sand isnt golden white wouldnt attempt swim either sea tidal wavy beautiful sunset view lovely walk along wide definitely worth visit isnt relax beautiful caribbean

Content: Walked along the beach every day we were there.  The waves crashing in are just amazing, no wonder there are so many surfers there. Sunset was breathtaking.  A lot of people selling things on the beach from jewellery, hats, sunglasses, kites, canvases etc.  if you sit on the bean bags on the beach or at many of the bars on the beach you can be pestered constantly.  At night the beach is lit up with colour from the umbrella lights and the neon hanging lights.  Bands play at the bars and it's certainly worth a visit or two.
review: walk along every day wave crash amaze wonder many surfer sunset breathtaking lot people sell thing jewellery hat sunglasses kit canvas etc sit bean bag many bar pester constantly night light colour umbrella light neon hang light band play bar certainly worth visit two

Content: Seyminak Beach is beautiful when you first see it. The waves are crazy and it is a long and impressive. However, I was a bit disappointed as it was pretty dirty in places and sewage smell was also quite strong in certain sections. Also I was there in July and there were massive crowds. I would save my time for the beach in a better place on the island than here.
review: seyminak beautiful first see wave crazy long impressive bit disappointed pretty dirty place sewage smell quite strong certain section july massive crowd save time well place island

Content: Our daughters were up for trying surfing and according to locals here, it should be Seminyak, so we hired a driver and went to the west coast.Water was more waves than east coast (Sanur) where we stayed.We found a place with some goid lical instructors and the girls had fun surfing for a couple of hours.Price was 150K for approx. 2 hours, so ok.Also great clean sandy beach and at least this day no plastic and rubbish lykng around.So overall a great day at Seminyak beach.

Content: Just like your regular beach, nothing to write home about...not so crowded though at about 5 in the evening...good for a nice stroll...

Content: We visited Seminyak beach in 2007 and the place was a haven of tranquility with the locals swimming and fishing in the ocean. Fast forward to 2017 and the beach feels like the gold coast of Australia, so busy and not the place it was. That said, I guess it's progress and it's a lovely long beach, but there's nicer beaches in Bali.
review: visit seminyak 2007 place haven tranquility local swim fish ocean fast forward 2017 feel gold coast australia busy place say guess progress lovely long there nicer beach bali

Content: Excellent locationClean, beautifully appointed, spacious room with superb views over the sea. The friendly and very helpful staff made us welcome at all times. The breakfast buffet was extensive and if you could order from a menu in addition to the buffet.Would happily stay again.
review: excellent locationclean beautifully appoint spacious room superb view sea friendly helpful staff make u welcome time breakfast buffet extensive order menu addition buffetwould happily stay

Content: we had sunset dinner at the beach with an amazing view definitely recommend. The food might be a bit expensive but it is well worth it .

Content: The beach itself is not the best out there, we found it to be quite clean but I think that is dependant on the tides. The best thing for us about this beach is that you can walk up and down long stretches, particularly as the sun sets. It is nice seeing people go about their daily lives, kids playing football, making kites, locals running and walking their dogs. It has a relaxed vibe. We didn't visit any bars or clubs, but if you're into that then I'm sure you'll find plenty to amuse you here.
review: best find quite clean think dependant tide best thing u walk long stretch particularly sun set nice see people go daily life kid play football making kite local run walk dog relax vibe didnt visit bar club youre im sure youll find plenty amuse

Content: Amazing sunset in this beach , and very cool for swimming and surfing There are a lot of bars and horses riding
review: amazing sunset cool swim surf lot bar horse rid

Content: This beach is a nice one overall.  The waves are beautiful as they roll in.  It could be better though if pet owners were more responsible about cleaning up after their dogs.

Content: The beach has big waves - good for those who want to try surfing. Sand is not so white but the view is okay. There are umbrellas and benches that you can rent if the sun gets too hot. There are lots of tourists when we visited since it's summer, so it's kinda crowded. You can also run along the coast if your hotel is just nearby.

Content: If you go there expecting white sand beaches, you will be disappointed.  The sand is brown.  The water is somewhat green, not like the exotic beaches in Mexico or Hawaii.  We just walked a bit and left.

Empty coconuts and garbage, a better effort should be exorcise to keep this place cleaner.  Too much money is request for a chair and the people in charge can be rude, they want their money!

Content: Enjoy sunset cocktails and snacks here on bean bags or table and chairs  on the sand. Prepare to be harassed by sellers of kites, jewellery and kids toys

Content: Beautiful place. Good experience. Great food. Enjoyed  a lot. A must visit when you r in Bali. Beach like never  seen before. Awsome water sports activities. Fun for adventure  lovers.

Content: The waves are too harsh for swimmers and yet too small for seasoned surfers.  The waves are filled with black sand so it tends to stain your clothes and follow you to the hotel. Nightlife is great with a good choice of live bands
review: wave harsh swimmer yet small season surfer wave fill black sand tend stain clothes follow hotel nightlife great good choice live band

Content: This is the first time we have been to Bali and chose the hotel on the basis that it was next to a great beach with good surf. What we hadn't experienced before, however, was a level of concern that swimmers would get into difficulty in the waves and rip that meant that swimming in anything other than ankle deep water immediately attracted a loud whistle blow from the lifeguards. Thankfully we had a pool at the hotel and the kids could go in the sea for surfing lessons but we could not enjoy beautiful waves as much as we wanted. All that said, the sunsets on this beach are amazing and the balance of nightlife, restaurants and shops is just right. Maybe if we had known a bit more about the nature of the rip on the coast we would have gone somewhere else which came better recommended for swimming but then we would have to sacrifice the vibe.
review: first time bali chose hotel basis next great good surf hadnt experience level concern swimmer difficulty wave rip meant swim anything ankle deep water immediately attract loud whistle blow lifeguard thankfully pool hotel kid go sea surf lesson enjoy beautiful wave much want say sunset amaze balance nightlife restaurant shop right maybe know bit nature rip coast go somewhere come well recommend swimming sacrifice vibe

Content: Love sunsets at Seminyak.Hundreds of people of all ages quietly enjoying the views over the water on this extensive beach - no hassles from traders, just peaceful enjoyment of this beautiful place. Simple pleasures. And free!

Content: Upon arrival, you pay about .50 to enter. It is worth it. A black temple was fascinating to see. There are loungers and umbrella,too. Go early because the parking lot can become full quickly, if you are driving.

Content: Visit seminyak, feel free and cool. beautifull beach and the best view in Seminyak Bali Denpasar. please try

Content: Don't get me wrong, seminyak beach is stunning with its black sands, amazing sunset and massive waves. But unless you take plenty of food/drink there with you, you're gonna get stung. Unlike kuta beach, it's hard to come by a cheap little place to get a drink or food. There are sunbed spots (which are a bit of a rip off for the bed) where you can get a drink for a fair price, but the beach is mainly dominated by resorts that look like you have to have a lot of cash to stay/eat/drink there. Not only that but I've never known a beach be so hard to access. The shore line is dominated by massive resorts and beach clubs that you just can't get past from the road to the beach. We stumbled across a car park we could cut through to the beach luckily and another time we found a little alley to walk down, but failing that you'd just have to blag your way through a hotel lobby. Ridiculous. Kuta beach gets a bad rep but we had a better day there, it was easily accessible, there was cheaper drink and food everywhere and the sands sea and sunsets were just as nice.
review: dont wrong seminyak stun black sand amazing sunset massive wave unless take plenty fooddrink youre gonna stung unlike kuta hard come cheap little place drink food sunbed spot bite rip bed drink fair price mainly dominate resort look lot cash stayeatdrink ive never know hard access shore line dominate massive resort club cant past road stumble across car park cut luckily another time find little alley walk fail youd blag way hotel lobby ridiculous kuta get bad rep well day easily accessible cheap drink food everywhere sand sea sunset nice

Content: The sunsets at Seminyak never disappoints. There's just something about this beach which also explains why all the beach bars along this stretch is always popular and crowded. The only thing that's disappointing is that in late Dec, there's an atrocious amount of rubbish and trash that is washed up onto the beach. We had to clear a tiny spot of plastic bags, wrappers, papers, so that my child can play on the sand. It's gross. This is due to the change in the current and the resorts along the beach tries their best to sweep it every day but you really can't win the ocean.But any other month that I've been there, it's just gorgeous. I'll return again and again.
review: sunset seminyak never disappoints theres something explains bar along stretch always popular crowd thing thats disappoint late dec there atrocious amount rubbish trash wash onto clear tiny spot plastic bag wrapper paper child play sand gross due change current resort along try best sweep every day really cant win oceanbut month ive gorgeous ill return

Content: It was a lovely place to go to and relax. Although the guys trying to sell the tourists watched were MOST annoying.

Content: The Seminyak area is definitely my preference over Kuta. The restaurants and shops are better, and there are many cool place to hang out with on the beach. I recommend finding a spot with bean bags and hookah. I could be there forever!

Content: Seminyak beach 🌊 is stunning. It's not white sands but dark volcanic sands. But the good news is no pebbles so easy to walk on without foot wear and very child friendly . The beach is very clean. Negatives not always swimmable the waves are quite high and strong. It's great for surfing and there are many restaurants including Potato Head & Ku Da Te ...

Content: Seminyak is much quieter than those further down the coast such as Legian and especially Kuta. There are a number of big hotels bordering the beach but also some nice bars and restaurants. Same facilities available as the busier beaches - chairs, umbrellas, surfing, etc. There also seemed to be less beach sellers up here too.Great to wander and sit and watch the world go by in a bar before wandering back again.
review: seminyak much quieter coast legian especially kuta number big hotel border nice bar restaurant facility available busy beach chair umbrellas surf etc seem less seller toogreat wander sit watch world go bar wandering back

Content: Seminyak beach like that whole stretch from Kuta Legian to Seminyak is great. Get a lounge for around $5Aus for 2hrs ( negotiate ) and soak up the sun sea and all the carrying on around you. You can get a cold drink from the guy on the beach you just have to put up with the beach hawkers but if you dont want to buy or have a massage, nails done just so No. Like all the beaches its not the whitest sand but its great. Relax and enjoy.
review: seminyak whole stretch kuta legian seminyak great lounge around 5aus 2hrs negotiate soak sun sea carry around cold drink guy put hawker dont want buy massage nail do beach white sand great relax enjoy

Content: Bali is a lovely country with friendly people. Seminyak is a lively, trendy place that caters well for all ages and tastes. However, beware on the beach especially that can be full of dog excrement that dog walkers leave and do not pick up. We watched many just leave it, or even cover it with sand. Then, some unsuspecting walker stands in it with bare feet. Not good. As a seasoned, worldwide traveller this is the worst place I have seen with regards animal faeces. The pavements in the town can also be full of the same. It's a shame as it it's the only downside of a great place.
review: bali lovely country friendly people seminyak lively trendy place caters well age taste beware especially full dog excrement dog walker leave pick watch many leave even cover sand unsuspecting walker stand bare foot good season worldwide traveller bad place see regard animal faeces pavement town full shame downside great place

Content: Not a beach I would recommend.  There is a terrible smell of phosphate and sewerage, and we decided not to swim in  it for 2 reasons, one the dirty water and two the waves were huge and lots of current.   The waves were envigorating to watch rolling in to the shore. I guess that is a positive. A host of restaurants are scattered  along the beach. Beach loungers available to hire.Most resorts had do not swim signs up, due to currents  and had security staff looking out for those who ignored the signs.  Make sure you choose accommodation that offers a pool.

Content: Seminyak beach is very Overated. There are much better beaches in Bali. Coming from the Sunshine Coat in Australia, we don't frequent Bali for the beach. Mainly suited for those who "have to be seen" in Seminyak. Lots of eateries and shopping in the area.
review: seminyak overated much well beach bali come sunshine coat australia dont frequent bali mainly suit see seminyak lot eatery shop area

Content: Very surprised at how clean this beach was. Excellent surf beach with plenty of places to hire boards etc. Peaceful and not harassed. Kids had a great time.
review: surprised clean excellent surf plenty place hire board etc peaceful harass kid great time

Content: Visited many times 66 beach rooftop,Cocoon,two or three restaurants on the beach,all good venues,sunset there a must.
review: visit many time 66 rooftopcocoontwo three restaurant beachall good venuessunset must

Content: A good semi-surf type of beach with not a lot of vendors on it. The hotel restaurants are close by with easy access.
review: good semisurf type lot vendor hotel restaurant close easy access

Content: This was the first beach I went to in Bali and I expected a lot more from it. We did go in December, but I found that it was very dirty and didn't really like being there. We walked up and down, then went and found something else to do
review: first go bali expect lot go december find dirty didnt really walk go found something

Content: A very long stretch of beach with blackish sand and turbulent waters with strong waves. Lovely to watch the waves come into the beach and fun to be in the water and have the waves crash over you but do look out for the strong currents.The sunset is quite spectacular so well worth catching this.We couldn't find any good public baths or toilets which is an area the tourist promotion board should look into. However there are restaurants and cafes along the beach that you could use but no shower facilities or changing rooms that we could find.
review: long stretch blackish sand turbulent water strong wave lovely watch wave come fun water wave crash look strong currentsthe sunset quite spectacular well worth catch thiswe couldnt find good public bath toilet area tourist promotion board look restaurant cafes along use shower facility change room find

Content: Unfortunately the day that I first visited was after a big down pour, the rubbish was phenomenal and sad.
review: unfortunately day first visit big pour rubbish phenomenal sad

Content: We visited in the first day we arrived to Bali and it is dark sand beach with good waves for surfers. But in Bali you have much nicer white sand beaches (Nusa Dua, ...)
review: visit first day arrive bali dark sand good wave surfer bali much nicer white sand beach nusa dua

Content: This beach are much better than kuta beach..more calm, clean and not congested.However, to get there you need to walk a bit or take taxi/ motocycle...i entered the beach area via kudeta enterance..Worth for evening walk
review: much good kuta beachmore calm clean congestedhowever need walk bite take taxi motocyclei enter area via kudeta enteranceworth even walk

Content: The beach has lovely sand, however it is not good for swimming. It's more of a surfing beach, the waves are very large sometimes. I preferred Legian beach although Seminyak beach seemed to be clearer to see the sunset. (Might have been weather related)
review: lovely sand good swimming surf wave large sometimes preferred legian although seminyak seem clear see sunset might weather related

Content: If you like surfing, go there. Big waves!If you like snorkeling, don't. You'll only see sand. Beach is all but sand, comfortable when you go into sea.
review: surf go big wavesif snorkel dont youll see sand sand comfortable go sea

Content: Whether you want to walk along the beach, go surfing, sit and have a drink or eat a meal, you will find what you want on Seminyak beach. The foreshore is lined with little eateries and bars overlooking the ocean. During the day there are sun lounges and umbrellas. At night there are beanbags and coloured lights out on the sand where you can dine or enjoy a quiet drink. Some places have live music that can be heard from the surrounding venues. You will also be visited by a range of locals trying to sell you anything from sarongs to toys or watches. Just say no thanks if you're not interested.
review: whether want walk along go surf sit drink eat meal will find want seminyak foreshore line little eatery bar overlook ocean day sun lounge umbrella night beanbag colour light sand dine enjoy quiet drink place live music heard surround venue will visit range local try sell anything sarong toy watch say thanks youre interested

Content: I have been to Bali many times but never to Seminyak. We walked down to the beach down a very busy road and near the entrance to the beach it was extremely busy and you have to watch for scooters and vehicles, it seems the private drivers park along the street and therefore makes it hard to walk along pavements. The beach was very long and there are lots of bars with bean bags and tables to sit and watch the breathtaking show of the sunset. It was a good place to watch the people walking by and others trying to get the best photo. I found the sand to be a grey colour which made your feet look dirty and very difficult to brush off. There are a lot of local people selling their goods which can get annoying. I was not overwhelmed by this beach and on our way back to the road via the path which runs behind the bars a enormous rat ran across our path. I think in future I'll watch the sunset from some place else.
review: bali many time never seminyak walked busy road near entrance extremely busy watch scooter vehicle seem private driver park along street make hard walk along pavement long lots bar bean bag table sit watch breathtaking show sunset good place watch people walk others try best photo find sand grey colour make foot look dirty difficult brush lot local people sell good annoy overwhelmed way back road via path run behind bar enormous rat run across path think future ill watch sunset place

Content: If you are a surfer, you have to go to Bali and visit the beaches - one of them being Seminyak. The waves are good for beginners as well as people who surf regularly.
review: surfer go bali visit beach one seminyak wave good beginner well people surf regularly

Content: Great spot to surf in the mornings and a very relaxed atmosphere. Always barter for surfboards and sun loungers. By the time we got the hang of it, we consistently paid IR100k for a lounger and surfboard for the ENTIRE day. In the beginning we paid that for an hour, etc. So just keep walking if they don't agree - you'll get your price. But do it respectfully.
review: great spot surf morning relax atmosphere always barter surfboard sun lounger time get hang consistently pay ir100k lounger surfboard entire day begin pay hour etc keep walk dont agree youll price respectfully

Content: One of my favourite spots to watch the sunset in Bali. It's always busy but I still love it! Love the vibe there!
review: one favourite spot watch sunset bali always busy still love love vibe

Content: Seminyak Beach is a great place to have a drink and watch the sunset. Also good place to go with family and friends.
review: seminyak great place drink watch sunset good place go family friend

Content: This beach is very good for a quick dip but predominately for surfers. That in itself is good because there is always something to see while your there. There are an abundance of bars on the beach and they all seem good. Street food is available if your game or you can bring your own. The downside is that there a lot of beach vendors who will approach you. Buts thats everywhere in bali. Overall we had a great time there on many occasions.
review: good quick dip predominately surfer good always something see abundance bar seem good street food available game bring downside lot vendor will approach buts thats everywhere bali overall great time many occasion

Content: This beach was clean with beautiful sunset views. Me and my daughter spent almost 3 hours at beach, U can relax near the shore there are paid benches available.  Book your chair and watch the sunset. Great place to catch some waves when the surfs up. There are local vendors for coconut water, beer, corn etc. my daughter went for local braids done by local Indonesian personal. It was overall enjoyable place.
review: clean beautiful sunset view daughter spend almost 3 hour u relax near shore pay bench available book chair watch sunset great place catch wave surf local vendor coconut water beer corn etc daughter go local braid do local indonesian personal overall enjoyable place

Content: Seminyak beach is a public beach & has everything to offer for every age. It has many open air restaurants on beach to drink & dine with LIVE music & enjoy the ambience. Across the road you have plenty more open air restaurants. Water is cleaner than Kuta beach. Best part is you can walk from seminyak beach to kuta beach, it is that long....However, this beach is for surfing only, not recommended for swimming. I personally liked this beach more than Kuta beach.
review: seminyak public everything offer every age many open air restaurant drink dine live music enjoy ambience across road plenty open air restaurant water cleaner kuta best part walk seminyak kuta longhowever surf recommend swim personally like kuta

Content: If you want to see the sunset then this is a great place for you,  but i reckon the beach is so busy and a bit dirty its kinda hard to walk slowly and enjoying the view.
review: want see sunset great place reckon busy bit dirty kinda hard walk slowly enjoy view

Content: We were in Seminyak on our honeymoon and we really loved the beach. The water is nice sandy and clean and we were like kids enjoying the crazy, strong waves with other people, it was lots of fun. On the other side you won't get much privacy to enjoy the sunset from the sellers.. They are constantly there and standing front of you cover the view.. not so romantic..
review: seminyak honeymoon really loved water nice sandy clean kid enjoy crazy strong wave people lot fun side wont much privacy enjoy sunset seller constantly stand front cover view romantic

Content: Quite gritty sand more for surfers I think. Went at sundown but it was quite cloudy. Our children (20 & 25 ) went three times & loved it.
review: quite gritty sand surfer think go sundown quite cloudy child 20 25 go three time love

Content: The beach is long and wide but was pretty dirty at the seminyak part - it seemed cleaner the further towards kuta you went which was surprising. There were loads of bathroom waste items like toothpaste tubes and nappies and even a hypodermic needle on one part. Lots of hawkers too - the closer to kuta the more persistent they were. We headed off to jimbaran, padang padang and other quieter more pleasant spots for a day on the beach.
review: long wide pretty dirty seminyak part seem clean towards kuta go surprising load bathroom waste item toothpaste tubes nappy even hypodermic needle one part lot hawker closer kuta persistent head jimbaran padang padang quieter pleasant spot day

Content: Wow what a beautiful beach i recomend it to couples from Australia to experience the Seminyak Beach.Especially on the sunset,just the crowd of locals and tourists is mind boggling and sitting there having a mocktail or bintang is the true Bali experience.All the beach markets and locals trying there best to make ends meet in selling there cultural gifts,be there at least an hour before sunset to get your lounge chair and mocktail.
review: wow beautiful recomend couple australia experience seminyak beachespecially sunsetjust crowd local tourist mind boggle sit mocktail bintang true bali experienceall market locals try best make ends meet sell cultural giftsbe least hour sunset lounge chair mocktail

Content: This was my third & last visit as this sad beach has not got cleaner. Only go if you want the experience of swimming with plastic & faeces. Miles & miles of bottles & trash. The locals ignore the waste blaming it on tides bringing pollution from Java or the rain washing trash down from the mountains. Whatever the cause, they do nothing about it.BTW the stray dogs that live on the beach are treated cruelly. Another reason not to go.
review: third last visit sad get cleaner go want experience swim plastic faeces mile mile bottle trash local ignore waste blame tide bring pollution java rain wash trash mountain whatever cause nothing itbtw stray dog live treat cruelly another reason go

Content: Upside: lovely beach with loads of loungers & umbrellas for rent. Many delightful restaurants with wide variety of cuisine at reasonable prices. Downside: The beach can do with some business community participation to clean up plastic and other rubbish. The hawkers (although respected for their role) are mostly over-pushy and bordering annoying. Three times saying "no thank you" with a smile, should be enough. It is unpleasant elevating your blood pressure over something as stupid as this while supposed to relax.
review: upside lovely load lounger umbrellas rent many delightful restaurant wide variety cuisine reasonable price downside business community participation clean plastic rubbish hawker although respected role mostly overpushy border annoy three time say thank smile enough unpleasant elevate blood pressure something stupid suppose relax

Content: If your looking for a place to spent quality time the this is the place for you. Make sure you enter the beach from Potato Head beach club. You can spent hours sitting here with you partner looking at the sunset. Don't forget to bring umbrella if you don't like the rain.
review: look place spend quality time place make sure enter potato head club spent hour sit partner look sunset dont forget bring umbrella dont rain

Content: Seminyak is a black sand beach with huge waves, making it great for surfing or bodyboarding. Gets lovely sunsets with being on the west coast. There are some cool beach bars scattered along the beach, giving it a similar vibe to a Thai island. Busy and touristy, but much cleaner than other beaches in Bali!
review: seminyak black sand huge wave make great surf bodyboarding get lovely sunsets west coast cool bar scatter along give similar vibe thai island busy touristy much clean beach bali

Content: Located next to Kuta Beach. Seminyak is crowded with do many viditor. Tje beach just average. Not so clean.
review: locate next kuta seminyak crowd many viditor tje average clean

Content: Nice for sunset but can get crowded if you don't stay in the resorts but just visit the beach. The area in front of resorts is clean and not that crowded so if visiting try finding a quiet spot and enjoy the sunset
review: nice sunset crowd dont stay resort visit area front resort clean crowd visit try find quiet spot enjoy sunset

Content: The beach looks just perfect. Best to fly a kite or just sit on a bean bag at one of the many beach clubs around, sip a drink and look at the beautiful sunset. Many hawkers here though.
review: look perfect best fly kite sit bean bag one many club around sip drink look beautiful sunset many hawker though

Content: Seminyak beach is cleaner than most other beaches, and nice surf. Not overcrowded and the surf was also nice. It's got a beautiful sunset - when it's not too cloudy. Worth a visit when you are in Bali.
review: seminyak cleaner beach nice surf overcrowd surf nice get beautiful sunset cloudy worth visit bali

Content: We went down to Seminyak Beach to spend the day and swim - it was such a shame the beach was so littered with rubbish and the local sellers just did not leave you alone!!
review: go seminyak spend day swim shame litter rubbish local seller leave alone

Content: Lovely. Seminyak is very friendly and plenty to see eat and do..double six beach is a must. I recommend Annora villas for a magical time in Bali....
review: lovely seminyak friendly plenty see eat dodouble six must recommend annora villa magical time bali

Content: We spent an amazing couple of days enjoying Kuta Beach, Seminyak. The sand isn't powder white because of the volcanic sand and it could do with a beach clean but the waves totally make up for it. Our young daughters really enjoyed jumping in, over and "surfing" the waves back to shore.The beach sellers also have everything you could want from Sarongs to beer and arwn't too pushy.
review: spent amaze couple day enjoy kuta seminyak sand isnt powder white volcanic sand clean wave totally make young daughter really enjoy jump surf wave back shorethe seller everything want sarong beer arwnt pushy

Content: Seminyak has a lovely beach, a lot nicer than the beach in Kuta in my opinion. Sunbeds are cheaper here too. Loads of cool bars along the beach front too :)
review: seminyak lovely lot nice kuta opinion sunbeds cheaper load cool bar along front

Content: Black sand beach with high current. Super place for surfing! During High tides you will see lots of surfers. Sand is black as volcanic sand. Seminyak square and a nice night life makes this a good choice to spend your day here !
review: black sand high current super place surf high tide will see lots surfer sand black volcanic sand seminyak square nice night life make good choice spend day

Content: Have been to Bali a few times but never stayed at Seminyak so thought it would be a good idea this time around. Seminyak is certainly more lay back than it's two rivals (Legian and Kuta) but unfortunately, like the rest of Bali, the most obvious thing is the RUBBISH all over this beach. There appears to be minimal respect for what people dispose of and what's washed up on the shore. I did notice a front loader attempting to clear some of the rubbish at high tide AM, which doesn't appear at low tide when the rubbish is more evident. Once again, it's all about the money rather than the paradise that people flock here for, and with more and more tourists hitting this little island, if something isn't done this will only get worse. This will be my last time visiting this island as I find it very distressing to see the abuse of animals, nature and little respect for the Eco system that this island has to offer.
review: bali time never stay seminyak thought good idea time around seminyak certainly lay back two rival legian kuta unfortunately rest bali obvious thing rubbish appear minimal respect people dispose whats wash shore notice front loader attempt clear rubbish high tide doesnt appear low tide rubbish evident money rather paradise people flock tourist hit little island something isnt do will worse will last time visit island find distress see abuse animal nature little respect eco system island offer

Content: If you are looking for peace and tranquility, this is the place to be . Nice , calm , refreshing and relaxing , seminayak is the refined form of kuta which is noisy and crowded . Stay in seminayak if all you want is quite and calm . A completely different form of Bali and it's culture.lovely place to be . Just go for a stroll on the beach even if you are staying in kuta .
review: look peace tranquility place nice calm refresh relax seminayak refine form kuta noisy crowd stay seminayak want quite calm completely different form bali culturelovely place go stroll even stay kuta

Content: The beach at Seminyak is over crowded and dirty, lots of rubbish washing up. The redeeming fact is if you're staying on the beach it's great to watch the sun go down
review: seminyak crowd dirty lot rubbish wash redeem fact youre stay great watch sun go

Content: Touts throng the beach at Kuta and at Tanjong Benoa, but not at Seminyak. Its a lot more peaceful. The beach is so clean that it is safe to jog barefoot!The sunsets are also amazing. The beach side establishments: Ku De Ta and Potato Head also lend to the laid back, yet happening atmosphere to the beach.This beach is way better than the one at Kuta. Definitely worth a visit.
review: tout throng kuta tanjong benoa seminyak lot peaceful clean safe jog barefootthe sunset amazing side establishment ku de ta potato head lend lay back yet happen atmosphere beachthis way well one kuta definitely worth visit

Content: One of my favourite things to do is go to the beach so I have visited many beaches in different countries. I was shocked to see a beach like this in Asia. Now I know for a fact that it is true with what people say, Bali is known more for their resorts and not their beaches.
review: one favourite thing go visit many beach different country shock see asia now know fact true people say bali know resort beach

Content: Seminyak is Bali's most fashionable beach, home to among the island's luxurious resorts and host to a number of fine restaurants and boutiques. Fashion stores and top dining spots.Seminyak's Petitenget Beach offers a more secluded ambiance compared to its sister strands of Kuta and Legian to the south.Evening scene more nice.
review: seminyak bali fashionable home among island luxurious resort host number fine restaurant boutique fashion store top din spotsseminyaks petitenget offer seclude ambiance compare sister strand kuta legian southevening scene nice

Content: Beautiful clean beach,plenty of small bars with bean bags and sunloungers,barter on the price for sunloungers typically they say 150000rp got them down to 100000rp which when converted to english pounds is about £6.50 which is really cheap.Definitely recommend seminyak beach.
review: beautiful clean beachplenty small bar bean bag sunloungersbarter price sunloungers typically say 150000rp get 100000rp convert english pound 650 really cheapdefinitely recommend seminyak

Content: What a let down. Terrible surf. Dirty, greyish sand and rubbish everywhere. I don't know if it's the locals or the tourists...probably both...but why do people treat the planet as a giant garbage dump?
review: let terrible surf dirty greyish sand rubbish everywhere dont know local touristsprobably bothbut people treat planet giant garbage dump

Content: We loved this beach ! However expect to be asked every 2 minutes literally to buy things ... if your girlfriend loves to sun bathe and you get a bit bored though this is a good way to keep busy so i really didn't mind we caught some rays and listened to some nice music ... on our own speaker that is , the beds were really comfy and we didn't get hasseled by the people's beds we used they were really nice :) we'll be back
review: love expect ask every 2 minute literally buy thing girlfriend love sun bathe bit bore though good way keep busy really didnt mind catch ray listen nice music speaker bed really comfy didnt hasseled people bed use really nice well back

Content: Place like no other :) it was great 6 days we were spending in seminyak bali.. Allways great food and drinks and fantastic service almost each and every restaurant we went .. highly recommended  holiday destination .cheers
review: place great 6 day spend seminyak bali allways great food drink fantastic service almost every restaurant go highly recommend holiday destination cheer

Content: Good and beautiful... Not so deep.. It's shallow for some distance.. Its not a blue one.. Can enjoy a beautiful sunset
review: good beautiful deep shallow distance blue one enjoy beautiful sunset

Content: We decided to walk from Seminyak beach to Kuta Beach. Average speed. Took a couple of hours as we had to take refuge under beach umbrellas from the rain. Credit to people cleaning up as hardly any litter on the sand. Water looked clean but not sure with water from the roads flowing straight into the ocean. Not too many dogs running around the morning we went. Maybe the rain put them off?
review: decide walk seminyak kuta average speed take couple hour take refuge umbrella rain credit people clean hardly litter sand water look clean sure water road flow straight ocean many dog run around morning go maybe rain put

Content: Great place for surfing, usually big waves especially in the Legian direction (where most of the surf schools are). Often red flags for swimming due to waves. Great fine sandy beach for sunbathing. Lots of beach bars/restaurants.
review: great place surf usually big wave especially legian direction surf school often red flag swim due wave great fine sandy sunbathe lot barsrestaurants

Content: This beach has the most amazing views and just so many neat places to eat and activities to do. Not as clear as the Pandava beach, but definitely beautiful!
review: amaze view many neat place eat activity clear pandava definitely beautiful

Content: If there's even such a word. Bali is home to a multitude of scenic sunset views and Seminyak isn't shy of holding quite a few records of stunning photographic opportunities. Take a stroll after breakfast or just before dinner when the sun is about to set and I can guarantee you that your life's perspective would change. Clean sandy white beaches, azure blue skies and the deep vast ocean blue are just a couple of things that would rope beach-goers and water sports enthusiasts.
review: there even word bali home multitude scenic sunset view seminyak isnt shy hold quite record stun photographic opportunity take stroll breakfast dinner sun set guarantee lifes perspective change clean sandy white beach azure blue sky deep vast ocean blue couple thing rope beachgoers water sport enthusiast

Content: The beach is nice and so huge area, it means the long beach there..There is a beautiful sunset there and good for family activity...There are couples bar and lounge to enjoy during sun down..The beach also clean, with the beautiful white sands
review: nice huge area mean long therethere beautiful sunset good family activitythere couple bar lounge enjoy sun downthe clean beautiful white sand

Content: Went to this particular stretch of the beach and I actually find Seminyak beach much better than Kuta's beach which I had visited years ago. Seminyak beach wasn't as dirty as I imagined from the reviews, I didn't really see rubbish in the sea or dead fishes washed ashore (as seen at Kuta)?!? Waves were huge in the evening so it's definitely not for swimming, but the sunset was beautiful! There were no hawkers trying to sell us stuff too, as compared to Kuta's constant stream of persistent hawkers.
review: go particular stretch actually find seminyak much good kutas visit year ago seminyak wasnt dirty imagine review didnt really see rubbish sea dead fish wash ashore see kuta wave huge even definitely swim sunset beautiful hawker try sell u stuff compare kutas constant stream persistent hawker

Content: Some said that the beach is filthy, but i think the Seminyak is still can be consider as clean, both that there were not any garbage and trash, and also there were not many locals trying to sell you things unlike in Kuta.good and wide space, the beach is perfect for waiting sunset, and just sitting around enjoying oneself or letting your kid plays with the sands.the wave is quite big in the middle, not suitable for swimming, specially for kids, but it will be a perfect spot for surfing.
review: say filthy think seminyak still consider clean garbage trash many local try sell thing unlike kutagood wide space perfect wait sunset sit around enjoy oneself let kid play sandsthe wave quite big middle suitable swim specially kid will perfect spot surf

Content: My wife and I selected and booked a luxury hotel on the beach as we enjoyed a beach holiday and swimming in the sea. We were most disappointed with the filth along the whole of Seminyak beach and in the sea. On enquiry we were told that the waste were wash ashore from another part of Indonesia. If you want a beach holiday in Bali this is not a place to go. Will not return and will not recommend tourist to go
review: wife select booked luxury hotel enjoy holiday swim sea disappointed filth along whole seminyak sea enquiry tell waste wash ashore another part indonesia want holiday bali place go will return will recommend tourist go

Content: Big waves, kind of crowded and lots of people wanting to sell you stuff. I'm not a surfer so I found it hard to appreciate the beach although I understand that surfers do. Wouldn't recommend it if you're not used to swimming with big waves and it's suitable for children.
review: big wave kind crowd lots people want sell stuff im surfer find hard appreciate although understand surfer wouldnt recommend youre use swim big wave suitable child

Content: Similar to Petitenget beach, just a little busier. Sea is too rough to swim in, but great for surfing. If you've visited other beaches in South East Asia, this isn't worth making a special effort to visit
review: similar petitenget little busy sea rough swim great surf youve visit beach south east asia isnt worth make special effort visit

Content: This beach was nice for drinks at night but as far as the water goes it was a bit rough. The waves were small but the undertow was mighty. Also, if you think you are far enough back you are not. Take a look around and see where the chairs are placed and know that the water will come up to and sometimes past them. At night we saw a couple of rows of beanbag chairs and tables being taken into the ocean. It was funny until you realized that the customers not only lost their drinks but possibly their cell phones too.
review: nice drink night far water go bit rough wave small undertow mighty think far enough back take look around see chair place know water will come sometimes past night saw couple row beanbag chair table take ocean funny realize customer lose drink possibly cell phone

Content: A few bars and some market stalls clean beach would go again. Not many 'sellers'  hassling you to buy their wares unlike at kuta beach
review: bar market stall clean go many seller hassle buy ware unlike kuta

Content: Nice beach. It was calm and clean and not so crowded. Very beautiful sunset there . We enjoyed there. Some one was flying kite and another was playing with the dog.
review: nice calm clean crowd beautiful sunset enjoy one fly kite another playing dog

Content: The beach shelves away quite steeply here and results in 'dumpy' waves that wouldn't be great for small children and isn't that conducive to swimming.A nice beach to go for a walk on although there are lots of beach umbrellas and loungers set out during the day, so you are best to go early in the morning when it also a bit cooler.
review: shelf away quite steeply result dumpy wave wouldnt great small child isnt conducive swimminga nice go walk although lot umbrellas lounger set day best go early morning bit cooler

Content: Walking distance from our villa....Sand a little rough and dark....Plenty of chairs at beach to hire for the day.Great surf...lovely warm water.All you need there..
review: walk distance villasand little rough darkplenty chair hire daygreat surflovely warm waterall need

Content: Great beach to watch the spectacular sunsets especially from cool beach clubs like ku de ta and potato head. These beach clubs are more pricy but they are recommended top end clubs . There are numerous cheap eating places and massages done on the beach . Good beach for morning or evening walks to people watch .
review: great watch spectacular sunset especially cool club ku de ta potato head club pricy recommend top end club numerous cheap eating place massage do good morning even walk people watch

Content: went specifically for  the surf, and is for experienced surfers only. My son who has surfed all over the world found it quite dangerous. The beach was closed for surfing on a few days and would recommend early mornings as being the best time to go.
review: go specifically surf experience surfer son surfed world find quite dangerous close surf day recommend early morning best time go

Content: My friend and I got a sun-bed for 200k Indonesian Rupees for the whole day - that's 100k each, we tried other beaches around the area and the prices asked were about the same; you can, if you're up to, bargain the prices a little bit though. The guy, who lent us the sunbeds took great care of our things too - the one time our shoes were washed away by a wave, so he secure them for us, etc. The beach is amazing to have a sundowner drink, the bars/restaurants will let you then sit on a beanbag at the beach with some fancy small umbrellas - super cute.
review: friend get sunbed 200k indonesian rupee whole day thats 100k tried beach around area price ask youre bargain price little bit though guy lent u sunbeds take great care thing one time shoe wash away wave secure u etc amaze sundowner drink barsrestaurants will let sit beanbag fancy small umbrella super cute

Content: Seminyak beach is really nice In my option, not quite the tranquil paradise like beach you think of when visiting Bali but this place has a really good surf beach which is clean and fun. The best part of Seminyak beach is at night, it really does come to life. Everyone gathers to watch the sun set drinking beers on all the bean bags they put out, really great atmosphere and amazing sun set!
review: seminyak really nice option quite tranquil paradise think visit bali place really good surf clean fun best part seminyak night really come life everyone gather watch sun set drinking beer bean bag put really great atmosphere amaze sun set

Content: Seminyak Beach is lovely in many ways. There aren't too many hawkers bothering you but at the same time there's plenty of shacks to get a drink or some fresh coconut water. Definitely recommended!
review: seminyak lovely many way arent many hawker bother time there plenty shack drink fresh coconut water definitely recommend

Content: My husband and I took our 1 and 2 year old to the beach in morning and we had a spectacular time. I don't think it is one of the prettiest beaches I have been to though we still had fun.We brought sand toys from one of the market stores which we used to dig and build castles and in the water along the shore we jumped the waves while watching the surfers. It was early (830-1030am) in the morning that we didn't get hassled by any sales people.I have been to Seminyak beach in the evening with the kids for dinner and drinks as well. We did get a lot of people coming up us trying to sell us things. My husband had enough whereas I didn't mind it was window browsing for me while I sat and enjoyed my cocktail. They were great as they didn't bother the kids who again played with the beach toys.
