Content: Bringing high expectation, me and my family with 2 young ones were quickly disappointed when we arrived. The whole beach was filled with litters. The sand wasn't smooth for children. The wave was huge and dangerous for children. Overall, it may be only good for jogging.
review: bring high expectation family 2 young one quickly disappoint arrived whole fill litter sand wasnt smooth child wave huge dangerous child overall may good jogging

Content: nice beach to hang out,, great sunset.Make sure bring all you need if you want to hang out there...
review: nice hang great sunsetmake sure bring need want hang

Content: No so populate as Kuta with surfers, as Nusa Dua with russian swimmers.  Nice place to relax and view sunset. The waves are big, and a lot of garbage are thrown on the beach from the ocean, but thats common issue for whole Bali. You mostly can't swim here, but you can experience the waves hitting you :)Seminyak itself is the best place for eat and drink and party. Enjoy!
review: populate kuta surfer nusa dua russian swimmer nice place relax view sunset wave big lot garbage throw ocean thats common issue whole bali mostly cant swim experience wave hit seminyak best place eat drink party enjoy

Content: Been to Bali many times and this is my saddest visit.   Washed up on the entire stretch of the shore (Kuta beach, Legian beach and Seminyak beach) are trash.  Trash dumped by humans from Indonesia's mainland and now washed up on the once lovely beaches of Bali.One can't even walk out through the whitewash or paddle out without having plastic bags, ropes or strings wrapped around one's legs or arms. Plastic wrappers, condom wrappers and bottles are amidst some of the trash dumped and washed up.  It's too much trash to list them. Let the photos speak for the once beautiful beaches of Bali.  I'm very saddened to see how we humans have failed to love Mother Nature.
review: bali many time saddest visit wash entire stretch shore kuta legian seminyak trash trash dump human indonesias mainland now wash lovely beach balione cant even walk whitewash paddle without plastic bag rope string wrap around one legs arm plastic wrapper condom wrapper bottle amidst trash dump wash much trash list let photo speak beautiful beach bali im sadden see human fail love mother nature

Content: Must visit this beach while in Seminyak area, lill bit crowded in the afternoon by family and local. But its fine.
review: must visit seminyak area lill bit crowd afternoon family local fine

Content: I love Seminyak beach!! It's always lovely to walk along and is looked after and rubbish cleaned away every morning. You can sit and relax on a deck chair, have a swim or surf and then a cool relaxing drink at sunset at one of the friendly beach bars
review: love seminyak always lovely walk along looked rubbish clean away every morning sit relax deck chair swim surf cool relax drink sunset one friendly bar

Content: Full of rubbish disgusting filth, save your time and money. Would be just as clean going to dump in Australia
review: full rubbish disgust filth save time money clean go dump australia

Content: This place is the restaurant of GrandMas, so we try almost everything (we spend almost 15 days)The food was really great, always good service and chilled live acoustic music in the afternoons We suggest to try the breaks fasts and tapas. I think is good price for the food, but there is different places to eat for the same money, so you have to choose. I recommend some tapas and beer in the afternoonEnjoy
review: place restaurant grandma try almost everything spend almost 15 daysthe food really great always good service chill live acoustic music afternoon suggest try break fast tapas think good price food different place eat money choose recommend tapas beer afternoonenjoy

Content: Like the rest of the beaches on this stretch it is diety and has heaps of rubbish at this time of year. Good to walk along at low tide though.
review: rest beach stretch diety heap rubbish time year good walk along low tide though

Content: This beach is much more quieter than others.  Which makes it much more pleasant.  They have lounge and umbrella rentals for those wanting a lazy day at the beach. Take a taxi here.  It's not far from seminyak square, but the roads are a killer for pedestrians.  Taxi is cheap.  Ask driver first.  Some will try and rip you off.  Although they are still cheap too.
review: much quieter others make much pleasant lounge umbrella rental want lazy day take taxi far seminyak square road killer pedestrian taxi cheap ask driver first will try rip although still cheap

Content: Avoid - unless you are a beer swilling night club loving person with no appreciation for the environment. The food options are great is the only plus. Narrow congested streets, like Asian Benidorm - a Mecca for the crass and tasteless
review: avoid unless beer swill night club love person appreciation environment food option great plus narrow congested street asian benidorm mecca crass tasteless

Content: Nice beach with warm water and grey (not white) sand. Lots of tourists and locals enjoying the day and watching the sun set. Locals selling kites and necklaces with out too much hassle. It is not as good as white sand beaches of many countries but how can you complain when the water is warm and the sun is setting with a nice cooling breeze as the sun sets.
review: nice warm water grey white sand lot tourist local enjoy day watch sun set local sell kite necklace much hassle good white sand beach many country complain water warm sun set nice cool breeze sun set

Content: The beach has black sand and some fair waves that i saw quite some people surfing. It is not that crowded in the morning, but it gets super full and colorful nearing sunset. The beach was filthy in the early morning, mostly rubbish from the previous night (it gets pretty festive), but they clean it daily until it is fairly clean.
review: black sand fair wave saw quite people surf crowd morning get super full colorful near sunset filthy early morning mostly rubbish previous night get pretty festive clean daily fairly clean

Content: Why are there so many people at this filthy cesspit of a beach? It's really not worth wasting your time here. Rubbish everywhere.
review: many people filthy cesspit really worth waste time rubbish everywhere

Content: It could have been the worst day of the year to arrive but Seminyak beach was a mess of rubbish, black dirty sand, fowl smells and more rubbish washing in from the sea and from the open sewer / drain / creek that opens onto the beach beside the Royal Beach Seminyak resort. Apparently this happens during the wet season.  We retreated to Sanur where the beach is pristine - but no surf.
review: worst day year arrive seminyak mess rubbish black dirty sand fowl smell rubbish wash sea open sewer drain creek open onto beside royal seminyak resort apparently happen wet season retreat sanur pristine surf

Content: We normally stay at Seminyak as we like the shops and restaurants around this area.  However, the beaches in Seminyak are mainly black sand beaches and is not quite what you would expect if you are more used to white sand beaches.  As such we do not normally spend time at the beach here or swim in the sea if we come to seminyak.  If your preference is for white sand beaches, then Nusa Dua may be more your cup of tea.Being in the west part of Bali, the beaches here do offer good sunsets in the evenings.
review: normally stay seminyak shop restaurant around area beach seminyak mainly black sand beach quite expect use white sand beach normally spend time swim sea come seminyak preference white sand beach nusa dua may cup teabeing west part bali beach offer good sunset evening

Content: We had in our heads that we would be down the beach all the time .. unfortunately the beach was so full of rubbish in and out of the water that the only swimming we did was at our pool in the villa .. disgraceful that it is a tourist destination and there is so much plastic and rubbish everywhere !!!!! Yuck
review: head time unfortunately full rubbish water swim pool villa disgraceful tourist destination much plastic rubbish everywhere yuck

Content: We went all around Bali, the beaches in Seminyak are large and long. Many beach clubs where you can or must rent beds. Water seams fair. The sand has not the loved white colours but a classic brown as you find by us in construction. Nothing is perfekt but sure nice
review: go around bali beach seminyak large long many club must rent bed water seam fair sand love white colour classic brown find u construction nothing perfekt sure nice

Content: Its a quite beach with some bar and less beach activities because of most of tourist stays here with a private villa. But the sunrise and sunset from this beach is excellent.
review: quite bar less activity tourist stay private villa sunrise sunset excellent

Content: Do yourself a favor and give this  beach and miss  there are great beachside in other parts of the island
review: favor give miss great beachside part island

Content: Seminyak beach is one of my favorite beach, it's near my fav beach front cafe like la plancha and the champlung, my friends and me enjoy every sunset over there with the bottle of beers, so come and try the beach ✌😎🌊🌅
review: seminyak one favorite near fav front cafe la plancha champlung friend enjoy every sunset bottle beer come try

Content: Enjoyed the breeze and some time with the family on the beach. Not too crowded. Occasional street hawkers passing by.
review: enjoy breeze time family crowd occasional street hawker pass

Content: The beach is absolutely gorgeous, especially at sunset!I did not get a chance to go swimming, but there is a great vibe all around, lots of people and venues to have fun at!
review: absolutely gorgeous especially sunseti chance go swim great vibe around lots people venue fun

Content: A difficult one to score beacuse on the one hand to sit on the sand and swim in the water of Seminyak beach is quite terrible. The dark sand and unpleasant surf  (can be dangerous) is not really conducive to playful and enjoyable frolicking. Indeed the lack of swimmers most of the time is a testament to the less than ideal conditions. Additionally like most beaches in Bali dumping of rubbish is normal as is the vast amount of influx of rubbish from Java (affecting West coast) . Add to that the fact that dogs roam freely and you get the gist. On the other hand the beaches are what makes Bali Bali. Seminyak  is where you can see the most beautiful sunsets, the view from the various eateries all along Seminyak beach is colourful with various vendors selling their wears. From colourful kites to an array of nic naks, So many colourful bean hags along the beach as you get closer to double six and virtually hundreds of colourful umbrellas at the Southern end make the beach transform from an 'ugly duckling' to a beautiful 'swan'
review: difficult one score beacuse one hand sit sand swim water seminyak quite terrible dark sand unpleasant surf dangerous really conducive playful enjoyable frolic indeed lack swimmer time testament less ideal condition additionally beach bali dump rubbish normal vast amount influx rubbish java affect west coast add fact dog roam freely gist hand beach make bali bali seminyak see beautiful sunset view various eatery along seminyak colourful various vendor sell wear colourful kite array nic naks many colourful bean hag along closer double six virtually hundred colourful umbrella southern end make transform ugly duckling beautiful swan

Content: Beautifully warm surf; comfortable loungers available for hire, with bar service provided.  Only complaint was the high level of wrapper, bags and similar trash in the water.
review: beautifully warm surf comfortable lounger available hire bar service provide complaint high level wrapper bag similar trash water

Content: Seminyak!A shoppers and gourmet paradise here in Bali but when the heat hits you and you just need some respite from all that heat, buy some swim wear if you didn't pack it and head for the beach just parallel to the shopping strip.The water is warm and the breeze cool and that makes for a perfect combination to cool off.There are ample places for internal refreshments too; water, beer, cocktails and food galore.
review: seminyaka shopper gourmet paradise bali heat hit need respite heat buy swim wear didnt pack head parallel shop stripthe water warm breeze cool make perfect combination cool offthere ample place internal refreshment water beer cocktail food galore

Content: Lots efforts to keep the beach picked up by the community were evident, but it was still pretty trashy.  I was reluctant to get in the water after a first day walk on the beach that took us through several stinky washes.  I enjoyed my visit to Bali and we had great accommodations with very good food, but the beach up close was a disappointment.  When veiwed from a distance it was beautiful the surf was aqua and the wave action was impressive.  I thought the grey sand with evidence of the volcanic geography was unique, but smell and trash are hard to ignore.  There must be better beaches than Seminyak. It was the most disappointing part of my visit.
review: lot effort keep pick community evident still pretty trashy reluctant water first day walk take u several stinky wash enjoy visit bali great accommodation good food close disappointment veiwed distance beautiful surf aqua wave action impressive think grey sand evidence volcanic geography unique smell trash hard ignore must better beach seminyak disappointing part visit

Content: Beautiful spot, lots of those beach sunbeds to hire for the day to avoid sitting on the sand. It's super relaxing and tons of restaurants and bars line the sand so perfect to slip away for a bite to eat too. Beware though, you will be approached by a lot of locals trying to sell their products to you throughout the day.. Then again, you are in Bali!
review: beautiful spot lot sunbeds hire day avoid sit sand super relax ton restaurant bar line sand perfect slip away bite eat beware though will approach lot local try sell product throughout day bali

Content: Lots and lots of rubbish and bamboo on this beach. Sand is kinda black and the water that is coming from the town into the beach smells. We walked the length and didn't feel like stopping anywhere, I guess you don't go to Seminyak for the beach!
review: lot lot rubbish bamboo sand kinda black water come town smell walk length didnt feel stop anywhere guess dont go seminyak

Content: I would like to come back and learn to surf, the waves looked incredible! You could literally taste the salt from the beach - there were lots of people trying to sell you stuff but they weren't too bad if you just say No politely !

Content: This a chill out beachIt decently clean. I expected  it to be cleaner.You would find a lot of beach cafes with bean bags. You will also find the regular ones.Gra a bean bag shack and chill on a sunset.Enjoy your meal/drink/with your partner.Avoid monsoon, as rain may spoil it a little bit.

Content: We visited on a November morning, so our view may be a bit skewed. The beach was clean, clear, and empty. We also stopped by Ku De TA for drinks and again, it was relatively empty. Perfect spot for our last day in Bali.

Content: The beach is clean. There are few good restaurants on the beach, and the food there is clean, tasty and very reasonably priced.

Content: The best way to see this beach is from Potato head. Book your chair and watch the sunset. Eat drink and enjoy. The Sundays have many locals enjoying the beach with their families, so nice to see.

Content: Average kind of beach. Not really a good place to relax being annoyed by someone selking or offering something. Go to Padawa instead

Content: Dark coloured sand means it really heats up, so take thongs with you. Get a good spot and the sunsets are truly breathtaking.My biggest criticism is that neither the tourists or the locals respect the area, so much crash just thrown on the sand, cigarette butts etc...very disappointing.

Content: Seminyak beach is ok, nothing to shout about and you definitely wouldn't come here for the beach. You'd be much better off staying at a nice villa or resort with a good pool. The sunsets are beautiful and you can also surf at different places along the beach but you'll find much better places in the world for a beach.

Content: Seminyak beach is this huge beautiful stretch of sand with countless spots to stop for a drink or some food while locals come and offer you all sorts of things for sale. I easily visit this area every single day I'm in Bali, because it's got absolutely everything you need

Content: Good place for surfing but not good for swimming. Too wavy. Sand is ok. Good for tanning also. Not crowded.

Content: Its a very average beach, there are so many bicep beaches along the coast. The sand isn't that nice and theres a fair bit of rubbish around. Lots of vendors trying to sell you stuff constantly. We wouldn't spend a lot of time here, however a walk along the beach is interesting.
review: average many bicep beach along coast sand isnt nice there fair bit rubbish around lots vendor try sell stuff constantly wouldnt spend lot time walk along interest

Content: This is a great beach with a little bit darker sand because of the volcanos. Along the beach you will find the big expensive hotels where you can go for a drink. The only negative thing is for parents is that the water is pretty dangerous here. Big waves and underwater currents.

Content: If you want a big beach with lots to offer this beach did offer a lot. Restaurants and bars everywhere all the way along, the surf is good especially for beginners and although at sunset the beach seemed very busy there was plenty of space to either walk along or chill out on one of the many beanbags. Overall a nice beach.
review: want big lot offer offer lot restaurant bar everywhere way along surf good especially beginner although sunset seem busy plenty space either walk along chill one many beanbag overall nice

Content: There are some nice hotels / beach clubs set back from the sea front and the beach is large but lacks the intimacy of beaches in other parts of indonesia, such as in the Gili Islands
review: nice hotel club set back sea front large lack intimacy beach part indonesia gili island

Content: The beach is beautiful. Water is warm, low tide shows the flat sand covered in a thin layer of water reflecting the sunset, worth staying until after dark for the sky lantern ceremonies! Free parking for scooters along the small beach road and renting a beanbag is free with any food or drink (30,000RPI mei goreng / bin tang)

Content: One of the best places in Bali to watch the sunset.Ku De Ta and Potato Head are hotspots to watch the sunset with some nice food and a drink.

Content: If you would like to enjoy a perfect sunset on a budget, I suggest Seminyak Beach over Kuta or Jimbaran as you don't need to spend a lot to enjoy yourselves.There are lots of bars selling cheap beers on the beach. The best thing is that they even have bean bags!
review: enjoy perfect sunset budget suggest seminyak kuta jimbaran dont need spend lot enjoy yourselvesthere lots bar sell cheap beer best thing even bean bag

Content: Quite crowded.Not very pretty - a bit dirty.Can be good for some water sports - saw people taking beginner's surfing classes, surfing on their own, water ski etc.

Content: Maybe this is the best beach in Bali. I went to all of them and considering the cleanliness, size, and surroundings, in my opinion this is the best.

Content: Do not recommend Seminyak beach. It is under reconstruction with lots of work going on. Choose another beach!

Content: A good sandybeach with plenty of amenities and sun beds to rent. Beware of the rip tide although red flags and lifeguards are about. Beach get cleaned every morning.

Content: I would like to visit this place every time I come back to Bali. If you want to chill with your friends then this is the place to go. Sadly couldn't experience sunset but I can imagine the beauty it would add to the already beautiful surrounding.

Content: this is a nice beach.....was a little too wavy when we were there in November but good for surfing.  Lots of beach chairs for rent.  Only negative is there a lots of local trying to sell everything......hats, manicure, scarfs, goods, fruit etc.  They are very persistent so beware to keep your head down and if you buy anything then all vendors will be over to visit and try their luck
review: nice beachwas little wavy november good surf lot chair rent negative lot local try sell everythinghats manicure scarfs good fruit etc persistent beware keep head buy anything vendor will visit try luck

Content: It is nice for sunset but rather busy so I'm sure you will find another beach which is less busy. But good options to relax with lots of bars and chairs
review: nice sunset rather busy im sure will find another less busy good option relax lot bar chair

Content: Being Australian and spoiled by our pristine beaches, I still enjoyed an early morning run and/or an afternoon stroll on Seminyak Beach, which was only a short walk from where I was staying. In the evening there was plenty of atmospheric lounging on the beach where you could wine and dine on the many bean bags and listen to great chill out tunes.
review: australian spoil pristine beach still enjoy early morning run andor afternoon stroll seminyak short walk stay even plenty atmospheric lounge wine dine many bean bag listen great chill tune

Content: Not my favorite beach.  Lots of people using beach to walk dogs (no problem with that) but not picking up poo (big Problem with that) Long beach and sand gets darker the nearer  the Volcanic ash.  At the entrance I arrived at had bucket with water and ladle to wash your fee,t nice touch.
review: favorite lot people use walk dog problem pick poo big problem long sand get dark nearer volcanic ash entrance arrive bucket water ladle wash foot nice touch

Content: During the night all beaches in Seminyak are full of big colorful pillow, each bar has a live band and all cocktail are very cheap!!The atmosphere is awesome.. That was our first activity in Bali.. A nice mojito on the beach, 30 degrees... What else?
review: night beach seminyak full big colorful pillow bar live band cocktail cheapthe atmosphere awesome first activity bali nice mojito 30 degree

Content: This is one of the highlights for us when we have visited Bali. Sitting on a beanbag, watching the sunsets, while enjoying a cold drink from one of the many bars is just so relaxing. The downside is that you get hassled by lots of people trying to sell you sunglasses, hats, watches, paintings, massages, bracelets, manicures, pedicures, bows and arrows, tasers, lazers and all kinds of Knick Knacks. They can be very persistent but generally a polite "Sorry, no" is enough and they will move on.
review: one highlight u visit bali sit beanbag watch sunset enjoy cold drink one many bar relax downside hassle lots people try sell sunglass hat watch painting massage bracelet manicure pedicure bow arrow tasers lazers kind knick knack persistent generally polite sorry enough will move

Content: There are so many great beaches in Bali..give this one a miss if you can. I'm not sure if it was just the time of year that we were there but there were pretty significant waves breaking near the shore that make this beach difficult to actually swim at. If you enjoy body surfing (or actual surfing) and aren't scared of large waves you might like it here. Also the beach had lovely sun loungers set up all along it that you have to pay to use. You could set up on the sand but it's kind of awkward setting up between the loungers and the sand is really hot. The loungers are expensive and while laying on them you are constantly harassed by vendors selling knock off sunglasses, cheap "jewelry", and sarongs. The vendors were non stop and really took away from the enjoyment. Bali has tons of quiet white sand beaches with minimal break, I think it's worth it to put in the effort to find one near you instead of Seminyak Beach :)
review: many great beach baligive one miss im sure time year pretty significant wave break near shore make difficult actually swim enjoy body surf actual surfing arent scar large wave might lovely sun lounger set along pay use set sand kind awkward set lounger sand really hot lounger expensive lay constantly harass vendor sell knock sunglass cheap jewelry sarong vendor non stop really take away enjoyment bali ton quiet white sand beach minimal break think worth put effort find one near instead seminyak

Content: ...Enjoy!The beach and view is similar to most beaches, but unfortunately there isn't my cleaning going on. Sadly there is a lot of people leaving their left over rubbish. This doesn't ruin the whole beach, just the initial walk up. Once you past the small line of rubbish, you forget it was there and the beach is stunning. Great view as you would expect and in November the waves crashing slightly heavier, which makes for a lovely sound and feel. Just be careful as riptide is quite common.

Content: Not much crowd at this beach, went from 12nn-3:30pm (maybe that's why)The sand is bloody hot so be sure to be in your flip flops at the very least. Tides/waves were 6/10 in strength. Beginner surfing lessons available here so the wave strength is ideal.More private as it's not as famous as Kuta beach for example but this area is where the more pricey accommodations are.If you want to relax and have a tan or enjoy the sunset here, there are beach chairs and umbrellas along the stretch of the beach BUT a payment of 20,000 Rupiah per person is required (approx. USD2).Also, a lot of lovely places to eat facing the sea along this stretch.

Content: Many of Bali's beaches have a lot of coral and rocks, Seminyak is the MOST beautiful, comfortable beach I visited on our 2 week trip. All beaches in Bali are beautiful, but at Seminyak, you can walk out hundreds and hundreds of feet and still touch. I loved that. The sand and beach are so clean and smooth, it was such a nice alternative to all the other rocky beaches surrounding and the Gili Islands. The rocky beaches are great for photos and are beautiful, but sometimes you just want to swim or lounge and not worry about cutting your feet or getting knocked into rocks. Seminyak is perfect for that. We spent days on this beach enjoying every moment of it. Lots of baby crabs at night that sometimes pop out during the day, but it was cute and fun. LOVE THIS BEACH, can't stress enough.
review: many bali beach lot coral rock seminyak beautiful comfortable visit 2 week trip beach bali beautiful seminyak walk hundred hundred foot still touch love sand clean smooth nice alternative rocky beach surround gili island rocky beach great photo beautiful sometimes want swim lounge worry cut foot get knock rock seminyak perfect spent day enjoy every moment lot baby crab night sometimes pop day cute fun love cant stress enough

Content: Seminyak beach was just 5 minutes walk from our hotel.The beach is wide and long. There is plenty of space for everyone without felling crowded.We enjoyed some of the most beautiful sunsets here.There are a lot of restaurants, pubs and lounges which you can enjoy for lunch during the day or for a party in the evening.The waves were great. We are not surfers but we still had our fare share of fun. It was a bit of a mission to find a peaceful and quiet spot on the beach where you can relax and don't have to listen to few different kinds of music at the same time.I only have a humble request to some of the dog owners to be considerate and clean after their pets while walking them on the beach.

Content: We paid 100,000 IDR for 2 lounge chairs and 50,000 for a body board.  Had a fun day out with everything within reach - coconuts, cold beers, fresh juice, food.  There were also a handful of vendors walking around trying to sell postcards, sarongs, and fruits.  No one offered massages though, strangely.  A word of caution - don't underestimate the waves.  We saw a number of adults (that's right, not kids) bobbing up and down and moving further and further away from the shore.  3 had to be rescued in one afternoon as they just couldn't swim back.   A tip - we saw surf guards on the beachfront of the Anantara Hotel.
review: pay 100000 idr 2 lounge chair 50000 body board fun day everything within reach coconut cold beer fresh juice food handful vendor walk around try sell postcard sarongs fruit one offer massage though strangely word caution dont underestimate wave saw number adult thats right kid bob move away shore 3 rescue one afternoon couldnt swim back tip saw surf guard beachfront anantara hotel
