Content: The beach has been cleaned up over recent years but the creeks running into the sea need further urgent attention. I would not be swimming anywhere near the creeks (read drains) but well away is fine.The sunsets are magic.
review: clean recent year creeks run sea need urgent attention swim anywhere near creek read drain well away finethe sunset magic

Content: Great place to hang out and soak up the sun and have a beer or two. Excellent eating spots along the beach front.
review: great place hang soak sun beer two excellent eat spot along front

Content: The water here is clear and is a very good place to Surf. There are many eateries which serve very good local and international cuisine.
review: water clear good place surf many eatery serve good local international cuisine

Content: Grab a beanbag, grab a beer and watch the sunset (along with the 4000 other people doing the same). Get there early to get the front row.
review: grab beanbag grab beer watch sunset along 4000 people early front row

Content: the beach has some cafe that have a colorfull beanbag to chill and watch the sunset, nice place to hangout with your friends.
review: cafe colorfull beanbag chill watch sunset nice place hangout friend

Content: We sat at the beach at the end of our resort, took a bottle of wine and watched the sunset.  There were people flying kites, walking past, swimming and live music to add to the feel of the night. Very relaxed, nobody hassled us to buy anything as we were staying at The Royal Beach Resort, so sellers aren't allowed to approach you
review: sat end resort take bottle wine watch sunset people fly kite walk past swim live music add feel night relax nobody hassle u buy anything stay royal resort seller arent allow approach

Content: The saying is when in Rome; but when I'm Seminyak make sure you hit the beach! Many little eateries, grab some sliders, a Bintang and watch the sun set, awesomeness!
review: say rome im seminyak make sure hit many little eatery grab slider bintang watch sun set awesomeness

Content: Good surf. Plenty to do. Lots of beach restaurants and bars to watch the sunset!The bed 'salesman' are a determined lot and will obviously allow you to overpay. 50,000 should secure you a bed and umbrella. Lots of folks selling things which can be annoying.  Until the ice cream man appears......then we're talking!
review: good surf plenty lot restaurant bar watch sunsetthe bed salesman determine lot will obviously allow overpay 50000 secure bed umbrella lot folk sell thing annoy ice cream man appearsthen talk

Content: It's fun to spend time here. The waves are awesome for sea sports or just play. The sand and water are crystal clear.
review: fun spend time wave awesome sea sport play sand water crystal clear

Content: I went to seminyak beach after kuta beach, so I felt that Seminyak beach is not that happening as kuta beach, But cleanliness is good on beach, and is near KU DE TA and patato beach head
review: go seminyak kuta felt seminyak happen kuta cleanliness good near ku de ta patato head

Content: No words can describe the beauty of this beach.   It's simply stunning and the water is so clean.  The sand is also great, making it a wonderful relaxation spot.  Definitely a must go place in bali.
review: word describe beauty simply stunning water clean sand great make wonderful relaxation spot definitely must go place bali

Content: Loved this beach! Ran on it every morning. Surfed, swam and sunbathed during the day and enjoyed the beach restaurants with live music every night! Paradise!
review: love ran every morning surfed swam sunbathe day enjoy restaurant live music every night paradise

Content: Some pictures i captured on Seminyak beach so relaxing sitting back and enjoying the moment.Looking forward to going again on a holiday
review: picture capture seminyak relaxing sit back enjoy momentlooking forward go holiday

Content: Ok this isn't your storybook beach, no white sand and light blue water here, but. It's fun, bigger than normal surf at certain times of the day, meters from most hotels, warm and just easy. It's no doubt polluted and there area some smelly steams leading into it, but not massively more than any Asian beach or if the bay's & beaches of many Australian cities like Sydney & Melbourne, just swim well away from the streams
review: ok isnt storybook white sand light blue water fun big normal surf certain time day meter hotel warm easy doubt pollute area smelly steam lead massively asian bay beach many australian city sydney melbourne swim well away stream

Content: There are two halves to the beach, from the entrance to the right is a quiet long stretch of sand and to the left is a bustling vibrant beach bar and watersports stretch. Lovely place to walk early morning, fairly empty with just a few dog walkers, joggers, surfers  and yoga enthusiasts. During the day and evening it gets much livelier with the bars filling up, all competing at night to have the best / loudest live music! Food and drink can be found easily and cheaply and it's a good spot for a sociable evening / night. For surfing the waves tend to be suitable for beginners and there are a lot of surfing schools towards the far end of the beach where the moped track runs along the back. The track / road along the back of it dies get very busy with mopeds but that's Bali for you!
review: two half entrance right quiet long stretch sand leave bustle vibrant bar watersports stretch lovely place walk early morning fairly empty dog walker jogger surfer yoga enthusiast day even get much lively bar fill compete night best loud live music food drink find easily cheaply good spot sociable even night surf wave tend suitable beginner lot surf school towards far end moped track run along back track road along back dy busy moped thats bali

Content: I spent 6 hours chilling at this beach this afternoon and this evening. We experienced chillin on the beach bean bags, refreshing drinks, food, market sellers and to top off a beautiful sunset we were provided live band playing till late. Highly recommend for families too. 😀
review: spent 6 hour chill afternoon evening experience chillin bean bag refresh drink food market seller top beautiful sunset provide live band play till late highly recommend family

Content: its a long beach and clean,and the sand is good to walk on but not so fine,get a cheap foot massage done,one can get beach beds on hire at reasonable rate or simply hang out at kudeta lounge
review: long cleanand sand good walk fineget cheap foot massage doneone bed hire reasonable rate simply hang kudeta lounge

Content: Seminyak beach is a quite place to enjoy a slowly sunset. The sea current is dangerous but gives you beautiful sights of the waves.
review: seminyak quite place enjoy slowly sunset sea current dangerous give beautiful sight wave

Content: Not recommended for family with young kids due to strong waves and current, beach was not clean, lot of disposable  plastic on the shoreline
review: recommend family young kid due strong wave current clean lot disposable plastic shoreline

Content: Gorgeous beach to enjoy all day, with many an opportunity taken to sunbake or have drinks each night and one of the many esky's. At times it can unfortunately have a bit of rubbish deposited on it. Overall I lovely place to take a walk or have a drink!
review: gorgeous enjoy day many opportunity take sunbake drink night one many eskys time unfortunately bite rubbish deposit overall lovely place take walk drink

Content: Seminyak ended up being my favourite beach spot! Not so crowded as its southern neighbours!! Some fine restaurants and beach bars! And that's when we start to see some quality resorts!!
review: seminyak end favourite spot crowd southern neighbour fine restaurant bar thats start see quality resort

Content: Had some of the best times EVER of my life at this beach! I still remember back when all the hustle and bustle was at Kuta's Legian Beach and Seminyak seemed so quiet and far off yet the two beaches connected. As time went by and more and more people decided to make Bali home did this Seminyak beach along with one of its now world-famous establishments, KUDETA, did it explode as THE NEW beach to be at and be seen on. The last time I must say was that there must have been some shifts in energies between the Earth, Moon and Su, because never have I ever felt such a dramatic and immense energy of the sea pulling me and my kids out so sea, not once but almost three times!The beach looked like the tundra plains of Alaska at one stage and then suddenly huge waves as high as 2.5Meters would come crashing towards us and the many other brave ones in the sea that day. I had to hold with as much strength as I could muster as the kids were being literally dragged out to sea! Truly incredible and what an awesome sight and experience for all to witness and feel the power of Nature in all its its rawness!Were the kids scared? Maybe a little.Was I scared? Yeah, I think so.Will we be back? ABSOLUTELY!!! 😃😂
review: best time life still remember back hustle bustle kutas legian seminyak seem quiet far yet two beach connect time go people decide make bali home seminyak along one now worldfamous establishment kudeta explode new see last time must say must shift energy earth moon su never felt dramatic immense energy sea pull kid sea almost three timesthe look tundra plain alaska one stage suddenly huge wave high 25meters come crashing towards u many brave one sea day hold much strength muster kid literally drag sea truly incredible awesome sight experience witness feel power nature rawnesswere kid scar maybe littlewas scar yeah think sowill back absolutely

Content: I love swimming here anytime of day. Before breakfast you can have the beach to yourself and if you swim out to the breakers and look back over the Oberoi hotel you can see the volcanoes in the distance when the sky is clear. During the day the beach us usually quite busy but still fun. In the evening lots of people come down to watch the sunset
review: love swimming anytime day breakfast swim breaker look back oberoi hotel see volcano distance sky clear day u usually quite busy still fun even lot people come watch sunset

Content: One thing I had to do each morning before entering the beach was walk around the rubbish and dogs... Bali is clearly over loaded by tourism. The people are really in your face, even when your sitting in a restaurant on the beach just wanting to relax and sip cocktails... Time and time again I would get hassled and miss my sunset moment. I love Bali. But they really need to stop the hawkers as it's quite annoying and unpleasant. Also ridiculous charges to hire beach lounges! $40! For the day. Food pretty expensive on beach. Loved the live music, movies and good quality eats. Surf was ok pretty dumpy.
review: one thing morning enter walk around rubbish dog bali clearly loaded tourism people really face even sit restaurant want relax sip cocktail time time hassle miss sunset moment love bali really need stop hawker quite annoy unpleasant ridiculous charge hire lounge 40 day food pretty expensive love live music movie good quality eats surf ok pretty dumpy

Content: We spent 2 days on the beach.  We hired 2 sun lounges with an umbrella and told our host to keep the Bintangs coming!  The water is super warm but beware for the rip tides and the big wave dumpers.  You will be inundated with Balinese trying to sell their wares.  This is part of the beach experience - definitely stop the ladies with the fruit, you won't be disappointed!  Don't be afraid to eat local.  Some of the best food is sold on the back of a motorcycle.  There are a few pop up kitchens on the beach run by local women.  This food is so cheap and fresh and ridiculously cheap.  They even deliver it to your sun lounge.TIPS:Make sure you put on lots of sunscreen, even though you're in the shade those UVs punch through everything!Take the time to pick your beach host - the guy trying to get you to sit on his sun lounges.  Some a nicer/better than others.You'll need to pay approx 4000-5000 RP for a trip to the toilets on the beach
review: spent 2 day hire 2 sun lounge umbrella tell host keep bintangs come water super warm beware rip tide big wave dumper will inundate balinese try sell ware part experience definitely stop lady fruit wont disappointed dont afraid eat local best food sell back motorcycle pop kitchen run local woman food cheap fresh ridiculously cheap even deliver sun loungetipsmake sure put lot sunscreen even though youre shade uvs punch everythingtake time pick host guy try sit sun lounge nicerbetter othersyoull need pay approx 40005000 rp trip toilet

Content: It is a happening place with locals playing  soccer, people swimming and surfing and people chilling with a drink...
review: happen place local play soccer people swim surf people chill drink

Content: the beach is on par with most beaches in bali. Once you get there you can spend the whole day and evening there. Food ,drinks,sunbeds,surfing and the perfect place to watch the sunset having a meal and drinks..
review: par beach bali spend whole day even food drinkssunbedssurfing perfect place watch sunset meal drink

Content: Clean beach but watch out for the waves and tides! They are quite high and if you are not a good swimmer I wouldn't even suggest going in! Water is clean though and the sand is free of rocks and shells that hurt your feet.
review: clean watch wave tide quite high good swimmer wouldnt even suggest go water clean though sand free rock shell hurt foot

Content: Seminyak Beach is a lovely stretch of sand with waves  lapping onshore. Tourists still throng the shoreline. Watch out for the occasional drug pusher as happened when I was there. Decline politely when touts approach you. Otherwise it remains a pleasant place to walk and enjoy the sea breeze. Five star hotels dot this area and they have good dining facilities if you wish to splurge on a meal.
review: seminyak lovely stretch sand wave lap onshore tourist still throng shoreline watch occasional drug pusher happen decline politely touts approach remain pleasant place walk enjoy sea breeze five star hotel dot area good dining facility wish splurge meal

Content: On my first visit to Bali I went to seminyak beach and was disappointed due to the fact that it was totally unappealing there were huge King tides and it was unsuitable for swimming and relaxing .I expected the beach to be better and the waves smaller on my second visit however exactly the same .Seminyak has a good vibe and is a great area but the beach lets it down
review: first visit bali go seminyak disappointed due fact totally unappealing huge king tide unsuitable swim relaxing expect well wave small second visit exactly seminyak good vibe great area let

Content: Seminyak beach is beautiful. The sand isn't white but oh so soft. The sunset is just exquisite to watch while sitting in the bean bags provided by the local restaurants. Staff will take your orders for drinks, snacks and/or dinner. The locals will want you to buy their wares, be direct if you aren't interested. It is their livelihood after all.
review: seminyak beautiful sand isnt white oh soft sunset exquisite watch sit bean bag provide local restaurant staff will take order drink snack andor dinner local will want buy ware direct arent interested livelihood

Content: Seminyak is my favourite beach it's clean and always something going on my favourite place to eat is along there too ! We can buy things on the beach and get pampered by lovely Ella 💜 the tide was a bit high this year but that doesn't stop us from going I would just be careful at high tide! The locals here are lovely and not too pushy
review: seminyak favourite clean always something go favourite place eat along buy thing pamper lovely ella tide bit high year doesnt stop u go careful high tide local lovely pushy

Content: Not very clean, but they have had a couple of storms.  Lot of rubbish on the beach and surrounds.Would not hurry back there again.
review: clean couple storm lot rubbish surroundswould hurry back

Content: Never seen anything like this. Rubbish everywhere. I was informed that it is like this, every year at this time (February). People on the beach selling things very pushy, don't like taking no for an answer. One in particular was extremely rude. Water was a great temperature, although when you get out you have plastic bags stuck to you.The beach was that disgusting that I took photo's of it. The locals do there best to get it cleaned up every morning before the tourists get down there, to no avail.
review: never see anything rubbish everywhere inform every year time february people sell thing pushy dont take answer one particular extremely rude water great temperature although plastic bag stick youthe disgusting take photo local best clean every morning tourist avail

Content: It was definitely a good plan during honeymoon to have a relax romantic dinner at the beach. There is also live band singing and it is an option to give tips. the seafood is fresh and they do serve tiger prawn, and variety of fish.
review: definitely good plan honeymoon relax romantic dinner live band sing option give tip seafood fresh serve tiger prawn variety fish

Content: Beach is nice but due to heavy waves and strong current can't swim in the sea especially children. Lost sunglasses and slippers due to heavy waves which was not pleasant to walk back without slippers.
review: nice due heavy wave strong current cant swim sea especially child lose sunglass slipper due heavy wave pleasant walk back without slipper

Content: Nice beach to go in the morning. Clean water. Long Stretch of beach. There's a lot of sun beds but you need to pay. I don't know the price as I didn't use. There's people doing exercises, learning surfing...etc. but if you go to the side where it's near double 6 hotel the beach is less crowded.
review: nice go morning clean water long stretch there lot sun bed need pay dont know price didnt use there people exercise learn surfingetc go side near double 6 hotel less crowd

Content: Seminyak beach is a clean, relaxing destination to hire a sun lounge and soak up the beautiful Bali sun!  The service you get in the beach is incredible....lady selling pineapples and cutting up in front of you, Bintang sold by the vendors on the beach, icy poles as you lay there....you don't have to move.  The Balinese are such lovely, friendly people who never harass you to purchase their wears.  I fall more in love with Seminyak beach the more times I go!  Highly recommend putting your feet up and choosing this awesome beach destination!
review: seminyak clean relax destination hire sun lounge soak beautiful bali sun service incrediblelady selling pineapple cut front bintang sell vendor icy pole lay thereyou dont move balinese lovely friendly people never harass purchase wear fall love seminyak time go highly recommend put foot choose awesome destination

Content: Always something going on no matter if it's during the day to sit & relax or surf along with having a lunch or at night when the beach bars/restaurants are a buzz with live music.Some of the eateries are better than others and can be expensive when comparing to prices in restaurants along the Seminyak strip, but the sunset ting is what you pay for, quite wonderful.Yes those selling anything and everything can be annoying but still a worthwhile experience.
review: always something go matter day sit relax surf along lunch night barsrestaurants buzz live musicsome eatery well others expensive compare price restaurant along seminyak strip sunset ting pay quite wonderfulyes sell anything everything annoy still worthwhile experience

Content: It's amazing in the evening especially after sunset as there is live band playing some music. The beach is long. They have a few of outdoor cafe with serves you some food and drinks. There is beam bags at the beach with a small table where u can enjoy the stars and lighting of the city. The locals are selling the lantern to the tourist with rph 100000 but if we buy from the restaurant waiter they can give a cheaper price. The sand at the beach is soft and sandy. It's comfortable and cooling
review: amaze even especially sunset live band play music long outdoor cafe serf food drink beam bag small table u enjoy star light city local sell lantern tourist rph 100000 buy restaurant waiter give cheap price sand soft sandy comfortable cooling

Content: Perfectly pleasant as beaches go. The waves in this area are well suited to surfing but not to paddling for small children. There are occasional lifeguards in the area which seem to be connected to some of the beachfront hotels. They weren't always looking seaward.
review: perfectly pleasant beach go wave area well suit surf paddle small child occasional lifeguard area seem connect beachfront hotel werent always look seaward

Content: Very good staff always at hand making sue you are comfortable and shuttle always arrived on time did not have problems with hawkers on the beach not allowed in our area
review: good staff always hand make sue comfortable shuttle always arrive time problem hawker allow area

Content: A very average beach - ok for the younger crowd I guess, but not what I would call an attractive beach.
review: average ok young crowd guess call attractive

Content: Nice beach to sit down and watch the sun set! There aren't too many vendors hassling you and it's great to sit near the beach clubs to hear the music and chill out.Great beach to relax and pop into the beach clubs for a drink.
review: nice sit watch sun set arent many vendor hassle great sit near club hear music chill outgreat relax pop club drink

Content: Seminyak beach is great fun for catching waves, learning how to surf, having a nap and lounging around. Lots of people around enjoying the same things. Water is warm, sand is clean. Many dogs in this area, walking around freely. Often they go chase each other. Very fun to watch!Lots of seating areas. Often depending on what hotel you're in. The seats have Hotel names on them, such as Harris Hotel, Horrison and The Courtyard, etc..
review: seminyak great fun catch wave learn surf nap lounge around lots people around enjoy thing water warm sand clean many dog area walk around freely often go chase fun watchlots seat area often depend hotel youre seat hotel name harris hotel horrison courtyard etc

Content: The beach was v clean, and a long strip.We paid 100Rupes for 2 sun beds for 1 hr- you need to bargain heavily as is the case with all bali. Only con is the locals passing by selling stuff other than that its just perfect specially foe a free beach
review: v clean long stripwe pay 100rupes 2 sun bed 1 hr need bargain heavily case bali con local pass sell stuff perfect specially foe free

Content: Seminyak Beach is very popular. Nice sand and a wide stretching beach with many waterfront restaurants. Good during the day, better at night. Music played all day and late into the night. You can swim, surf, play ball games on the beach or simply enjoy a cold drink under the umbrellas and watch the action in front of you.
review: seminyak popular nice sand wide stretch many waterfront restaurant good day well night music play day late night swim surf play ball game simply enjoy cold drink umbrella watch action front

Content: Long and clean beach. Not overcrowded. Lovely walk along at any time. Lot of activities along the beach. Feel safe. Food and drinks always on hand
review: long clean overcrowd lovely walk along time lot activity along feel safe food drink always hand

Content: Gotta visit if you're staying in Seminyak! Makes no sense if you don't pop by from one of the nearby beach clubs or restaurants :)
review: gotta visit youre stay seminyak make sense dont pop one nearby club restaurant

Content: beautiful beach with plenty of waves and soft sand to chill out on. Fantastic sunsets!One drawback was the dirty water flowing into the sea - not sure where it came from but it did smell!
review: beautiful plenty wave soft sand chill fantastic sunsetsone drawback dirty water flow sea sure come smell

Content: unfortunately at the time of year that we went, the beach was full of rubbish up and down the shoreline.  Im not sure if that is all year through but it was very dissapointing
review: unfortunately time year go full rubbish shoreline im sure year dissapointing

Content: Very disappointed with this beach, when we went there was rubbish strewn all over the beach. There are only a handful of sunbeds and the owners tried to charge 200,000 rupees for 2 beds, paid only 50.000 at Legian.
review: disappointed go rubbish strewn handful sunbeds owner try charge 200000 rupee 2 bed pay 50000 legian

Content: Nice beach and lots of hotels around for lunch or an early dinner after a day on the beach.   Very clean and good amenities
review: nice lot hotel around lunch early dinner day clean good amenity

Content: Its THE best beach in Bali to spend the day with your family and friends. Its not crazy crowed like Kuta or Legian Beach. Also for me, the crowd here seemed a bit better in terms of "class" (sorry for being politically incorrect) ... but its true!!! Kuta and Legian beaches are like fish markets compared to this one. This beach is much much cleaner and the restaurants on the beach are quite nice, nothing great but just nice. You can rent seats/umbrella for USD 20 for the whole day, surf boards are USD 7.5, body boards are USD 4 !!! There are beer guys right at the beach, they serve really chilled beers and drinks (with nuts) right to you on the sand. Its awesome. But the best part was the water, it was warm to perfection. We simply loved our time at the Seminyak beach. I highly recommend this one.
review: best bali spend day family friends crazy crow kuta legian crowd seem bit good term class sorry politically incorrect true kuta legian beach fish market compare one much much clean restaurant quite nice nothing great nice rent seatsumbrella usd 20 whole day surf board usd 75 body board usd 4 beer guy right serve really chill beer drink nut right sand awesome best part water warm perfection simply love time seminyak highly recommend one

Content: Seminyak beach is a very long sandy beach, not the best for swimming, in fact it is very dangerous to do so in most parts but it's great for surfing. The beach isn't too dirty although there are some areas where dirty water and sewers come out. There are many beachside bars with poufs or chairs on the sand, lovely for chilling out and watching the beautiful sun set!
review: seminyak long sandy best swim fact dangerous part great surf isnt dirty although area dirty water sewer come many beachside bar poufs chair sand lovely chill watch beautiful sun set

Content: The beach smelled with sewage. After staying in other lovely beaches such as Gili Meno island and Lombok, I was quite disappointed with this side of beach
review: smell sewage stay lovely beach gili meno island lombok quite disappointed side

Content: Lovely beach and perfect for romantic stroll or a surfing session!vendors selling beer and soft drinks and snacks!enjoy 😉
review: lovely perfect romantic stroll surf sessionvendors sell beer soft drink snacksenjoy

Content: Waves can vary on swell size. But beautiful sandy beach sand Colour is slightly grey but still a beautiful beach. A three year old would be fine in the shallows. And even if your a surfer there is a rideable wave every day for mid to novice surfers.  On a good day I've seen good surfers out there but it's not pipeline or bells beach.   Boards n lessons for hire on beach
review: wave vary swell size beautiful sandy sand colour slightly grey still beautiful three year old fine shallow even surfer rideable wave every day mid novice surfer good day ive see good surfer pipeline bell board n lesson hire

Content: When in seminak head down the beach for sunset hire a bean bag sip on a cocktail and soak up the atmosphere enjoy the beats or an acoustic treat order a cheap pizza All in all relaxing and fun and won't blow the budget
review: seminak head sunset hire bean bag sip cocktail soak atmosphere enjoy beat acoustic treat order cheap pizza relax fun wont blow budget

Content: the beach was polluted with sewage going down to the water  that you need to walk through to get to some of the restaurants. the bean bags at the beach was nice with a great atmosphere its just the sewage that killed is for our romantic walk
review: polluted sewage go water need walk restaurant bean bag nice great atmosphere sewage kill romantic walk

Content: Lovely to watch the surfers. Nice beach to walk on/swim in. Not a whole pile of cafes around for food. Sun loungers were very expensive.
review: lovely watch surfer nice walk onswim whole pile cafe around food sun lounger expensive

Content: Nice spot to start at and walk your little legs of for as far as the eye can see...sunsets are nice, lots of people very busy spot if you like lots tourists...

Content: We spent the day here, great flat beach with plenty of beds.Cost of beds is about RP 100 for the day.Plenty of restaurants and toilets located along the beach, and lots of hawkers selling stuff.Also worth spending the evening here.

Content: Seminyak Beach perfect for that stunning sunset shot. The  afternoons are busy with locals and visitors alike strolling the shore; swimming; surfing; or stopping off at the many hotel bars situated along the beachfront. Caution big strong surf during the day.
review: seminyak perfect stunning sunset shot afternoon busy local visitor alike stroll shore swim surf stop many hotel bar situate along beachfront caution big strong surf day

Content: Seminyak beach is always my fav because the flat sand and beautiful waves.  Not as many local sellers wander around as in Kuta.
review: seminyak always fav flat sand beautiful wave many local seller wander around kuta

Content: Too many tourists and people selling you things every 10min... Not recomended for a nap... You wont sleep much ^^

Content: not great for surfing..quiet place to relax.. I prefer Kuta (More people around) beach when it comes to surfing.
review: great surfingquiet place relax prefer kuta people around come surf

Content: At first I was not expecting too much as I am more of a swimmer than a surfer. Turns out renting a body surf board and just playing with the waves like the kids. Nice waves and water is not too deep.
review: first expect much swimmer surfer turn rent body surf board play wave kid nice wave water deep

Content: I think a solution to the pollution running into the beach needs to be addressed. At times the beach really smells of sewage.
review: think solution pollution run need address time really smell sewage

Content: Grabbed 2 beds and a umbrella from one of the many available. Paid 100k idr each which is double what we paid in Legian. Same sand same sea and surf but less crowded. Beer available from beach guy at 30k idr with stubby holder. Nice day had.
review: grab 2 bed umbrella one many available pay 100k idr double pay legian sand sea surf less crowded beer available guy 30k idr stubby holder nice day

Content: pleasant beach but it was just after they had a king tide come through so not much of the sand to be seen
review: pleasant king tide come much sand see

Content: Great place to come to relax enjoy a drink and watch the sunset. Numerous places to sit. I like the comfortable beanbags. Very casual relaxed atmosphere. Good for couples, families or in groups. Very inexpensive.
review: great place come relax enjoy drink watch sunset numerous place sit comfortable beanbag casual relaxed atmosphere good couple family group inexpensive

Content: Had lunch at one of the restaurants on the beach which was ok. Obviously not suitable for swimming or really small children because of the waves which are used predominantly by surfers

Content: It was the nearest beach to the villa I rented it. Around Bali there are many beautiful  or passable . If you want to practice surf  they are suited to many  at south of the island .
review: near villa rent around bali many beautiful passable want practice surf suit many south island

Content: This is a great stretch of beach. Pretty clean and lots of great bars and restaurants if you walk back towards the airport. Well worth a visit. Good local food vendors at the end of the carpark catering to locals but happy to feed the hoards as well.
review: great stretch pretty clean lot great bar restaurant walk back towards airport well worth visit good local food vendor end carpark catering local happy feed hoard well

Content: Clean and nice beach with coarse sand. Good for surfing, not too good to swim. A lot of nice places to get a fresh fruit juice at an amazing price. I enjoyed sunsets on the beach.
review: clean nice coarse sand good surfing good swim lot nice place fresh fruit juice amazing price enjoy sunset

Content: Last day in Bali spent the afternoon at the beach. Few Bintangs and we hired a few body boards $5 aud each for unlimited use. Kids absolutely loved it. Wish we had spent more time there
review: last day bali spent afternoon bintangs hire body board 5 aud unlimited use kid absolutely love wish spent time

Content: Seminyak Beach was a great place to remember . It was a very broad view of the scenic beauty all around & beautiful sun set to watch with many colours of the sky...really unforgettable ...loved it....
review: seminyak great place remember broad view scenic beauty around beautiful sun set watch many colour skyreally unforgettable love

Content: So much rubbish on the sand here :(  not pretty.  There is also a construction site there atm  which makes it noisy and smelly.  Great market food though and lots of palm squirrels!
review: much rubbish sand pretty construction site atm make noisy smelly great market food though lots palm squirrel

Content: By Australian standards Seminyak beach is not the most beautiful beach you will see, in fact far from it.  The sand is grey and not attractive.  If there has been rain or storms there is rubbish on the beach.  The atmosphere in the afternoon and evening though is great with lots of beachfront bars, colourful bean bags and music.  Surf looked great but quite scary.  Not sure about the water quality but have been told it's not that clean.
review: australian standard seminyak beautiful will see fact far sand grey attractive rain storm rubbish atmosphere afternoon even though great lot beachfront bar colourful bean bag music surf look great quite scary sure water quality tell clean

Content: Strong waves and currents so be careful when coming with kids! Best area is around La Plancha Beach Bar and Restaurant! Nice ambiance for sunset!
review: strong wave current careful come kid best area around la plancha bar restaurant nice ambiance sunset

Content: Nice beach. It had rained for a few days when we first arrived so the beach was not great. Once the weather cleared the beach was less polluted and better for swimming.
review: nice rain day first arrive great weather clear less polluted well swimming

Content: Firstly. Bali beaches are not a patch on beaches in Esperance Western Australia. Or even most Aussie Beaches for that matter. Now having said that it nice to sit and watch a sunset and drink a cold Bintang on the beach. And yes rubbish regularly washes up from Java with the water currents and on bad days they get tractors in to clean the beach. But in general a must thing to do is sit and relax and enjoy your holiday.
review: firstly bali beach patch beach esperance western australia even aussie beach matter now say nice sit watch sunset drink cold bintang yes rubbish regularly wash java water current bad day tractor clean general must thing sit relax enjoy holiday

Content: The public beach is nice and there are a variety of restaurants!  You seem to need to purchase something to get a chair - but you can bring your own blanket and rest on the beach for free!
review: public nice variety restaurant seem need purchase something chair bring blanket rest free

Content: Nice beach on Bali with many top Hotels lining it. Friendly locals on the beach selling things and teaching you to surf.
review: nice bali many top hotel line friendly local sell thing teach surf

Content: A MUST IN BALI!Beautiful sunsets, clean beach and awesome vibe, with great bars and restaurants on the beach front. Another thing the waves is also nice. Good timing to come here around 5 pm. Bring along your mat and swimwears. Love this beach!
review: must balibeautiful sunset clean awesome vibe great bar restaurant front another thing wave nice good timing come around 5 pm bring along mat swimwear love

Content: Great beach day and night .Really good experience to walk along before sunset and find a good spot to sit and have a drink or two whilst looking at the  sun going down .Everyone goes down to the beach on a Sunday night to see the sunset , all the locals aswell as tourists and in the Indonesian school holidays it is jammed pack .Make sure you organize a good meeting spot if meeting up with friends as wifi and telephone reception is sometimes impossible to receive on the beach at busy times .Enjoy the beach its fabulous
review: great day night really good experience walk along sunset find good spot sit drink two whilst look sun go everyone go sunday night see sunset local aswell tourist indonesian school holiday jam pack make sure organize good meeting spot meeting friend wifi telephone reception sometimes impossible receive busy time enjoy fabulous

Content: The water is lovely and warm and the photos posted show a beach paradise with gorgeous sunsets.  There is no question that Bali does have places like this but the shoreline from Kuta all the way up to Canggu has a terrible rubbish problem which comes off the streets and out via the streams.  I do not want to bag Bali as we have had a lovely time and the locals are amazing but do not come to Bali thinking it is pristine clean. I am not joking when I say you should make sure you have had your tetanus and Hep A shots if you plan on surfing or playing around the beach.  Bali is not unique, and this problem can be found all around SE Asia but it does not make it right.  If you are into surfing be prepared for the busy spots at peak holiday times.
review: water lovely warm photo post show paradise gorgeous sunset question bali place shoreline kuta way canggu terrible rubbish problem come street via stream want bag bali lovely time local amaze come bali think pristine clean joke say make sure tetanus hep shot plan surf play around bali unique problem find around se asia make right surfing prepared busy spot peak holiday time

Content: Nice and clean beach with good restaurants and bars.Not recommended for swimming due to strong waves. Great for surfing and sunbathing.
review: nice clean good restaurant barsnot recommend swimming due strong wave great surf sunbathing

Content: This beach is not clean at all. The best beaches I have been to are in Esperance WA and the Whitsundays in Qld so I guess I have been spoiled. It's definitely  worth seeing for the culture though. Lots of places to eat, bands to listen to and things to do.
review: clean best beach esperance wa whitsundays qld guess spoil definitely worth see culture though lots place eat band listen thing

Content: Easy for commuters, safe place for children to play , and many restaurant . I recommend to come to Sate Bali Seminyak at Kayu Aya Village, the food there was very great and nice service, Best for lunch and especially dinner after having a great time at the beach :)
review: easy commuter safe place child play many restaurant recommend come sate bali seminyak kayu aya village food great nice service best lunch especially dinner great time

Content: After taking hotel transfer to beach we were disgusted with the amount of rubbish lying around.  Beach actually closed for swimming!  Unfortunately local people do not appreciate how they are destroying their beautiful island with their (mainly plastic bag) rubbish.
review: take hotel transfer disgust amount rubbish lie around actually close swim unfortunately local people appreciate destroy beautiful island mainly plastic bag rubbish

Content: the beach was beautiful and easy to find nearest restaurant there, I recomended you to come to Sate Bali Restauran in Kayu Aya Village (near Flea Market) the food and treat was amazing, the JOGLO concept and wooden view are amazing...
review: beautiful easy find near restaurant recomended come sate bali restauran kayu aya village near flea market food treat amaze joglo concept wooden view amaze

Content: Nice beach to watch the sunset, good surfing with some giant barrel's. On low tide the beach side restaurants and bars spill out onto the beach with beanbags, table's, umbrella's and sunbeds. Nice for a cold drink and a cool vibe but it gets very crowded.Watch out for several smelly stormwater/sewage? outlets that spill over the beach on the way to the ocean.
review: nice watch sunset good surfing giant barrel low tide side restaurant bar spill onto beanbag table umbrellas sunbeds nice cold drink cool vibe get crowdedwatch several smelly stormwatersewage outlet spill way ocean

Content: Seminyak beach itself is a gorgeous beach - wide clean beach with rolling surf (of various degrees).  It is bordered by big name hotels and restaurants, and some smaller places.  Sunset is gorgeous - morning is beautiful.
review: seminyak gorgeous wide clean roll surf various degree border big name hotel restaurant small place sunset gorgeous morning beautiful

Content: A MUST IN BALI.Beautiful sunsets and awesome vibe, with great bars and restaurants on the beach front.Go to La Plancha, great music amazing Tapas topped with nice drinks and comfy bean bags to chill on and watch the sunset.
review: must balibeautiful sunset awesome vibe great bar restaurant frontgo la plancha great music amaze tapa top nice drink comfy bean bag chill watch sunset

Content: This beach is not as nice as Sanur beach and it is very hard to access without going through one of the major hotels along the beach as there is limited access points.
review: nice sanur hard access without go one major hotel along limited access point

Content: Good swells for surf enthusiasts. Walking distances to eateries and shops along multiple points in Seminyak.
review: good swell surf enthusiast walk distance eatery shop along multiple point seminyak

Content: Confession: I only went there for the sunset, so don't know how it looks or how busy it is during daytime. For the sunset, it was not very busy, but there were enough people there not to make it feel deserted. Colorful restaurants with a lot of beanbags are there to enjoy the sunset from. I particularly enjoyed the walk on the beach away from the cafes after it got a bit dark.
review: confession go sunset dont know look busy daytime sunset busy enough people make feel desert colorful restaurant lot beanbag enjoy sunset particularly enjoy walk away cafes get bit dark

Content: We lived spending time here both for swimming as well as having a party at night. Try to ignore the ever present traders or chat to them to find out about their lives ... . They are always friendly. The best time is at sunset when ons can sip cocktails and listen to live music
review: lived spending time swim well party night try ignore present trader chat find life always friendly best time sunset ons sip cocktail listen live music

Content: This beach is lovely, but very crowded! If you want to sit around with many other tourists and locals, this is the place for you!
review: lovely crowd want sit around many tourist local place

Content: Seminyak beach is great for renting a beach chair for the afternoon and lying back. Drinks can be purchased at the many beach shack Cafes along the beach. Enjoy the warmth in the middle of the Australian winter! 😊
review: seminyak great rent chair afternoon lie back drink purchase many shack cafe along enjoy warmth middle australian winter

Content: We're staying at the W, so I can only speak of the beach around that area. I noticed some small "rivers" coming from hotels that kids were playing in, walked through it and realized it was sewage. Pretty gross and made me not want to be on the beach anymore. I'm not sure why anyone would think that was okay! People swim in there, gross all around. The sand is black from volcanoes, which is pretty cool to me. The waves were thrashing and not safe at all to get it, but pretty to look at. Also, it's pretty annoying to have people always trying to sell you something. I get people need to make money, but no one even carries money when they are swimming and if they do, they're not wanting to buy cheap stuff like that. Maybe get better stuff and be more subtle.
review: stay w speak around area notice small river come hotel kid play walk realize sewage pretty gross make want anymore im sure anyone think okay people swim gross around sand black volcano pretty cool wave thrash safe pretty look pretty annoy people always try sell something people need make money one even carry money swim theyre want buy cheap stuff maybe well stuff subtle

Content: The beach was really dirty when we were there. I'm not sure why they don't pay people to cleanup the beachfront, even the hotels don't clean up in their beaches out front.
review: really dirty im sure dont pay people cleanup beachfront even hotel dont clean beach front

Content: We have visited Seminyak beach twice - and have been twice too often! We are spoiled  with pristine white sand beaches at home - so the black volcanic sand just doesnt do it for us - further the sand is all hard packed down, and the ocean regularly claims victims .To top it off it is crowded with sun loving drunkards and locals selling all manner of tourist targeted products/services.
review: visit seminyak twice twice often spoiled pristine white sand beach home black volcanic sand doesnt u sand hard pack ocean regularly claim victim top crowd sun loving drunkard local sell manner tourist target productsservices

Content: Seminyak beach is great for a morning stroll or for lazing with a book at La Lucciola,but don't go with the expectation that it will take your breath away.It's pretty in an understated way but not a once-in-a-lifetime beach experience.
review: seminyak great morning stroll laze book la lucciolabut dont go expectation will take breath awayits pretty understated way onceinalifetime experience

Content: Nice beach, better than Seminyak itself. Can find a quiet place away from others. Watch for dangerous currents.
review: nice well seminyak find quiet place away others watch dangerous current

Content: Please be careful at this beach, we saw two people being rescued.Great surf, both watching and partaking in surfing. There were two rivers of raw sewage running into the ocean up the beach - the absolutely stink.
review: please careful saw two people rescuedgreat surf watch partake surf two river raw sewage run ocean absolutely stink

Content: Gawjus beach to go for a stroll  clean  very picturesque fantastic sunset well worth a visit for a stroll or a swim
review: gawjus go stroll clean picturesque fantastic sunset well worth visit stroll swim

Content: Enjoyed getting away as we were able to get get BC flights and the CourtYard Marriott for a great price, but although the hotel was lovely, its more for families no quite areas.  It rained 4 out of the 6 days.  The beach spot for the hotel is too far away nea The Library on Seminyak beach.  Bali used to rain then a couple of hours and then its fine, not the case anymore. I have to say all the prices have gone up, but its still a great place.   Massages are still dirt cheap, together with Taxi and all in all the food is really of a high standard.  Plus no sickness at all.  I love Bali so in kind og bias as ive been going for so many years.  Seminyak is great shopping food and accommodation, what more can you ask for? Well nice weather would have been nice ...happy holidays!
review: enjoy get away able bc flight courtyard marriott great price although hotel lovely family quite area rain 4 6 day spot hotel far away nea library seminyak bali use rain couple hour fine case anymore say price go still great place massage still dirt cheap together taxi food really high standard plus sickness love bali kind og bias ive go many year seminyak great shopping food accommodation ask well nice weather nice happy holiday

Content: We went yesterday at the public beach, via the Ku De Ta beach club. The sand is nice, the beach is clean, the chairs for relaxing in the sun are ok, bring your own towels and sit back enjoy the ocean. The water was perfect, hot , cool waves, had a lot of fun in the water. A perfect day at the beach. There are a lot of comerciants coming by, asking if you want to buy all kinds of things, fruits, watches, scarves, etc. Enjoy!
review: go yesterday public via ku de ta club sand nice clean chair relax sun ok bring towel sit back enjoy ocean water perfect hot cool wave lot fun water perfect day lot comerciants come ask want buy kind thing fruit watch scarf etc enjoy

Content: I'm not sure how this beach only gets four stars! Sure it's not an Australian beach but it's beautiful in its own right. A great way to walk from one location to another, always something to look at from the peanut seller, to the people hawking their wares (almost always politely), the beachside bars and restaurants, kids and families enjoying the water, day beds to settle in for the long haul of a tough day at the beach, people fishing and completely glorious sunsets.
review: im sure get four star sure australian beautiful right great way walk one location another always something look peanut seller people hawk ware almost always politely beachside bar restaurant kid family enjoy water day bed settle long haul tough day people fish completely glorious sunset

Content: Lovely beach which is clean and well-maintained. Great vibe at the bars/hotels on the edge of the beach. Sunsets are stunning! Watch out in the hotels ... drinks are pricey!
review: lovely clean wellmaintained great vibe barshotels edge sunset stun watch hotel drink pricey

Content: Along the beach, there are many cafe with the live music and you can relax with your family and friends watching the sun goes down...oh...so happy
review: along many cafe live music relax family friend watch sun go downohso happy

Content: The beach is long and is great for a walkAnd superb for sunset. Of course it would be better without the sellers. If you walk south a couple of km you will be in Kuta which is full of annoying sellers. The more north you head you find great bars and restaurants on the beach.The long rolling waves are exquisite and it is no wonder it is famous for surfing. There are many rips which make swimming dangerous. Great to be in a hotel or bar overlooking this beach.
review: long great walkand superb sunset course well without seller walk south couple km will kuta full annoy seller north head find great bar restaurant beachthe long roll wave exquisite wonder famous surf many rip make swim dangerous great hotel bar overlooking

Content: I enjoyed a walk along the beach , I was surprised how clean it was as when I was there previously in january a few years ago it was full of rubbish .
review: enjoy walk along surprised clean previously january year ago full rubbish

Content: First time on the beach after the rain, clean and lots of great waves. Hired sun beds from a beautiful family. Fresh coconut milk, massage and manicure..heaven the beach vendors were not too pushy either
review: first time rain clean lot great wave hire sun bed beautiful family fresh coconut milk massage manicureheaven vendor pushy either

Content: nothing like the australian beaches - quite dirty - maybe from the high tides - shopping strip was good
review: nothing australian beach quite dirty maybe high tide shop strip good

Content: One of the most beautiful sunsets I've ever seen. Gorgeous beach with flawless views and lovely atmosphere
review: one beautiful sunset ive see gorgeous flawless view lovely atmosphere

Content: Fantastic surfing lessons with Made.  The children really excelled and were so happy.  Will return for more lessons and fun.
review: fantastic surfing lesson make child really excel happy will return lesson fun

Content: My favourite part of the holiday was sitting on the beach watching the magical sunsets.  Various bars line the beach, most have live music and excellent food.It was amazing!
review: favourite part holiday sit watch magical sunset various bar line live music excellent foodit amazing

Content: Manage to get a seat at 11am on tue morning. dont take reservations so do go early. food is good ordered the eggs bennedict and wrap, didnt like polenta fries though very bland? the juices are ok coffee soso, go for food instead
review: manage seat 11am tue morning dont take reservation go early food good order egg bennedict wrap didnt polenta fry though bland juice ok coffee soso go food instead

Content: This beach has great surf and plenty of sun lounges for sale at a hefty price unless you are prepared to bargain. I'm unsure of the water quality but it was warm without being a bath.  Don't come here expecting white sands and blue water as you will be terribly disappointed. The tide was strong so I'm not sure I would take young children here.  There does not seem to be lifeguards around.  I guess I am spoiled by having some of the best beaches in the world at my doorstep in Australia. Anyhow, the surfers seemed to enjoy it.
review: great surf plenty sun lounge sale hefty price unless prepared bargain im unsure water quality warm without bath dont come expect white sand blue water will terribly disappointed tide strong im sure take young child seem lifeguard around guess spoil best beach world doorstep australia anyhow surfer seem enjoy

Content: This is a huge beach with a great selection of bars and surf board rentals. The waves are great for surfers or those who just wish to chill out. Sun beds and parasols can be rented cheaply. Sarong and souvenir sellers are a little tiresome. Pollution is a massive problem, especially during the rainy season. There is a sign that says it is a 'natural phenomenon', which is a complete lie. The rubbish is because of inadequate trash collection infrastructure and poor education and awareness about littering. Hopefully the situation will improve given recent campaigns on the island.
review: huge great selection bar surf board rental wave great surfer wish chill sun bed parasol rent cheaply sarong souvenir seller little tiresome pollution massive problem especially rainy season sign say natural phenomenon complete lie rubbish inadequate trash collection infrastructure poor education awareness litter hopefully situation will improve give recent campaign island

Content: Seminyak attracts the higher end client with the larger resorts. But I find the beach to be dirty and smelly due the many creeks that flow into the ocean there. Nearby Legian in much cleaner.
review: seminyak attract high end client large resort find dirty smelly due many creek flow ocean nearby legian much cleaner

Content: Every second person we passed were trying to sell us surfing lessons or deck chairs. I understand they are trying to make a living but I guess if you are looking for a relaxing stroll, this is not the place. Sand looked abit dirty and grey as well (maybe it was the weather? Was overcast). Otherwise, saw some big waves and people surfing. Wouldn't advise little ones. Lots of restaurants etc as well but they were closed when we were there (afternoon).
review: every second person pass try sell u surf lesson deck chair understand try make living guess look relax stroll place sand look abit dirty grey well maybe weather overcast saw big wave people surf wouldnt advise little one lot restaurant etc well closed afternoon

Content: So much fun to watch the goings on. Surfing for learners, easy peasy, lessons and boards available for rent beachside.Grab a beanbag at a bar 5.00pm onwards to watch the sunset and the kites flying overhead.  Whatever the roving vendors try and sell you offer less than half, to get to halfway. They will come down as you go up. Enjoy the bargaining and don't be mean.
review: much fun watch going surf learner easy peasy lesson board available rent beachsidegrab beanbag bar 500pm onwards watch sunset kit fly overhead whatever rove vendor try sell offer less half halfway will come go enjoy bargaining dont mean

Content: During low tide this beach is great for the kids to play. You still have to be cautious though... we enjoyed lounging in our sun chairs while the kids collected shells and played.
review: low tide great kid play still cautious though enjoyed lounge sun chair kid collect shell play

Content: Seminyak has become overdeveloped like Kuta and Legain.  It's good for shopping, watching sunset and spending time a bars& cafes.  There are nicer beaches in the north west corner of Bali.  The beaches a bit further away are a lot nice
review: seminyak become overdeveloped kuta legain good shopping watch sunset spending time bar cafes nice beach north west corner bali beach bite away lot nice

Content: A lil bit far away from main street. About 15-20 mins drive from Sunset Rd depend on traffict.But it worth when you can catch sunset thereNot as hustle bustle as Kuta Beach
review: lil bit far away main street 1520 min drive sunset rd depend traffictbut worth catch sunset therenot hustle bustle kuta

Content: We went for a stroll before sunset, so maybe we missed the key feature of this beach. We liked the setting, nice sand and we didn't noticed anything dirty, as reported by other reviewers. Zero approaches from beach vendors. Nice little temple in the back, which unfortunately we were not able to visit for inappropriate clothing.  Bars are everywhere: nothing uber-neat, just comfortable beanbags and lounge chairs. Rentals and surfing lessons. Overall, nice beach, seen better.
review: go stroll sunset maybe miss key feature like setting nice sand didnt notice anything dirty report reviewer zero approach vendor nice little temple back unfortunately able visit inappropriate clothing bar everywhere nothing uberneat comfortable beanbag lounge chair rental surf lesson overall nice see well

Content: Quite a rough beach even during low tide. If you're looking for calm beaches then head to Sanur. This one is for the surfers.
review: quite rough even low tide youre look calm beach head sanur one surfer

Content: Nice and clean. Not too busy, beach chairs as lottery- 1st day for 4 we paid 300k, next day 150K. Try to stay in same place, same fella so will get better price. Lifeguard was on duty , waves too big- telling to everyone get out from water- Perfect.
review: nice clean busy chair lottery 1st day 4 pay 300k next day 150k try stay place fella will better price lifeguard duty wave big tell everyone water perfect

Content: Variety of eateries and bars catering for all tastes and budgets. Sunset viewing from the bean bags probably a must do - but was peeing down the night we attempted - so viewed from a bar/restaurant with bintang in hand!
review: variety eatery bar cater taste budget sunset view bean bag probably must pee night attempt view barrestaurant bintang hand

Content: Stunning beach and perfect place to start a walk from Seminyak all the way to Kuta if your up for it or the other way around. Takes about an hour to get from Legian to Seninyak at a reasonably slow pace enjoying the surroundings which include locals playing soccer, lanterns, bean bags, musicians, beach bar after beach bar and many many other things to see and take it all in.
review: stun perfect place start walk seminyak way kuta way around take hour legian seninyak reasonably slow pace enjoy surroundings include local play soccer lantern bean bag musician bar bar many many thing see take

Content: Very big and lively bech. Huge waves, perfect for surfers. You can hire surf lessons and gear every 10 meter. Lots of places to have a drink in the fantastic sunsets. Nice mixture of locals, tourists, dogs and everything else!
review: big lively bech huge wave perfect surfer hire surf lesson gear every 10 meter lot place drink fantastic sunset nice mixture local tourists dog everything

Content: If you are in Seminyak you absolutely must take in the sunset at Seminyak beach. On a clear day the view of the sunset beyond the crashing waves was one of the most beautiful sights I have ever seen. Just be aware, my partner and I went to the beach hoping to sunbathe and learn to surf, neither of which were possible as sunbathing isn't permitted on the majority of the beach (as you would be laid in front of one of the beach-side bars); also the waves are huge so swimming isn't allowed and I wouldn't surf unless you know what you're doing.
review: seminyak absolutely must take sunset seminyak clear day view sunset beyond crash wave one beautiful sight see aware partner go hop sunbathe learn surf neither possible sunbathing isnt permit majority lay front one beachside bar wave huge swim isnt allow wouldnt surf unless know youre

Content: Cool and relaxed beach with a nicer vibe than kuta beach. Still the same amount of merchants but more places with bean bags and music to chill. Waves are more lenghty than kuta as well, though it depends on the time i guess
review: cool relax nice vibe kuta still amount merchant place bean bag music chill wave lenghty kuta well though depends time guess

Content: Best part of the beach was sunset. From our hotel, we could walk for 10 minutes and be in Seminyak beach where all the umbrella/beanbag restaurants were.  (Beanbag beach)  It was definitely pretty to see, and a good place to catch the sunset, but make sure you get a seat in the middle.  We unfortunately got seated in the front beanbag chairs and were harassed by hawkers all evening long.  Made for an unpleasant experience in what would of otherwise been a beautiful sunset experience.
review: best part sunset hotel walk 10 minute seminyak umbrellabeanbag restaurant beanbag definitely pretty see good place catch sunset make sure seat middle unfortunately get seat front beanbag chair harass hawker even long make unpleasant experience beautiful sunset experience

Content: To much dirt unfortunately. But still beautifull because of the heavy waves. Only Oberoi hotel has a nice and clean beachpart!
review: much dirt unfortunately still beautifull heavy wave oberoi hotel nice clean beachpart

Content: We has a very relaxing day on the beach , plenty things to see and watch the world walk by. Nice day highly recommend visiting Seminyak beach ..
review: relax day plenty thing see watch world walk nice day highly recommend visit seminyak

Content: We have been to Bali many times but always stay in Nusa Dua or Ubud. We decided to finally check out Seminyak as it certainly draws some crowds. We entered the beach area and immediately weren't impressed. The beach was dirty and it smelt disgusting like sewerage we didn't even want to take our flip flops off. Having walked only a couple hundred meters we turned around and left the beach to get away from the smell. The furnishings along the beach where also very run down and in need of an upgrade with the beach umbrellas and chairs faded and ripped.
review: bali many time always stay nusa dua ubud decide finally check seminyak certainly draw crowd enter area immediately werent impressed dirty smelt disgust sewerage didnt even want take flip flop walk couple hundred meter turn around leave away smell furnishing along run need upgrade umbrellas chair fade rip

Content: great place to be for sunset, great cafe's, great bands good vibe about this place, pull up a bean bag and just watch the world go bye
review: great place sunset great cafes great band good vibe place pull bean bag watch world go bye

Content: Seminyak beach is wide and the sand is firm, perfect to walk on. Both the beach and the water is clean. However, it is quite big waves, great for surfers but not great for kids.
review: seminyak wide sand firm perfect walk water clean quite big wave great surfer great kid

Content: We went here for tea on a number of occasions as there are heaps of restaurants along the beach to choose. The surf does vary heaps so like any beach to keep an eye on kids and other family members.  There are heaps of hawkers that ply their trade along the beach so just say no and then continue to sip away on that Bintang and they move on!!!
review: go tea number occasion heap restaurant along choose surf vary heap keep eye kid family member heap hawker ply trade along say continue sip away bintang move

Content: So many beach bars and restaurants, all with a great vibe and friendly staff.  Comfy bean bags on the beach, or table and chairs inside the restaurant.  Your choice.
review: many bar restaurant great vibe friendly staff comfy bean bag table chair inside restaurant choice

Content: Seminyak beach is not as crowded as kuta. Definitely a good choice if traveler want a less crowded and not noisy beach. There are people that rent beach chair for 200k/hour. Try to negotiate the price, 200k is to expensive especially for domestic tourist. Overall the place is quite good especially at night.
review: seminyak crowd kuta definitely good choice traveler want less crowded noisy people rent chair 200khour try negotiate price 200k expensive especially domestic tourist overall place quite good especially night

Content: This is a typical tourist hot spot beach in Bali.  Hire a longe and watch the world go by, or more likely come to you to purchase everything you may need on the beach, hats, food drinks and even a kite! The waves can be pretty big so take care and don't forget the sunscreen.  Beachside restaurants are many and vary in style and price.
review: typical tourist hot spot bali hire longe watch world go likely come purchase everything may need hat food drink even kite wave pretty big take care dont forget sunscreen beachside restaurant many vary style price

Content: During day not too many hawkers, easier to swim compared to Kuta and surf is great for learners. At nighttime the place is surreal and you get incredible food and pictures as it turns into an Ibiza with a sea of beanbags, musicians, and food and booze.
review: day many hawker easier swim compare kuta surf great learner nighttime place surreal incredible food picture turn ibiza sea beanbag musician food booze

Content: The beach is extremely long. The wave is so strong that it's twice as high as an adult height. Should be a good place for surfing. A nice spot to see sunset. We saw a couple taking pre-wedding shoot on the beach. Probably not private enough for sun bathing. Not is a safe place for leisure swimming due to the strong wave. Sand looks pretty dark but feel soft and powdery on feet.
review: extremely long wave strong twice high adult height good place surf nice spot see sunset saw couple take prewedding shoot probably private enough sun bath safe place leisure swim due strong wave sand look pretty dark feel soft powdery foot

Content: Great place to say goodnight to the sun after a sunny hot day..sitting in bean bags listening to live music, sipping on cold cocktails and beer feeling like the world you left behind is miles away....
review: great place say goodnight sun sunny hot daysitting bean bag listen live music sip cold cocktail beer feeling world leave behind mile away

Content: The beach is relatively quiet with lots of room to walk and occasional places to eat or just sit and have a drink. The sea is generally safe.
review: relatively quiet lot room walk occasional place eat sit drink sea generally safe

Content: Great location close by many amenities in Seminyak. Worth a visit especially if you like a surf. Nice sand to relax on and certainly worth a paddle.
review: great location close many amenity seminyak worth visit especially surf nice sand relax certainly worth paddle

Content: Great to relax in the evening to watch sunsets whilst enjoying a meal or having a drink.Most offer entertainment and really large beanbags to slouch in.You will be bombarded by people selling trinkets but they soon move on if you don't pay any attention.
review: great relax even watch sunset whilst enjoy meal drinkmost offer entertainment really large beanbag slouch inyou will bombard people sell trinket soon move dont pay attention

Content: great views for a great sunset.....very colourful with all the lounges and umbrellas and the music is good too...sit back and relax with a cocktail and watch the sun go down...magicial
review: great view great sunsetvery colourful lounge umbrellas music good toosit back relax cocktail watch sun go downmagicial

Content: The seminyak beach is one of he best in Bali for surfing lovers , sunsets lovers and beach side restaurant lovers ! The water is tho' not clear and clean for a bath but still better than many beaches in Bali .
review: seminyak one best bali surf lover sunset lover side restaurant lover water tho clear clean bath still well many beach bali

Content: Its hard to get to from the main road, unless you want to walk through Potato Head (careful as your water is taken off you)
review: hard main road unless want walk potato head careful water take

Content: Had a hard time finding the entrance to the beach from the main road as the resorts were lining the stretch between the road and the beach. No clear signages for us to locate entrance as well. We finally backtracked for 4 mins and found a small entrance through Ke De Ta. Coconut was very fresh and cooling which was a big plus for a hot afternoon. But sunbed had to be haggled with the vendors (there were many of them along the beach) and we got a pair of beds at 50,000IDR for an hour. The beach was clean and nice to walk along the edge of the waves along the shoreline. It wasn't too crowded and was overall an enjoyable experience! would go back again
review: hard time find entrance main road resort line stretch road clear signages u locate entrance well finally backtrack 4 min find small entrance ke de ta coconut fresh cooling big plus hot afternoon sunbed haggled vendor many along get pair bed 50000idr hour clean nice walk along edge wave along shoreline wasnt crowd overall enjoyable experience go back

Content: Pity the beach is  not clean with a lot of Rubbish some no doubt caused by the storm but there appears that'd the locals make no effort to tidy it up !!
review: pity clean lot rubbish doubt cause storm appear thatd local make effort tidy

Content: The beach at Seminyak is gorgeous. Not nearly as noisy or busy as Kuta beach and offers all that and more. The waves there are more gentle and the water seems warmer. Sun beds and umbrellas are available for renting. The beach is broad and sandy and sandy and stretches for many km's in either direction.
review: seminyak gorgeous nearly noisy busy kuta offer wave gentle water seem warm sun bed umbrellas available rent broad sandy sandy stretch many kms either direction

Content: Coloured beanbags & umbrellas line the sand, The food at the restaurants on the beach is wonderful, a great place to kick back, unwind with a drink and enjoy stunning sunsets.
review: colour beanbag umbrellas line sand food restaurant wonderful great place kick back unwind drink enjoy stun sunset

Content: When you walk onto the main beach of Kuta, Legain or Seminyak they all offer similar things, beach lounges, cold beer & umbrellas but the exception is Seminyak it has more atmosphere with a lot of eateries along the beach.Ps. A great way to walk between Kuta, Legian & Semiyan is along the beach or the back streets close to the beach.
review: walk onto main kuta legain seminyak offer similar thing lounge cold beer umbrella exception seminyak atmosphere lot eatery along beachps great way walk kuta legian semiyan along back street close

Content: with all the hundreds of millions of dollars that come  into Bali surely they could upgrade the most filthiest, vile, disgusting toilets that we have ever been into, they probably a hundred years old and have never been cleaned and they have the cheek to charge you   lift your game Indonesia
review: hundred million dollar come bali surely upgrade filthy vile disgust toilet probably hundred year old never clean cheek charge lift game indonesia

Content: I'm here now on the beach in Seminyak chilling listening to the waves. The beach is very relaxed with plenty of beds to choose from. It costs about £10 for 2 beds for the day and a btl of water is about 50p. There is plenty of food places along the beach to grab a snack, they are OK for a sandwich and drink.The sea at the moment is quite rough so be careful, the waves don't look that big but when your underneath it, it's a very different story. It is however very warm so that's a plus point. If you want to learn to surf you can do which also is cheap. The people along the beach are very friendly and we had a foot massage yesterday from Kitty who was very good, she painted my toe nails very nice also. There is lots of sellers down the beach, they mean no harm just trying to earn a living they all have hats with their names on and some stuff is ok what they are selling. I like this place because everyone is welcome and nobody cares what you look like. It's not like Cancun where you have to make an effort to go to the beach. At night the beach bars have live music where you can watch the sunset, very relaxing.❤️

Content: The beach is great except for the plastic! The beach guys do as much as they can to clear it up after the tides gone out but there's still so much. People should be soley employed to clean the beach and take the rubbish away. Helpful for the environment and it would provide employment.?With the amount of revenue that Bali is receiving from tourism, it's time for the Indonesian government to step up on the waste problem. The sea around Bali is heavily polluted with plastic. We saw three dead turtles whilst travelling in Indonesia, and were informed that the most common cause of a turtles premature death in those waters in due to ingesting plastic. Seminyak beach is covered in tiny pieces of plastic and polystyrene which ends up in marine life's stomachs. Which is wonderful for the local people who rely on fish for protein. We spoke to many fishermen who are outraged by this horrendous rubbish problem in the ocean. Playing in the waves you feel rubbish brushing past you and it's just not pleasant. One day we didn't even go in the sea as there was so much rubbish! There needs to be recycling facilities that are readily available and free for hotels in Seminyak and all of Bali. We saw local people raiding bins outside hotels for plastic bottles and cans, surely these could at least be left out for them!? We couldn't even find anywhere in Seminyak where we could refill our plastic water bottles. Human waste is also released into the sea all around Bali via the sewer pipes that go down the beach and out to sea.Also watch the current at Seminyak beach. Great for us surfing and body boarding but we also saw three separate occasions where life guards had to rescue people who had been taken out by the current. Great fun in the big waves but just be careful.
review: great except plastic guy much clear tide go there still much people soley employed clean take rubbish away helpful environment provide employmentwith amount revenue bali receive tourism time indonesian government step waste problem sea around bali heavily pollute plastic saw three dead turtle whilst travel indonesia inform common cause turtle premature death water due ingest plastic seminyak cover tiny piece plastic polystyrene end marine lifes stomach wonderful local people rely fish protein speak many fisherman outrage horrendous rubbish problem ocean play wave feel rubbish brushing past pleasant one day didnt even go sea much rubbish need recycle facility readily available free hotel seminyak bali saw local people raid bin outside hotel plastic bottle can surely least left couldnt even find anywhere seminyak refill plastic water bottle human waste release sea around bali via sewer pipe go seaalso watch current seminyak great u surf body board saw three separate occasion life guard rescue people take current great fun big wave careful

Content: We stayed for 5 days at The Royal Beach Resort in Seminyak and it was absolutely perfect for us.  The area is very beautiful, the beaches are lovely and the water warm but very rough.  No swimming for 5 days but you could go in the surf and play close to shore.  It is quite touristy which we did not like...crowded, lots of people trying to sell you stuff all the time...whenever we left our resort, we were inundated with offers from vendors.  However our resort was like a slice of paradise...quiet, secluded, charming, authentic Balinese culture and food.

Content: he beach is 3 minutes walk from the villa and an early morning walk is a great way to start the  day- before the stresses of massages and swimming and reading!
