Content: its very dirty lots of people pestering you if i had children would not let their feet touch the floor
review: dirty lot people pester child let foot touch floor

Content: This beach could be great with a little care and attention. There are several beach bars at night where you can enjoy live music, however some of the acts compete to be heard and if sitting in one bar the sound of that bars entertainers can be drowned out by the musicians of the bar next door. Also the beach could do with a bit of a tidy up. Beds charged at 100,000 IDR for two which you can try to negotiate as it works out to be abt £8.00 and you can get a meal for two for that price.
review: great little care attention several bar night enjoy live music act compete heard sit one bar sound bar entertainer drown musician bar next door bit tidy bed charge 100000 idr two try negotiate work abt 800 meal two price

Content: Great Cantina just up from W resort . Cheap drinks and food . The food is also really good  . Hire a lounge for 50000 for as long as you like . The beach itself is a little dangerous so be careful . Strong currents can drag you around . A little dirty at low tide . Alot of plastic and other rubbish on the beach . Great for the Bali sunsets as well . Great fun , but be careful in the water.
review: great cantina w resort cheap drink food food really good hire lounge 50000 long little dangerous careful strong current drag around little dirty low tide alot plastic rubbish great bali sunset well great fun careful water

Content: Seminyak beach is a nice Long clean beach with many restaurants and bars along the beach. You can rent out loungers and umbrellas for a modest cost for the day. The sand is a dark Colour but clean. You will find many locals selling their products along the beach ranging from coconuts to art to kites. In the evening a number of the bars and restaurants put out chairs so you can dine on the beach itself. There is quite a strong current and strong waves at parts of the beach so some care is needed and close supervision of children.
review: seminyak nice long clean many restaurant bar along rent lounger umbrellas modest cost day sand dark colour clean will find many local sell product along range coconut art kit even number bar restaurant put chair dine quite strong current strong wave part care need close supervision child

Content: Totally loved my surfin. For beginners and intermediates this is a perfect spot to learn and improve.
review: totally loved surfin beginner intermediate perfect spot learn improve

Content: Surf beach. Little bit dirty. Nothing special and wasn't worth making a special trip for. If you stayed next door to the beach u might visit
review: surf little bit dirty nothing special wasnt worth make special trip stay next door u might visit

Content: Myself and my girlfriend were expecting a pristine white beach with a couple of cool bars, so we were slightly disappointed. More of a mediterranean style Spanish beach with sometime pretty awful live music at every bar during the night (which is played on individual stages with massive speakers so you can't really have a nice chilled conversation). Not what we expected it to be - if you want a chilled out paradise vibe, Gili Trawangan is an absolute must.
review: girlfriend expect pristine white couple cool bar slightly disappointed mediterranean style spanish sometime pretty awful live music every bar night play individual stage massive speaker cant really nice chill conversation expect want chill paradise vibe gili trawangan absolute must

Content: Fruit, drinks, pedicures, manicures, hair braiding, relaxing, shopping, reading, sleeping, in the shade, in the sun.... Etc.Wonderful!
review: fruit drink pedicure manicure hair braid relax shop read sleep shade sun etcwonderful

Content: I didnt like  this beach, looks very dirty .Very bad smell.If u  want  white sands  and blue water this is not  that area!
review: didnt look dirty bad smellif u want white sand blue water area

Content: The beach is rather clean. People come from the temple to the beach on a regular basis for the morning and the evening prayers. The sea is extremely wavy. If you want to go for a swim, be prepeared for a tiring battle. There are life guards present all the time to keep you away from the danger zones.
review: rather clean people come temple regular basis morning even prayer sea extremely wavy want go swim prepeared tiring battle life guard present time keep away danger zone

Content: Visited Seminyak beach for our first day in Bali and was pleasantly surprised by the lack of hawkers and people. Water was beautifully warm with some decent waves for an old bloke. As long as you don't expect pristine white sand you should enjoy the experience!
review: visit seminyak first day bali pleasantly surprised lack hawker people water beautifully warm decent wave old bloke long dont expect pristine white sand enjoy experience

Content: We enjoyed a morning walk along Seminyak Beach but I definitely wouldn't say its one of the nicer ones ive seen in the world. There were many stray dogs and the water was quite dirty. It was fine for a walk though and quite a social experience!
review: enjoy morning walk along seminyak definitely wouldnt say one nicer one ive see world many stray dog water quite dirty fine walk though quite social experience

Content: Beach was ballin. Huge beach with tons of ppl. Lounge chairs available would pay more then $15 CAD for the day.
review: ballin huge ton ppl lounge chair available pay 15 cad day

Content: Bit smelly from the river a little further down flowing into the sea. Tourists are ruining it by littering without care and the lounge chairs are a little more expensive than Kuta beach.
review: bit smelly river little flow sea tourist ruin litter without care lounge chair little expensive kuta

Content: Not the best beaches in the world, Phuket being much much better and not like Boracay with its white sand. I would say it's an ugly beach, but clean and plenty of food along the beach. Also plenty of water activities available, but again not as good as you'd find in Phuket. I don't know why people come to Bali as its overpriced now and even beach side meals in local owned restaurants are around AUD$7-10 a meal, beer about AUD$4-5 a bottle (Phuket equivalent is less than half that). People are nice, and not annoying trying to sell u stuff but not pushy. What it lacks are beach massages like in Phuket, and definitely not as nice. See photos and you'll see what I mean.
review: best beach world phuket much much good boracay white sand say ugly clean plenty food along plenty water activity available good youd find phuket dont know people come bali overprice now even side meal local own restaurant around aud710 meal beer aud45 bottle phuket equivalent less half people nice annoy try sell u stuff pushy lack massage phuket definitely nice see photos youll see mean

Content: Ok so the beach isn't that beautiful. The sand isn't white and the water isn't turquoise like a beach you would find in Australia, however the atmosphere is relaxed, the sunsets are to die for and there are loads of restaurants, bars along the beach, many of which have live music playing and great cocktails. You don't come here for the beauty of the beach as much as you would for the atmosphere. It's lots of fun and worth a visit.
review: ok isnt beautiful sand isnt white water isnt turquoise find australia atmosphere relaxed sunset die load restaurant bar along many live music playing great cocktail dont come beauty much atmosphere lot fun worth visit

Content: Plenty of bars & restaurants along the beach with great views. Popular area with learn to surf schools.Loads of beach lounges for hire. Beach itself is dark sand and locals try to remove rubbish from the area.Good place to park your bum and watch the day go by.
review: plenty bar restaurant along great view popular area learn surf schoolsloads lounge hire dark sand local try remove rubbish areagood place park bum watch day go

Content: The beach at Seminyak is a mix of fun in the water, lazing on the beach (with a cool drink), buying a bargain from the friendly sellers & experiencing the amazing Bali sunset in a comfy chair/beanbag. It's the best! Stay at Pelangi Bali & this beautiful beach is on your doorstep! I've already booked again for later this year..... can't wait! 😎🌴🏄🏻👙🏊🏼🍴👍
review: seminyak mix fun water laze cool drink buy bargain friendly seller experience amazing bali sunset comfy chairbeanbag best stay pelangi bali beautiful doorstep ive already book later year cant wait

Content: Gets very busy on the beach Sundays when the locals come down to play their friendly soccer matches and bring their families for a swim
review: get busy sunday local come play friendly soccer match bring family swim

Content: a good for sunset viewing and just walk through the coastal line.So many good café, bars or just a place to relaxed and unwind yourself.
review: good sunset view walk coastal lineso many good café bar place relaxed unwind

Content: Nothing much but beautiful. There are eating places adjacent to the beach. It's quiet and has beautiful sunrise.
review: nothing much beautiful eating place adjacent quiet beautiful sunrise

Content: Quieter, cleaner and less hawkers than Legian and Kuta beaches. Lots of little beach cafés to stop at for a Bintang or a cool drink
review: quieter clean less hawker legian kuta beach lot little cafés stop bintang cool drink

Content: A very interesting part of Seminyak big waves with beautiful water ideal for swimming or surfing all year round
review: interest part seminyak big wave beautiful water ideal swim surf year round

Content: Purposely avoided Kuta to get away from the crowd, yet not wanting to miss out on the nightlife happenings in Bali... So chose this place to stay instead. Really enjoyed the beanie bags prepared by the beach at night while listening to live bands.
review: purposely avoid kuta away crowd yet want miss nightlife happening bali chose place stay instead really enjoyed beanie bag prepare night listen live band

Content: OK, Liked the fact, most places, that sold food drinks etc, had a decent toilet facilities....  didnt like the sun bed owners, trying "it on"  IE charge what ever price, that suits them. Or you have to batter!!!!!!  Not for a sun lounger..
review: ok like fact place sell food drink etc decent toilet facility didnt sun bed owner try ie charge price suit batter sun lounger

Content: Seminyak beach in front of the Alila Hotel was perfect for walking, running and even for a shallow swim. Lots of activity on  the beach near 6 o clock as people settle to watch the sunset.
review: seminyak front alila hotel perfect walk run even shallow swim lot activity near 6 o clock people settle watch sunset

Content: After hearing some not so pleasant things about Kuta beach, I can't say how happy we were to be close to Seminyak Beach. Very clean, and lots of little spots to chuck a towel down if you want to pay $70,000+ for beach-chairs.
review: hear pleasant thing kuta cant say happy close seminyak clean lot little spots chuck towel want pay 70000 beachchairs

Content: Staying at Seminyak we had 3 options to get to Legian/Kuta; taxi, walk the street or my favourite - walk down and up the beach! Less crowded, cooler and way more enjoyable.  Walk up the beach to Ku De Ta or Potato Head!  And at sunset - listen to live music, sit in a bean bag and sip on some cool drinks!  Perfect way to end the day and start the evening!
review: stay seminyak 3 option legiankuta taxi walk street favourite walk less crowd cooler way enjoyable walk ku de ta potato head sunset listen live music sit bean bag sip cool drink perfect way end day start evening

Content: Went a few times to have a drink as the sun went down, was quite nice to see the sun set and listen to some live music. In terms of the actual beach it was very dirty, lots of rubbish. The surf was very choppy and shallow. Don't swim there unless you're a strong swimmer, make sure to swim between the red and yellow flags, there are lifesavers but they don't seem to pay much attention. Certainly wouldn't allow children to swim unless they were very good swimmers. If you are looking for a clean and beautiful beach this is not the place, go down to the southern beaches (around Uluwatu and nusa dewa). But mind you I am Australian so I am used to some very beautiful beaches!
review: go time drink sun go quite nice see sun set listen live music term actual dirty lot rubbish surf choppy shallow dont swim unless youre strong swimmer make sure swim red yellow flag lifesaver dont seem pay much attention certainly wouldnt allow child swim unless good swimmer look clean beautiful place go southern beach around uluwatu nusa dewa mind australian use beautiful beach

Content: What a beach! We were coming here every day for about 5 last days in a row! Beach boys are always ready to talk nad make for you some great price for the beach chair or Surf rent... And it was not so crowded as Kuta... much more less sellers of sarongs and pedicure services! Surfing was great! And absolutely amazing sunsets with nice cold beer or cocktail on the soft chair with lounge music! Loved this place!
review: come every day 5 last day row boys always ready talk nad make great price chair surf rent crowd kuta much less seller sarongs pedicure service surf great absolutely amaze sunset nice cold beer cocktail soft chair lounge music love place

Content: Was a nice beach to go for a swim and get a cold beer and watch the sun set but i dont rate the beaches as good as the ones we have in Australia.Local people are fantastic and always willing to help out.
review: nice go swim cold beer watch sun set dont rate beach good one australialocal people fantastic always willing help

Content: Great beach especially if you're staying in Seminyak. But it's usually packed during the daytime so if you're looking for a more quiet or secluded beach, this isn't for you. Lots of small bars on the beach serving drinks and hookah. Bean bags and lounge chairs dot the beach. Nice place to spend an afternoon or early evening.
review: great especially youre stay seminyak usually pack daytime youre look quiet seclude isnt lot small bar serve drink hookah bean bag lounge chair dot nice place spend afternoon early evening

Content: Quite strong waves and good fun for a quick swim but definitely not relaxing. After hearing some negative reviews, was pleasantly surprised that the beach was clean and free of litter, but also free of jellyfish, rocks/coral, etc. that can make ocean swimming unpleasant. Really enjoyed the beach!
review: quite strong wave good fun quick swim definitely relax hear negative review pleasantly surprise clean free litter free jellyfish rockscoral etc make ocean swimming unpleasant really enjoy

Content: We ventured down the road to Seminyak beach today and it was lovely. We got there via Ku De Ta (you can park up on the side of the road and walk through) and there were plenty of sun loungers available to rent, people who own them were more than happy to move them into the sun for us. You do have lots of people strolling the beach to sell bits and pieces but they will leave you alone after a smile and a no thank you. Lots of surfing going on but not much swimming due to the big waves. I only went in up to my waist before the tide felt too strong and the waves were crashing around me and didn't feel comfortable going out any further. Lovely clean beach, very friendly people just a shame we couldn't go for a proper swim in the sea but there are plenty more beaches to choose from for that in Bali!
review: venture road seminyak today lovely get via ku de ta park side road walk plenty sun lounger available rent people happy move sun u lots people stroll sell bit piece will leave alone smile thank lot surf go much swimming due big wave go waist tide felt strong wave crash around didnt feel comfortable go lovely clean friendly people shame couldnt go proper swim sea plenty beach choose bali

Content: Evenings are eventful on the beach. U have live music drinks and awesome sunset view. U can stay on the beach for hours and hours. but if You are a vegetarian then food is the problem.
review: evening eventful u live music drink awesome sunset view u stay hour hour vegetarian food problem

Content: Sitting on the bean bag enjoying my bintang beer at night. I took a blur bird taxi from kerobokan about 2km away from my villa to the beach side, there is a minimum charges for 30000 rupiah. Enjoying the music and sea wave.
review: sit bean bag enjoy bintang beer night take blur bird taxi kerobokan 2km away villa side minimum charge 30000 rupiah enjoy music sea wave

Content: Lots of people, i would shy from the famous beaches if possible.Also, many retailers pushing souvenir sales
review: lot people shy famous beach possiblealso many retailer push souvenir sale

Content: I love the beach there were good waves and the water was warm, there was NO undertow so it was safe. The hotel, (Harris) had deck chairs and umbrellas which was good and they provided a towel.
review: love good wave water warm undertow safe hotel harris deck chair umbrellas good provide towel

Content: This is the second night we enjoyed a chilled out dinner on the beach, we've been heading down around 4:30-5ish, kids have time for some fun then dinner on the beach
review: second night enjoy chill dinner weve head around 4305ish kid time fun dinner

Content: We went there on Sunday afternoon and could not bear to stay longer than 5 minutes. It was hectic, loud, hot, uncomfortable and just awful. However today  (wednesday) we walked along the beach from Kuta and landed back there. It was just great to have an ice cold beer, fewer people, reclining chairs, hasty pedicure and beautiful sunset.
review: go sunday afternoon bear stay longer 5 minute hectic loud hot uncomfortable awful today wednesday walk along kuta land back great ice cold beer few people recline chair hasty pedicure beautiful sunset

Content: The beach is overall clean in April, the sea is a great fun to swim in due to the crazy waves. Unfortunately, the whole beach is flooded by local people trying to sell whatever they can sell to you...
review: overall clean april sea great fun swim due crazy wave unfortunately whole flooded local people try sell whatever sell

Content: By far this is one of the good spot at Bali to hang out around the beach. However the wave could be strong some time, that's why you should put attention on how strong the current at that day...
review: far one good spot bali hang around wave strong time thats put attention strong current day

Content: This beach is over 10km long and has sunbeds and small popup bars all along the waterside - the sea and waves are fantastic [watch out for cross swells and surfers] - lots of restaurants to choose from and most have live music on the beach at night - a night to remember
review: 10km long sunbeds small popup bar along waterside sea wave fantastic watch cross swell surfer lot restaurant choose live music night night remember

Content: Less in your face and not so many all night partiers.. Has all the goods: great food, shops, bars and the beach is OK with a reasonable beginners surf break.. Just watch for spontaneous rips.. Cheaper accommodation in the back blocks with easy walking to beach.
review: less face many night partiers good great food shop bar ok reasonable beginner surf break watch spontaneous rip cheap accommodation back block easy walk

Content: Honestly do not even bother going there! I was appalled when I saw how nasty this beach is. I mean Bali does not have nice beaches at all unless you are a surfer but this one is one of the worst. It just looks like you are at Brighton beach , NYC. The water is black, the sand is black with litter everywhere, the lounge chairs are 100 years old and vendors haggle you for a pedicure or a sarong every 5 minute! I had to leave to go to Kuta beach which is also disgusting. Bali is definitely NOT the place to go if you want turquoise water and white sand beaches!
review: honestly even bother go appalled saw nasty mean bali nice beach unless surfer one one worst look brighton nyc water black sand black litter everywhere lounge chair 100 year old vendor haggle pedicure sarong every 5 minute leave go kuta disgust bali definitely place go want turquoise water white sand beach

Content: Kuta Beach much nicer then the one at Seminyak, but much busier. Seminyak is just the beach, where as Kuta has all of the locals set up offering massages, hair braiding, hire a few chairs with some alcohol and watch the sun set.. So if you want to avoid any of that then Seminyak doesn't have any of that.
review: kuta much nicer one seminyak much busy seminyak kuta local set offering massage hair braid hire chair alcohol watch sun set want avoid seminyak doesnt

Content: Living on the east coast of Australia, you don't get many chances to watch the sunset over the ocean, and the changing colours that it causes. It's always great to watch...
review: live east coast australia dont many chance watch sunset ocean change colour cause always great watch

Content: Stayed 5-7 minute walk from Seminyak beach. Pop in headphones or pretend your asleep to avoid hawkers selling you stuff. Got a nice henna tattoo done there, though :)Good swimming waves and my hubby tried out surfing and had a good time-although try to shop around as my husband felt the surf instructor he had didn't give sufficient attention for the price. Don't accept a beach chair for more than 50,000 IDR for two people the whole day, so make sure to negotiate and don't be afraid to pass up a place or two, cuz most likely the first place you passed up may welcome you back at the price you initially wanted :)All around I think it's a nice beach with a nice sunset and decent vibes. P.S. Try out Sand beach bar & restaurant at night on the beach--decently priced with good live music and is one of the more attentive, service-oriented staff/waiters/waitresses than the other spots nearby.

Content: Came here twice on 2 occasion, You can find bars, restaurants near by. Suntan on the beach, learn surfing, play in the sea, take a walk. At night, usually many bars/restaurants will bring out bean bags on the beach and have live music and its a sight to hear and see.For surfing, its a very good place for beginners. Price per person for 1h lesson and 1h free surfing $100,000 - $150,000
review: come twice 2 occasion find bar restaurant near suntan learn surf play sea take walk night usually many barsrestaurants will bring bean bag live music sight hear seefor surf good place beginner price per person 1h lesson 1h free surf 100000 150000

Content: We still love a beer on the beach, we always sit at Aussies bar it's just fun.  We do our souvenir shopping for the kids while we have a beer, massage and buy our fruit.You have to be prepared to be swarmed by the hawkers and be able to get rid of those you don't want to buy from- my method is be really nice and have fun with them but be up front and let them know right away that you're not interested and if you tell them you are then you should buy it from them and not waste their time arguing over 50 cents.  We get the cheapest prices on the beach and the fruit is always fresh and fabulous. It's important to remember this is whats done on the beaches in Bali, you can't be rude to these guys this is just what they do.Its a fun place to meet other travelers and have a chat, share experiences and make plans.Always worth a sit down for a icey cold drink . :-)
review: still love beer always sit aussie bar fun souvenir shopping kid beer massage buy fruityou prepare swarm hawker able rid dont want buy method really nice fun front let know right away youre interested tell buy waste time argue 50 cent cheap price fruit always fresh fabulous important remember whats do beach bali cant rude guy doits fun place meet traveler chat share experience make plansalways worth sit icey cold drink

Content: Joined a large number of locals, ex pats and visitors walking along the clean beach (sadly  it has to be cleaned up early morning in the morning because of the significant sea pollution)every morning, especially good at low  tide. The growth of beachside bars that offer cocktails, cold Beer (restaurant prices) and local wines inthe afternoon is a good spot to watch the sunset
review: join large number local ex pat visitor walk along clean sadly clean early morning morning significant sea pollutionevery morning especially good low tide growth beachside bar offer cocktail cold beer restaurant price local wine inthe afternoon good spot watch sunset

Content: Seminyak beach was nice enough. I have been to much better beaches in the past.It was clean and not to many locals trying to sell you things. There were heaps of restaurants and bars. Plenty of lounges to hire. It was a pretty calm day when we went but many people were having a go at eater sports anyway. The water is warm but not very clear. Still great to cool off, after being in the hot sun all day.
review: seminyak nice enough much good beach pastit clean many local try sell thing heap restaurant bar plenty lounge hire pretty calm day go many people go eater sport anyway water warm clear still great cool hot sun day

Content: Very nice beach where you can walk all the way out when the tide is low. Good choice of restaurants along the beach front too with their own entertainment music choices. Sunset is spectacular there. Definitely worth a trip!
review: nice walk way tide low good choice restaurant along front entertainment music choice sunset spectacular definitely worth trip

Content: The beach is good and get populated . There are many beach side shacks there to chose from and the seating options are vibrant . Very safe
review: good populate many side shack choose seat option vibrant safe

Content: Nice day out on the beach. Clean with plenty of sun beds just opposite Kudeta Restaurant.Was unpatrolled at the time we went so you need to becarful not to go too far out into big surf.Good for surfing.
review: nice day clean plenty sun bed opposite kudeta restaurantwas unpatrolled time go need becarful go far big surfgood surfing

Content: Great stay in seminayak and the beach is really beautiful. It was very close to where we stayed. Also, there are lot of clubs around where you can just sit chill and enjoy the sunset.
review: great stay seminayak really beautiful close stayed lot club around sit chill enjoy sunset

Content: Very nice clean beach, good waves, water looks clean.Waves can get fairly big 6' plus when we were there one of the days in April.Probably better to stay out when they get large, but otherwise a good swimming beach.
review: nice clean good wave water look cleanwaves fairly big 6 plus one day aprilprobably well stay large good swimming

Content: worth taking a wander down to the beach for relaxing drinks while watching the sunset,do a bit of shopping for watches,sunglasses,sarongs and jewellery as the beach vendors are around and also a few of the bars have music as well
review: worth take wander relax drink watch sunsetdo bit shopping watchessunglassessarongs jewellery vendor around bar music well

Content: We went at night time and the beach didn't seem to have rubbish. We missed the sunset but that's okay as we enjoyed our night visit. There are restaurants that set up bean bags on the beach so it has a nice atmosphere. We were only approached once to buy things but we were polite and said no, and the man just moves on.
review: go night time didnt seem rubbish miss sunset thats okay enjoy night visit restaurant set bean bag nice atmosphere approach buy thing polite say man move

Content: Seminyak beach seems to be a peaceful spot that you are less likely to get hassled on. It can get busy around sunset as people are out for walks on the beach and there was quite often a game of soccer
review: seminyak seem peaceful spot less likely hassle busy around sunset people walk quite often game soccer

Content: Compared to Kuta Beach which you might be strolling with huge amount of tourists, Seminyak beach is so much better and cleaner. There are restaurants along the beach.
review: compare kuta might stroll huge amount tourist seminyak much good cleaner restaurant along

Content: Lots of people around but does have a very nice sunset. A lot of restaurants or party cafe by the beach so access to the beach can be not so straight forward. We happened to be having dinner at Potato Head Beach Resort.
review: lot people around nice sunset lot restaurant party cafe access straight forward happen dinner potato head resort

Content: This is a great beach to visit at night. The sound of the ocean creates serenity. Definitely check it out.
review: great visit night sound ocean create serenity definitely check

Content: Somewhat dirty and constantly hassled by Hawkers.I  would have liked to have seen the  sunset but weather precluded this. I doubt you would be left alone to enjoy the experience.
review: somewhat dirty constantly hassle hawkersi like see sunset weather preclude doubt leave alone enjoy experience

Content: Nice clean beach. Not very crowded and was nice to go for the pleasant sunsets. Quite a few warnings around if you want some food or beers.
review: nice clean crowd nice go pleasant sunset quite warning around want food beer

Content: Seminyak Beach is a very large stretch of light brown volcanic sand .. The sea here is quite shallow so you can walk out quite far ... It does have some large waves rolling in which are ideal for surfing & body boarding .. Plenty of bars & restaurants to sit & watch the world go by ..
review: seminyak large stretch light brown volcanic sand sea quite shallow walk quite far large wave roll ideal surf body board plenty bar restaurant sit watch world go

Content: Loved this beach, so much to do.Endless subbed options that will bring you food and ice cold drinks, ice cream.Board hire or learn to surf.Swimming flags to keep you safe.Waves can get quite big and undertow very strong as well.
review: love much doendless sub option will bring food ice cold drink ice creamboard hire learn surfswimming flag keep safewaves quite big undertow strong well

Content: doing a bit of eating, reading and tanning then returned in the evening for a few drinks on the beach under lit up umbrellas. Not only a great place for a surf and a swim, but head down and grab a beanbag, a cocktail and watch the sunset with some great music
review: bit eat read tan return even drink light umbrellas great place surf swim head grab beanbag cocktail watch sunset great music

Content: Get down early to enjoy a cocktail whilst watching the sunset. There are a few bars where bands play live music. Not too many hawkers either.
review: early enjoy cocktail whilst watch sunset bar band play live music many hawker either

Content: I have been to much nicer beaches than this in Bali. It's not very clean, we didn't walk too far so it may be slightly nicer in other places - but certainly the part we were on wasn't nice at all. It's not very clean and smells like drains
review: much nicer beach bali clean didnt walk far may slightly nicer place certainly part wasnt nice clean smell drain

Content: any beach in the pacific is nicier  dirty and ill kept . the beach at kuta is much tidier  and  big seas, however very crowded, with lots of people trying to sell you things.  darker sandy beaches at seminak  but not that flash
review: pacific nicier dirty ill keep kuta much tidy big sea crowd lots people try sell thing darker sandy beach seminak flash

Content: Seminyak beach is a long stretch of shoreline of fine black sand. It is not crowded whether one will go there in the morning or afternoon. We went swimming in the morning & the waves is not that intense. A lot of people are jogging, walking & some are even doing yoga on the beach. In the afternoon we strolled  the beach to watch the sunset. It is so nice to see the kaleidoscope of color, the sky merging with the ocean as the shore reflects the colors of the sunset when the water rushes back to the sea...a respite from the crowd of tourists in Bali.
review: seminyak long stretch shoreline fine black sand crowd whether one will go morning afternoon go swim morning wave intense lot people jog walk even yoga afternoon stroll watch sunset nice see kaleidoscope color sky merge ocean shore reflect color sunset water rush back seaa respite crowd tourist bali

Content: Beautiful, HOT, clean beach that stretches far in both directions. You can see the aeroplanes take off from the Airport to the left.Excellent place to relax under a beach umbrella (hired for $5). Ice cold drinks only a hand signal away. Loved it!!!
review: beautiful hot clean stretch far direction see aeroplane take airport leftexcellent place relax umbrella hire 5 ice cold drink hand signal away love

Content: Dont expect nice beaches in this part of Bali. There are people pestering you. You can hire boards, and there are chairs usually to sit on (might have to pay for them). If you do want nice beaches, head to Finn's Beach Club or Uluwatu. Both are beautiful.  Finn's is much more commercialised than Uluwatu. It has a restaurant and day beds and trendy, hip music playing, a bar... and is fully set up. You have to pay to get down there (you go down on a little cart, sort of scary).  The food is expensive. Uluwatu on the other hand is for surfy people uninterested in all that stuff. To get to the beach you walk down stairs on a cliff (not scary, totally safe). There are traditional Indonesian cafes sticking out of the cliff with really yummy food and an AMAZING view. Plus, you don't have to pay to use the beach. I much prefer Uluwatu, but that's just me.
review: dont expect nice beach part bali people pester hire board chair usually sit might pay want nice beach head finns club uluwatu beautiful finns much commercialise uluwatu restaurant day bed trendy hip music play bar fully set pay go little cart sort scary food expensive uluwatu hand surfy people uninterested stuff walk stairs cliff scary totally safe traditional indonesian cafe stick cliff really yummy food amaze view plus dont pay use much prefer uluwatu thats

Content: What a great experience! Go for the sunset, pull up a bean bag, relax & enjoy the music! At each little place the music is great & food incredible value. It's an experience not to be missed if visiting Bali. Very casual & you're sure to find some music to suit your taste. Service great at all of them & the best place to have fun with friends. We will do this every time we go to Bali, highly recommended!
review: great experience go sunset pull bean bag relax enjoy music little place music great food incredible value experience miss visit bali casual youre sure find music suit taste service great best place fun friend will every time go bali highly recommend

Content: Seminyak is one of the beach that you would like to visit if you prefer a quiet place to admire the waves. It has alot of restaurants along the beach with beanbags for your relaxation. Live Bands are there to provide the music with the waves. It was a good place to relax and watch the sunset. Definitely a place to visit if you seek a different feeling compared to Kuta beach.
review: seminyak one visit prefer quiet place admire wave alot restaurant along beanbags relaxation live band provide music wave good place relax watch sunset definitely place visit seek different feeling compare kuta

Content: Nice beach, less beach vendors, less surfers and less tourist than the more famous Kuta beach. Good alternative for a lazy day at beach or enjoying the sunset.
review: nice less vendor less surfer less tourist famous kuta good alternative lazy day enjoy sunset

Content: My friend and I wandered down to the beach after a nice salad lunch. The beach was nice but a bit disappointing, mainly because there is no accommodation made for people like us who are not staying at a waterfront hotel to relax on a lounge chair. Basically, we walked the beach and had to sit on our slippers when we wanted to rest for a bit. Still, there were no vendors harassing us on the beach, which can be a problem at beaches the world over. Also, the views were really nice. We happened to be there during low tide so we actually walked quite far out into the ocean while we were still on dry land. The surf was rough so we didn't swim but the water felt great as we stood in it up to our knees. Will I go back? No, I think I'll enjoy the pool at my hotel instead. The beach wasn't great enough to warrant another visit, especially since we're not surfers - there were a few surfers in the water but not being a surfer myself, I can't give any feedback on that aspect of things. However, I'm happy I can at least say that I checked it out.
review: friend wander nice salad lunch nice bit disappointing mainly accommodation make people u stay waterfront hotel relax lounge chair basically walk sit slipper want rest bit still vendor harass u problem beach world view really nice happen low tide actually walk quite far ocean still dry land surf rough didnt swim water felt great stood knee will go back think ill enjoy pool hotel instead wasnt great enough warrant another visit especially surfers surfer water surfer cant give feedback aspect thing im happy least say check

Content: Was a good beach, didn't notice the countless of hawker selling stuff every few meters and calling you out every few second.
review: good didnt notice countless hawker sell stuff every meter call every second

Content: I would probably rate this as good but TA doesn't have that rating so...it's not so bad but I'm spoilt with the white sand and clean beaches of Australia.This is a mixture of black volcanic and white sand beach so gives the impression of not being as clean as it could be but the beach is very long and very wide and friendly enough for your kids to paddle in.
review: probably rate good ta doesnt rating soits bad im spoilt white sand clean beach australiathis mixture black volcanic white sand give impression clean long wide friendly enough kid paddle

Content: Good surf for body surfing, plenty of little cafes for a cheap drink or lunch (nasi goreng for $ 3.50 au!)

Content: Each morning we walked on the beach at sunrise. It was so beautiful, watching the light change as the sun rose, and we had the beach to ourselves. Glorious! Sunsets on the beach were spectacular too.

Content: Great beach day and night.  Take a walk grab a drink and chat to the locals at one of the many beach bar set ups all the way to Kuta.  The restaurants and vendors at night are awesome.  Let the kids buy a night lantern and let it go over the beach for a great memory.  Very safe and a lot of fun,
review: great day night take walk grab drink chat locals one many bar set ups way kuta restaurant vendor night awesome let kid buy night lantern let go great memory safe lot fun

Content: A very very large beautiful beach, there are busier bits or quiet bits, very peaceful with big slashing waves, great if your a surfer. Water is warm, just overall beautiful.
review: large beautiful busier bit quiet bit peaceful big slashing wave great surfer water warm overall beautiful

Content: I love this long beach for morning walks and lazing at the bean bag bars  to watch the sunset- truly magical. The kids love the beach for it's nighttime entertainment- hawkers selling glow toys, art work, massages, sarongs and the beautiful coloured candle lanterns that are released after sunset.What I dislike immensely is all the rubbish both washed up and left higher on the sand.On my 1/2 hour morning walk yesterday I passed copious plastic bags, 2 used disposable nappies, 2 tubes of toothpaste, plastic water bottles etc. It is not a prisptine beach, it has  streams of foul water running into it and although they do clean the beach in the mornings it is still polluted. I don't swim there and my kids, who swallow sea water like seals, are not allowed in either- pools are a safer option.
review: love long morning walk laze bean bag bar watch sunset truly magical kid love nighttime entertainment hawker sell glow toy art work massage sarong beautiful colour candle lantern release sunsetwhat dislike immensely rubbish wash leave high sandon 12 hour morning walk yesterday pass copious plastic bag 2 use disposable nappy 2 tube toothpaste plastic water bottle etc prisptine stream foul water run although clean morning still pollute dont swim kid swallow sea water seal allow either pool safer option

Content: Don't just miss coming to Seminyak beach , a super lovely spot, would highly recommend to spend some quality good romantic time in here if you are here as a couple!!

Content: We have been travelling around Bali and had our last days near this beach. It was around Nuepi, Balanese New Year. A religious time where lots of ceremonies are held at the beach. This means a lot of polution, 1000s of palm leaf plates with cigarettes, flowers ect. all over. At the same time the beach it self didnt appeal to anything else but surfing, not swimming. But the beach was nice for walking and watching sun sets.
review: travel around bali last day near around nuepi balanese new year religious time lots ceremony hold mean lot polution 1000 palm leaf plat cigarettes flower ect time self didnt appeal anything surf swim nice walk watch sun set

Content: Had a nice time on the beach. Especially loved how they had restaurants/bars right on the beach with lots of comfortable lounge seating. We saw on big bean bag chairs while we watched the sunset and drank beers. They also had a great live band playing on the beach. The only downfall was the beach merchants. My advice would be to not buy or talk to any of them if you don't want anything. If you buy something from one they will all flock to you. Although it was nice to get a foot rub while watching the sunset :)
review: nice time especially love restaurantsbars right lot comfortable lounge seating saw big bean bag chair watch sunset drank beer great live band play downfall merchant advice buy talk dont want anything buy something one will flock although nice foot rub watching sunset

Content: A nice beach a little removed from the more crowded ones.  Loved all of the little "bars" in the area.  Though you need to pay to use the beach chairs, it was a lot of fun to sit and watch the waves crash while enjoying a cold one or two.

Content: Am I missing something here? We are staying in the middle of Seminyak so a trip to the beach was a must do. Went to the Mosaic Beach club (which is quite okay) but very disappointed in the beach and can't recognise what I saw in some of the reviews! Hot, grey, coarse sand, ungroomed beach access points, strong tides (and I can swim well) and sewage outlets so a walk along the beach is an obstacle course. I like lots of things about Bali but give me Aussie beaches anytime, rather than Seminyak, although I will go back to enjoy the Sunset!
review: miss something stay middle seminyak trip must go mosaic club quite okay disappointed cant recognise saw review hot grey coarse sand ungroomed access point strong tide swim well sewage outlet walk along obstacle course lots thing bali give aussie beach anytime rather seminyak although will go back enjoy sunset

Easy to find a Halal food for the muslim but if you can't find the Halal restaurant, just asked the local people because most of the Bali's local people are friendly and helpful.

Content: I stayed in Seminyak at Dash Hotel and had a wonderful stay there. Seminyak is perfect if you want to party but the beach is not the best one of Bali if you are a swimmer. Besides, Seminyak as the vibe of little town on the beach like Dauville or St Tropez. This is very pleasant to stroll in small streets for shopping...very nice boutiques and good restaurant & coffee shop. The location is perfect if you are trendy, like party and can drive a motorbike to explore Bali
review: stay seminyak dash hotel wonderful stay seminyak perfect want party best one bali swimmer besides seminyak vibe little town dauville st tropez pleasant stroll small street shoppingvery nice boutique good restaurant coffee shop location perfect trendy party drive motorbike explore bali

Content: My friend was so excited to show me this beach, as he said it was so beautiful. As I arrived I was quite surprised as to how average this beach was. There was a large stretch of sand, some of which was black and there was quite a bit of litter flowing in the streams to and from the ocean. Anyone who doesn't notice the pollution at this beach needs to get their eyes checked and reconsider what a good beach looks like. The hawkers also made it somewhat unpleasant, and the entrance/exit is quite tricky to find if you're a first timer. We weren't allowed to walk through any hotels to the main road, so we left with blistered feet from the hot sand trying to find our way out. I would not visit this beach again in a rush. I've seen much better beaches in Bali.

Content: This only our 3rd visit to Bali but after trying a few different spots along the stretch of beach from Ku de Ta in Seminyak to Marriot at Legian in our view the beach directly in front of Chez Gado Gado is our favorite. Water is clear, surf is good for beginners to intermediate, lounge chair hire for a pair is usually $50k per hour and surfboard hire the same.The old guy selling Bintang, water and soft drinks will run a tab, the ice cream vendor calls past regularly and if you need cheap eats you have a good selection on the beach nearby or alternatively can go more upmarket with Gado Gado.Contrastingly the Seminyak end near Ku de Ta has poor surf, the water is murky and contains quite a bit of rubbish and the beach vendors charge more saying... 'it is Seminyak'. If you enjoy the beach and swimming/surfing and have teenagers the Gado Gado area is the spot for you.

Content: The beach at Seminyak has changed a lot over the last 15 years, as expected. What I did not expect this time around was the huge increase in the volume of garbage on the beach. It was very dissapointing to see so much garbage washing up on the shoreline. It was hard to enjoy a stroll along the beach while dodgeing so much garbage. So sad to see and nobody really seems to care.

Content: The most smoothest beach sand in Bali. And their sand is dark so that it reflects all light when sun goes down. Must go place!!

Content: Stayed at FuramaXclusive Ocean Beach hotel. Seminyak Beach just a few footsteps away from the hotel. Beautiful and relaxing beach. Preferred Seminyak to Kuta Beach.

There are a restaurants and coffee shops near by and a wash down arear to wash of the sand, quite beach good for the little ones.

Content: Because it is actually the ocean the rips are strong and the waves are fearsome. I took my little boy in and left shortly after getting smashed a couple of times.  Nice to look at but be aware.
review: actually ocean rip strong wave fearsome take little boy leave shortly get smash couple time nice look aware

Content: Seminyak Beach is OUTSTANDING...!! Lots of great beach bars to watch the sunset, a number of them even have live music. An ideal place to relax and watch the sun go down. During the day, you can surf and swim - Just one tip - The sand gets REALLY hot... Make sure you take some flip flops..!! (Thongs for your Aussies out there!). We walked down the beach from Seminyak - Legian - Kuta (About a 35 minute walk). It is in fact the same coast line, but called different resorts. The beach seems to get more dirty as you go along. (More rubbish in the sea and on the sand).
review: seminyak outstanding lot great bar watch sunset number even live music ideal place relax watch sun go day surf swim one tip sand get really hot make sure take flip flop thong aussie walk seminyak legian kuta 35 minute walk fact coast line call different resort seem dirty go along rubbish sea sand

Content: Another nice beach in Bali. Not as crowd as Kuta, yet not quiet as Petitenget. I prefer this place than Kuta since it offers something "different". Enjoy morning or night falls here and feel the atmosphere.
review: another nice bali crowd kuta yet quiet petitenget prefer place kuta offer something different enjoy morning night fall feel atmosphere

Content: From morning till sunset and beyond, there is always something going on! Great private beach clubs, or just with a towel and sunscreen, there is no bad way to go!

Content: We spent approx 4 hours on deck chairs under an umbrella and for first hour we had every beach seller approach us trying to sell sunglasses, handbags, jewellry, viagra, valium and offers to give massages, manicures hair braided you want something I am sure they had it or could get it for you, after they finished with us and noticed another new face trying to sit and enjoy a day at the beach we had a nice cold drink brought to us by owners of the beach bar and sat back and enjoyed the sights it was wonderful, a great way to spend a few hours,  oh and it only cost $5.00 aust dollars to sit on their chairs!!
review: spent approx 4 hour deck chair umbrella first hour every seller approach u try sell sunglass handbags jewellry viagra valium offer give massage manicure hair braid want something sure finish u notice another new face try sit enjoy day nice cold drink bring u owner bar sit back enjoyed sight wonderful great way spend hour oh cost 500 aust dollar sit chair

Content: This stretch of beach could be beautiful but it's not. I went back today when it was just off high tide to see if it was any better than when we were there at low tide. But no luck, it is still dirty and polluted. What a shame. The sand when wet resembles mud and sticks like paste to everything (not like most sand, which sticks but will brush off). I know the locals have to make a living but there are so many people trying to sell you things, which is fine when walking through but I imagine it could get a little annoying if you decided to sit in the beach.I saw and heard many people complaining of skin rashes and sores after the beach and swimming in the ocean.Hopefully Bali can get a plan together to reduce the water and beach pollution and increase recycling or people will stop coming and that would be a real shame. It is a beautiful long stretch of beach which needs to be cleaned up.
review: stretch beautiful go back today high tide see well low tide luck still dirty polluted shame sand wet resembles mud stick paste everything sand stick will brush know local make live many people try sell thing fine walk imagine little annoy decide sit beachi saw heard many people complain skin rash sore swim oceanhopefully bali plan together reduce water pollution increase recycle people will stop come real shame beautiful long stretch need clean

Content: Seminyak Beach is nice and clean great cabanas you must pay nice place to relax with a book .Its close to walk to if you staying in Seminyak or a quick taxi ride not expensive plenty of hotels on waters edge to have something to drink or eat.
review: seminyak nice clean great cabana must pay nice place relax book close walk stay seminyak quick taxi ride expensive plenty hotel water edge something drink eat

Content: Lovely beach to visit, great sunsets. Love the bands and bean bags. Excellent service at Capil Beach Bar

Content: Not to far away from bustling Kuta, Seminyak is a perfect place to escape from noises. There are a lot of pretty small shops along the streets, polite people, and the weather is not as hot as Kuta. The beach is cleaner compared to Kuta Beach, strong winds and soft sands. There are a lot of stray dogs running around (loving it!). Sunset view is amazing. Very peaceful and calming, at night a lot of bars and live music around.Many eateries but a bit hard to find Indonesian restaurants here.
review: far away bustle kuta seminyak perfect place escape noise lot pretty small shop along street polite people weather hot kuta cleaner compare kuta strong wind soft sand lot stray dog run around love sunset view amaze peaceful calm night lot bar live music aroundmany eatery bit hard find indonesian restaurant

Content: If you park at pura near kayu aya, you'll find the beach next to you. Its an easy beach with not to strong wave. Very bright and no shade. You can swim or just lay on the beach waiting for sunkissed skin

Content: Even though we went around 9pm the atmosphere was great with music and service. We would definitely come back and spend much more time having a look around.

Content: Been to beaches all over Bali, but this had some amazing waves to surf, and a lot of good energy on this beach

Content: Its less crowded here and the beach is beautiful. Lots of small and large eateries, including spanish tapas and drinks.Make sure you bring lots of water, hat and lotion.

Content: My wife and I really enjoy Seminyak Beach. We surf using surfboards, body boards, the property of The Legian Bali Hotel where we stay, and plain surfing and swimming.  When the tide goes out the beach is fantastic for long walks on firmer sand. The ladies who sell beads and sarongs to keep their families housed and fed are all pleasant and beautifully mannered. Kikki, Rosy and Sally also provide massages on the beach, manicures, pedicures to a high standard which we take advantage of to add to the attraction of the beach. They treat us so well we return to the magnificent  The Legian Hotel Bali as often as we can. The really good fun is once every stay I get into a bartering discussion buying goods from them. At the conclusion I pay the agreed price and give them back the goods and tell them to sell them to someone else. Their well being is much more important to my wife and I than the goods or the money. They are lovely ladies in happy marriages with a strong sense of family. They add value to the beach in the area that is accessed by the public whether they are visiting the beach or staying at a hotel along the beach. I never cease to be amazed at how these ladies and their children speak perfect English and are so inquisitive about our 5 children, their spouses and our 13 grandchildren. It all adds to the beach that is regularly cleaned and well policed. We will return soon.
review: wife really enjoy seminyak surf use surfboard body board property legian bali hotel stay plain surf swim tide go fantastic long walks firm sand lady sell bead sarong keep family house fed pleasant beautifully mannered kikki rosy sally provide massage manicure pedicure high standard take advantage add attraction treat u well return magnificent legian hotel bali often really good fun every stay barter discussion buy good conclusion pay agree price give back good tell sell someone well much important wife good money lovely ladies happy marriage strong sense family add value area access public whether visit stay hotel along never cease amazed lady child speak perfect english inquisitive 5 child spouses 13 grandchild add regularly clean well police will return soon

Loads of places rent sun beds with parasols cheaply and the edge is lined with many good bars and restaurants.You do get approached quite a lot by the beach sellers but they are friendly and only trying to earn a living.A great place to spend long, sunny and relaxing days.

Yes, all the restaurant/bars on Seminyak Beach put out beanbags and tables facing the sunset. They also have local bands performing until the sun has set. Don't miss this spectacular sight!

Content: I first went to Seminyak Beach last year when my wife and I attended a wedding. I could only shoot from the hotel grounds because of lack of time. This time I did some internet research to find out more about this beach, which is just slightly north of Legian and Kuta. I discovered beautiful shots of people having a grand time under giant umbrellas while lying down on giant beanbags. I was determined to shoot the sunset there. As I was staying at The Magani Hotel in Legian and was carrying a heavy camera bag, I took a taxi to Seminyak Beach. The driver dropped me off near Double 6 Seminyak Hotel. From there I just walked to the beach. Instead of writing about what I saw, just take a look at some of the images I shot. You'd wish you were there.
review: first go seminyak last year wife attend wed shoot hotel ground lack time time internet research find slightly north legian kuta discover beautiful shot people grand time giant umbrella lie giant beanbag determine shoot sunset stay magani hotel legian carry heavy camera bag take taxi seminyak driver drop near double 6 seminyak hotel walk instead write saw take look image shoot youd wish

Content: Compared to Kuta Beach, Seminyak Beach is alot more tranquil and peaceful. Less crowded and certainly lesser touts. The beach here is perfect to watch sunset on a clear day
review: compare kuta seminyak alot tranquil peaceful less crowd certainly less tout perfect watch sunset clear day

Content: Husband and I took a stroll on this beach today. The water was warm enough to be considered bath water. The waves were incredible. If I were surfer I would have been stoked, dude. Totally stoked. We also stopped off at Ku De Ta for a slushy (we both got watermelon, but I had to add simple syrup to mine because it was toooo sour). We watched two senior citizens battle the current, only up to their knees in the water. I seriously feared for their lives as I watched them almost get sucked out with the current. I'm pretty sure this isn't a place for swimming on account of those currents and those monster waves, but it sure is pretty. Worth a walk. The only downside is the depressing garbage that washes up with the waves ... plastic bags, bottles, yogurt cups (I had no idea so many peopled liked yogurt), and weird things I couldn't identify. I feel sorry for the fish around Bali.
review: husband take stroll today water warm enough consider bath water wave incredible surfer stoke dude totally stoked stop ku de ta slushy get watermelon add simple syrup mine toooo sour watch two senior citizen battle current knee water seriously fear life watch almost suck current im pretty sure isnt place swim account current monster wave sure pretty worth walk downside depress garbage wash wave plastic bag bottle yogurt cup idea many people liked yogurt weird thing couldnt identify feel sorry fish around bali

Content: Seminyak beach it's self is pretty average. We had just stayed at Sanur and Nusa Dua which has white sand beaches and clear blue water, we expected the same of Seminyak. This was absolutely not the case. The beach is littered with rubbish, has run off from the drains which makes the area around the outlets brown and brings in even more rubbish and the sand is black, not white!The only positives I can conclude are that the sunsets are amazing from Seminyak Beach and there are many hotels which offer day bed hire, but these are very expensive for Bali. The cheapest we found was IDR 500,000 per day bed (which you can use for food and drink) which can fit 4 people comfortably however others had 6ppl at the Potato Beach Club up to IDR 1,000,000 per person at the gorgeous W Retreat.
review: seminyak self pretty average stay sanur nusa dua white sand beach clear blue water expect seminyak absolutely case litter rubbish run drain make area around outlet brown brings even rubbish sand black whitethe positive conclude sunset amaze seminyak many hotel offer day bed hire expensive bali cheap find idr 500000 per day bed use food drink fit 4 people comfortably others 6ppl potato club idr 1000000 per person gorgeous w retreat

Content: As an avid health nut I jogged down to Seminyak beach at day-break. The beach was alive with people raking and collecting what looked to be an insurmountable amount of plastic articles.Apparently when the rains set-in, debris flows from neighbouring Java which adds to the problems Bali faces. I couldn't find a rubbish bin anywhere, except 150 meters away near a hotel opening... Obviously this is part of their problem.

Content: Not the best for swimming although tell that to the many who do. With the wet season the run off from the land is just too high and the rubbish etc is higher than normal.  The beaches are being tidied though but sometimes a fell their fighting a loosing battle. They must keep at it though.  A walk from Seminyak beach to Discovery Shopping Mall takes about an hour and a half walk. If the tides right and you have a bit of a head breeze it can be a beautiful walk.
