Content: Nice view and lively area..though dogs are running freely there too. Be careful on their poops at your feet too.
review: nice view lively areathough dog run freely careful poop foot

Content: Anyone who wantsto stay away from the hustle bustle of Kuta should definitely try Seminyak. Much more upscale and full of good restaurants and cafes unlike the loud area of Kuta.
review: anyone wantsto stay away hustle bustle kuta definitely try seminyak much upscale full good restaurant cafes unlike loud area kuta

Content: This is my local beach. At the Petitenget Temple car park. Beautiful LA Lucciola is here for Italian dining.The resorts on the beach work hard to keep the beach clean but after a rain, it can be daunting. I find around May/June that I can't walk along the beach because of high tides that make the sand very steep and soft
review: local petitenget temple car park beautiful la lucciola italian diningthe resort work hard keep clean rain daunt find around mayjune cant walk along high tide make sand steep soft

Content: I visited seminyak in dec, 2015. Very beautiful views from the beach. the weather is amazing. Overall a very wonderful experience
review: visit seminyak dec 2015 beautiful view weather amaze overall wonderful experience

Content: Does not offer too much, though quite relaxing. At least definitely less litter here than at other beaches. Great for a big walk
review: offer much though quite relax least definitely less litter beach great big walk

Content: We stayed at an amazing hotel on Seminyak Beach - I have no complaints and would return in a heartbeat- that being said the beach is quite dirty with dog poo and other litter being brought in from the ocean. Maybe if the tides were different, the beaches would be a bit cleaner. I did love how many people walked early in the morning and watched the sun set in the evening, such a wonderful community.
review: stayed amazing hotel seminyak complaint return heartbeat say quite dirty dog poo litter bring ocean maybe tide different beach bit clean love many people walk early morning watch sun set even wonderful community

Content: Great beach to walk along and just take in the view, especially the sunset. Parts of the beach are cleaned regularly but a lot of debris builds up after a storm. Offerings are placed on the beach near the river from Seminyak. Take notice of the lifeguard flags on the beach because the tides can be very strong.  Bella located near the Breeze sells good sarongs but bargaining is required.
review: great walk along take view especially sunset part clean regularly lot debris build storm offering place near river seminyak take notice lifeguard flag tide strong bella locate near breeze sell good sarong bargaining require

Content: As we walked along one morning from our hotel we sad to see how many plastic bags and dead fish were found on the beach! It's a disgrace to be frank and local governments need to take action. The waters are warm and overall the beach is nice and great for a stroll, but I was so sad to see these poor fish and even an old turtle that had washed up along with plastic bags. The local hotels have a great location on the beach and a real asset in the beach that needs much love and care!
review: walk along one morning hotel sad see many plastic bag dead fish find disgrace frank local government need take action water warm overall nice great stroll sad see poor fish even old turtle wash along plastic bag local hotel great location real asset need much love care

Content: Lovely beach at sunset, great cheap bars along the beach as well as the W Hotel for cocktails would recommend
review: lovely sunset great cheap bar along well w hotel cocktail recommend

Content: very wide & beautiful beach. Great for taking long strolls.  We were there in mid-day, but I bet sunsets would be great here.  Only odd thing:  only saw two doves during maybe 2 hours there, no seagulls, no sandpipers, no anything else.  Wonder why not!
review: wide beautiful great take long stroll midday bet sunset great odd thing saw two dove maybe 2 hour seagulls sandpiper anything wonder

Content: The beach is a nice beach not the white sands that you get in Thailand, but lots of places to stop by for a drink and watch life go by.
review: nice white sand thailand lot place stop drink watch life go

Content: Staying for 8 nights - finding it very organised, comfortable and clean.  Probably just a little impersonal for us to re visit.
review: stay 8 night find organise comfortable clean probably little impersonal u re visit

Content: I wasn't particularly impressed with Seminyak beach, I did go for a walk most mornings on my visit to Bali past it though it did appear quite dirty at times.
review: wasnt particularly impressed seminyak go walk morning visit bali past though appear quite dirty time

Content: The beach is not like a white sand pacific beach, personally I didn't like it and opted to swim at our villas pool.A lot of the beach was closed off to swimmers due to rips, remember to swim between the flags.There were also lots of flies and hawkers!
review: white sand pacific personally didnt opt swim villa poola lot close swimmer due rip remember swim flagsthere lot fly hawker

Content: Great beach for morning walks, you will find local and tourist enjoying the morning walks, jogs and surf In the morning.  In the evening you have the perfect setting to watch the sunset!
review: great morning walk will find local tourist enjoy morning walk jog surf morning evening perfect set watch sunset

Content: Walked down for a quick look after dinner.  Very pretty with lanterns from the restaurants. Strong waves.
review: walk quick look dinner pretty lanterns restaurant strong wave

Content: Just Pick a Restraunt have a drink arrive before 5pm and watch the sunset and all the action of Bali unfold.
review: pick restraunt drink arrive 5pm watch sunset action bali unfold

Content: The beach is impressive. It's not white sand and crystal water by its clean and there are plenty of loungers and a good price. The guys that run the loungers have a good selection of drinks and hire body boards at a very reasonable price. There are some good bars along the beach apparently but we didn't make it that far. We did eat in a restaurant just off the beach which was very good. Definitely worth a look for a swim to cool down from the intense heat and fun if you like waves.
review: impressive white sand crystal water clean plenty lounger good price guy run lounger good selection drink hire body board reasonable price good bar along apparently didnt make far eat restaurant good definitely worth look swim cool intense heat fun wave

Content: Great night out spent by the beach, relaxing on the provided bean bags listening to live music in the background until sunset then into the night. A selection of eateries to choose from whilst on the beach, from local food to pub style food.  Couldn't ask for a better night..
review: great night spend relax provide bean bag listen live music background sunset night selection eatery choose whilst local food pub style food couldnt ask well night

Content: I love coming down to Seminyak beach at any time of day. It's beautiful to walk or swim first thing in the morning before breakfast when the beach is super quiet. It's great to spend the day here and have lunch at the warungsalong the beach and perfect for sunset drinks
review: love come seminyak time day beautiful walk swim first thing morning breakfast super quiet great spend day lunch warungsalong perfect sunset drink

Content: This beach is clean compared to most of the other beaches in bali. I've been traveling to bali for thirty years and the water is getting clogged with rubbish!! For some reason Seminyak beach is free of rubbish. The beach it self is great, I've always been able to get a fun wave here and generally to my self. Overall it's a great beach for everyone!
review: clean compare beach bali ive travel bali thirty year water get clog rubbish reason seminyak free rubbish self great ive always able fun wave generally self overall great everyone

Content: The water is warm and the sand burns your feet so make sure you wear thongs. Seminyak Beach is a great swimming beach for the young and old and the odd Bali dog that came's down to cool off due to the heat and humidity(I'm sure 1 dog I was watching was trying to body surf). My son hired a surfboard for 2 weeks which cost him $10.00 a day and my 14 year old daughter tried her hand at surfing a longboard for $5.00 an hour. The hawkers can be a tad annoying, wanting you to buy more sarongs, elephant trinkets, glasses and watches, but if they don't ask you once they will ask you 100 times. There are some great bars and restaurants along the beach too that have great food and acoustic bands to listen too and the Sunset is just perfect.
review: water warm sand burn foot make sure wear thong seminyak great swimming young old odd bali dog cames cool due heat humidityim sure 1 dog watch try body surf son hire surfboard 2 week cost 1000 day 14 year old daughter try hand surf longboard 500 hour hawker tad annoy want buy sarong elephant trinket glass watch dont ask will ask 100 time great bar restaurant along great food acoustic band listen sunset perfect

Content: Title says it all, little more upscale with a string of beach front restaurants,  many of which offer live nightly music.  Great place to watch the sunset or the night fishers.  Fewer hawkers than kuta but they're all present.
review: title say little upscale string front restaurant many offer live nightly music great place watch sunset night fisher few hawker kuta theyre present

Content: Staying at double six hotel has allowed us to use the beach daily for running and swimming which has been wonderful.The beach is clean without any rubbish in the oceanPerfect for swimming, the current is strong swimmers need to be aware of the undertow
review: stay double six hotel allow u use daily run swim wonderfulthe clean without rubbish oceanperfect swim current strong swimmer need aware undertow

Content: You don't go to Seminyak for the beach. You go for the upscale restaurants and shopping. Which are amazing. The beach has a few nice clubs on it for sunset watching, but in terms of pretty, don't expect much.
review: dont go seminyak go upscale restaurant shop amazing nice club sunset watch term pretty dont expect much

Content: white sand with gentle waves and when the tide is out...you can walk for miles.  follows aroud Seminyak, so many places to stop for coffee, drinks or dining.
review: white sand gentle wave tide outyou walk mile follow aroud seminyak many place stop coffee drink din

Content: Got sun lounges and umbrellas 6 for 200,000 rupiah. Water was cold and only 10,000 rupiah. Water was clean. Surf not overly big
review: get sun lounge umbrellas 6 200000 rupiah water cold 10000 rupiah water clean surf overly big

Content: Not my favourite beach but it's better than some of the others along the kuta, seminyak front. The best beaches are out on Bukit Peninsula or even down Cangu way.
review: favourite good others along kuta seminyak front best beach bukit peninsula even cangu way

Content: It was a nice beach to look over from the hotel pool, or walk up late evening to see sunset, but too many people trying to sell crap made us avoid it for the most part. Also its quite dirty from the storm water from streets, I wouldnt swim there. The beers in the bean bags at night are nice though!
review: nice look hotel pool walk late evening see sunset many people try sell crap make u avoid part quite dirty storm water street wouldnt swim beer bean bag night nice though

Content: Plenty to do here with eating places around, not always cleaned to perfection but worth a visit beware of sales touts which can be annoying
review: plenty eat place around always clean perfection worth visit beware sale tout annoy

Content: I waste my time with my friend in seminyak and when the sunset come, we went to seminyak beach for enjoy the sunset view. its too awesome!!
review: waste time friend seminyak sunset come go seminyak enjoy sunset view awesome

Content: I have to admit I didn't like it when all the bar/restaurants starting opening along this stretch of the beach. But now it seems to be a great place to drop by as the sun sets, stroll along with a bit of low key haggling if you are badly in need of a carved coconut shell, a genuine $5 rolex or a $2 pair of sunnies that your being asked $20 for.Then after your stroll hop on a bean bag and drink the amber liquid. Really pleasant way to end the day.Oh, and I think the very best way to start the day is a vigorous walk, get the heart rate up a little, then do a few sprints up the dunes to really get the blood moving. Drop down and do a push up or a plank. Do any of the above. But make sure to take in the crisp curling waves drumming out the beat for a brand new Bali day.
review: admit didnt barrestaurants start open along stretch now seem great place drop sun set stroll along bit low key haggle badly need carve coconut shell genuine 5 rolex 2 pair sunnies ask 20 forthen stroll hop bean bag drink amber liquid really pleasant way end dayoh think best way start day vigorous walk heart rate little sprint dune really blood move drop push plank make sure take crisp curl wave drum beat brand new bali day

Content: Spent the new years eve on the beach watching the sunset as 2015 turned to 2016...fireworks all around us , the air filled with the sounds of laughter and many different languages...amazing experience...magic..
review: spent new year eve watch sunset 2015 turn 2016fireworks around u air fill sound laughter many different languagesamazing experiencemagic

Content: What a beautiful and compelling resort. The beach and surrounding town has everything from great beach clubs to every cuisine you could wish for in the town as well as amazing and varied night life. Beautiful hotels and stunning scenery.
review: beautiful compel resort surround town everything great club every cuisine wish town well amaze vary night life beautiful hotel stun scenery

Content: Golden sand, slight swell, a bit of a rip between the red flags, and people swimming. What more does one need. A bit cleaner perhaps.
review: golden sand slight swell bit rip red flag people swim one need bit clean perhaps

Content: Quite liked this beach.  Was wonderful to spend the day and swim.  Sunsets are breath taking.  Many vendors but they don't bother you to much.  Didn't feel to crowded.  You could either partake in the scene or not.
review: quite like wonderful spend day swim sunset breath take many vendor dont bother much didnt feel crowd either partake scene

Content: I you would like a safe beach paddle around at, this is the one for you. easy double break waves that are great for small and old.
review: safe paddle around one easy double break wave great small old

Content: Accessible by every major hotel and a place to chill or be served chilled drinks, perhaps even some beach side yoga if thats your thing... If you are in the area you cannot miss the beach!
review: accessible every major hotel place chill serve chilled drink perhaps even side yoga thats thing area miss

Content: Love all the Bars with choices of tables & chairs or bean bags on the sand. Bean bags are best. Live entertainment most nights.  Food good & not expensive, beer prices not much more than you pay at a mini-mart.  Great to spend a hot night there cooling off, enjoying the beautiful sunsets.
review: love bar choice table chair bean bag sand bean bag best live entertainment night food good expensive beer price much pay minimart great spend hot night cool enjoy beautiful sunset

Content: Went here for a day whilst travelling with friends in August 2015. It was a nice day at the beach, not too busy and not too many people pestering us to buy things so we could relax. It was quite clean too. The area we sat in didn't have many places nearby to buy food and drinks from but I'm pretty sure there was lots further down. I don't surf but there were lots of people surfing and the waves looked pretty good for it. Definitely worth a visit.
review: go day whilst travel friend august 2015 nice day busy many people pester u buy thing relax quite clean area sit didnt many place nearby buy food drink im pretty sure lot dont surf lot people surf wave look pretty good definitely worth visit

Content: The view was the best. You can see the reflection of the sky on the sand with a thin layer of the sea water.
review: view best see reflection sky sand thin layer sea water

Content: Very chilled. Dark coloured sand due to it being a volcanic island. Indian Ocean so lots of big waves! It is so much fun jumping them😊 there are a few sun loungers with umbrellas, usually you will pay around Rp 150,000 to use, do not be scared to barter! It is fantastic at night with a couple of chilled bars playing live music.
review: chill dark coloured sand due volcanic island indian ocean lot big wave much fun jump sun lounger umbrellas usually will pay around rp 150000 use scar barter fantastic night couple chill bar play live music

Content: long and vast beach, good for jogging. garbage gets cleaned every morning. some locals sell coconuts (yumm). in the evening many peopel at the beach watching the sunset and kids playing in the waves. Great fun.
review: long vast good jogging garbage get clean every morning local sell coconut yumm even many peopel watch sunset kid play wave great fun

Content: Like with the whole beach stretch in the area, it is now filled with "bean bag bars" and beach hawkers. While it is a bit cleaner than the stretch toward Kuta, a beach is a beach. Great spot to relax and watch the sunset if you are in the area.
review: whole stretch area now fill bean bag bar hawker bite clean stretch toward kuta great spot relax watch sunset area

Content: Great sunset but the beaches are full of rubbish here. White sand beaches do exsist in Bali but not here.
review: great sunset beach full rubbish white sand beach exsist bali

Content: I actually traveled to Bali in 2006, but this was a very beautiful beach to be experienced and enjoyed. The sunsets in Bali are amazing, as well as the food, and the people were above friendly to me in every way. I dream about returning to Bali often
review: actually travel bali 2006 beautiful experience enjoyed sunset bali amaze well food people friendly every way dream return bali often

Content: Bali never fails when come to sunset. It's always perfect. Really enjoying spend our time here. You can enjoy the sunset at the nearly cafe.
review: bali never fail come sunset always perfect really enjoy spend time enjoy sunset nearly cafe

Content: A nice easy way to have a relaxing couple of days. Some great Beach sellers with whom you can have some good banter. The sea is rough at times my partner nearly lost his swimmers a couple of times. Some nice bars and restaurants to loose a few hours with good food and Bingtang.
review: nice easy way relax couple day great seller good banter sea rough time partner nearly lose swimmer couple time nice bar restaurant loose hour good food bingtang

Content: We arrived just as most tourists where heading home , so less crowds. The beach was clean, not to many sellers. You do have to buy chairs etc but that's normal. So cheap.
review: arrived tourist head home le crowds clean many seller buy chair etc thats normal cheap

Content: Spoilt by beaches in Australia I can only rate this one as average. The breeze off the water and the open space were fabulous after a day in the heat and humidity in town. The water looked pretty rough but was quite warm round the ankles - trying to avoid stepping on rubbish was a bit tedious.
review: spoilt beach australia rate one average breeze water open space fabulous day heat humidity town water look pretty rough quite warm round ankles try avoid step rubbish bit tedious

Content: My girls and I took a million pictures. the most fun I have ever had at a beach in my life!!! definitely a must see
review: girl take million picture fun life definitely must see

Content: Can be very crowded and touristy. Nice to watch the sunset. Many bars have live music playing, why they insist on playing western music covers i will never understand.. pricier than local places..
review: crowd touristy nice watch sunset many bar live music playing insist play western music cover will never understand pricy local place

Content: Cool beach with lots of eating spots along the beachfront. Most of them have some live acoustic music too. Make sure you sit in the middle of the mix so you don't get music from the place next to you
review: cool lot eat spot along beachfront live acoustic music make sure sit middle mix dont music place next

Content: This beach is very crowded and it needs a lot of litter-clearning.  I was walking around beach and you could see all kinds of trash stuck in the blackish gray sand.  It's a good thing that Bali had a lot more to offer aside from this beach.
review: crowd need lot litterclearning walk around see kind trash stuck blackish gray sand good thing bali lot offer aside

Content: Fantastic fireworks on NYE, completely mad!  Spent several evenings for sunset and drinks.  Plenty of eating and drinking options, beach long and wide, room for everyone.  Colourful and alive.
review: fantastic firework nye completely mad spent several evening sunset drink plenty eat drinking option long wide room everyone colourful alive

Content: Beach was clean when we were there.  Sunsets were beautiful, and having dinner on the sand at the local restaurant was pretty awesome.Make sure you negotiate a price to rent the deck chairs.  There can be a difference between the vendors.  That said, for a few bucks, to have someone bringing you down drinks all day is quite relaxing.   Especially when a nice ocean breeze comes on.  The biggest problem (as with all beaches in Bali) are the vendors that hassle you continuously to buy their products.  Mind you, my wife wasn't complaining while getting a foot massage.
review: clean sunset beautiful dinner sand local restaurant pretty awesomemake sure negotiate price rent deck chair difference vendor say buck someone bring drink day quite relax especially nice ocean breeze come big problem beach bali vendor hassle continuously buy product mind wife wasnt complain get foot massage

Content: great beach and easier to exercise than the street, get there early it does get busy. Great surfing lessons if that is what your after as well
review: great easy exercise street early busy great surfing lesson well

Content: its a real shame since the beach looked realy good and has a great view of the sunset but its was so dirty so we didn't stay very long
review: real shame look realy good great view sunset dirty didnt stay long

Content: It was a good beach. You are able to purchase some shade... Rent an umbrella. It is worth it since the sun is blazing. Close to the markets. Surfing lessons are available for you as well and if you are a surfer then surf boards for rent to you.
review: good able purchase shade rent umbrella worth sun blaze close market surf lesson available well surfer surf board rent

Content: beautiful place one of my favorite place to go.words are less to describe the beauty .love Balinese beach bars
review: beautiful place one favorite place gowords less describe beauty love balinese bar

Content: Lots of rubbish on the beach which has come down from the highlands.  Would be a lovely beach if the local authorities stopped making excuses and got the rubbish and recycling under control in Bali. I understand why everyone stays in the pool.
review: lot rubbish come highland lovely local authority stop make excuse get rubbish recycle control bali understand everyone stay pool

Content: Best place to watch the sunset! They replace all the sun-lounges in the evening with big bean bag chairs and you can sit with a nice drink and enjoy the sunset. Lots of people and lots of music. Also great for an after sunset swim if you have had enough sun all day.
review: best place watch sunset replace sunlounges even big bean bag chair sit nice drink enjoy sunset lots people lot music great sunset swim enough sun day

Content: Coming from Western Australia, nothing beats our sunset. Most of the time we were there it was cloudy so not much of a sunset to wow us. Too busy and those beach side bars play really loud music. Too many beach vendors and not very clean beach although they try to clean it up, still heaps of rubbish washed up.
review: come western australia nothing beat sunset time cloudy much sunset wow u busy side bar play really loud music many vendor clean although try clean still heap rubbish wash

Content: Stunning sunsets while sitting on the beach having a cold beer that can be purchased from one of the many vendors. New Years Eve was spectacular with fire works all along the beach as far as the eyes could see Potato head to the right and Kuta to the left
review: stun sunset sit cold beer purchase one many vendor new year eve spectacular fire work along far eye see potato head right kuta leave

Content: We walked along the beach a few times to go to Potato Head and to get back to our villa. We found that there are less hawkers along this beach so it makes for a more peaceful beach outing. The sunset was also a sight to behold.
review: walk along time go potato head back villa find less hawker along make peaceful out sunset sight behold

Content: We're from Perth so not quite the white sandy beaches we have at home still get gorgeous sunsets. Gets really busy with bikes and cars walking to the beach. Walking on the sand seemed safe enough only your feet do get pretty dirty. They clean the beach in the morning I think. Although we only ever went in the evening wasn't too bad aside from New Years Day night. I personally wouldn't swim there as I'm freaked out by the black sand and not being able to see the bottom, but there were quite a few swimmers and surfers. It's pretty cool to sit in one of the many bars on bean bags where you still get a great view without sitting right on the black sand.
review: perth quite white sandy beach home still gorgeous sunset get really busy bike car walk walk sand seem safe enough foot pretty dirty clean morning think although go even wasnt bad aside new year day night personally wouldnt swim im freak black sand able see bottom quite swimmer surfer pretty cool sit one many bar bean bag still great view without sit right black sand

Content: Clean and well maintained beach.Beach lounges available to hire.Beach massage.Lots of hawkers.Resturants on the beach.Safety flags.Great swimming.Prepare for the sun and wind.
review: clean well maintain beachbeach lounge available hirebeach massagelots hawkersresturants beachsafety flagsgreat swimmingprepare sun wind

Content: Too packed with everyone letting off fireworks didn't feel safe at all. I'm sure on a normal night or day would be a great place just went on a busy time!
review: pack everyone let firework didnt feel safe im sure normal night day great place go busy time

Content: Seminyak beach is filthy and so is the water. The idea of swimming or relaxing here is unthinkable. It should be cleaned up. It would be a simple matter to organise a Clean up Seminyak Beach event, and I read in one of the local What's On magazines that there is such an event. If it exists, it's not working. Littering should be penalised, as there is litter everywhere.
review: seminyak filthy water idea swim relax unthinkable clean simple matter organise clean seminyak event read one local whats magazine event exist work litter penalise litter everywhere

Content: The beach is crowded, but it's still beautiful. Loads of hotels where you can pop in and out of the loo / to grab a drink if needed.Rented two deck chairs + a body board for 150k for around 4-5 hours to the far right of Ku De Tah, which was decent enough, though you could probably get it lower if you tried harder.Sunset is wonderful from here - an absolute stunner. Just make sure you get a close seat to the sea unless you want people in your pictures :)
review: crowd still beautiful load hotel pop loo grab drink neededrented two deck chair body board 150k around 45 hour far right ku de tah decent enough though probably low tried hardersunset wonderful absolute stunner make sure close seat sea unless want people picture

Content: Seminyak beach is clean, open and easy to get to. Hotels on the beach front are easy to slip in and out of for drinks and fun.
review: seminyak clean open easy hotel front easy slip drink fun

Content: Its Bali, the beach offers all you could want in terms of sunning, walking, swimming, surfing, happy hour options, etc.  We spent a lot of time there, and no complaints....but, was disappointed that so few of the private/public beaches were routinely cleaned after the days high tides.  Surrounded by all this greatness but you walk along a lot of trash and have things brushing up on your leg as you wade in the water.  No reason/excuse for this given the availability of cheap labor, equipment that can clean large areas quickly, etc.  Only real negative of our entire visit.
review: bali offer want term sun walk swim surf happy hour option etc spend lot time complaintsbut disappoint privatepublic beach routinely clean day high tide surround greatness walk along lot trash thing brush leg wade water reasonexcuse give availability cheap labor equipment clean large area quickly etc real negative entire visit

Content: Seminyak offers a fabulous flat sandy beach that most days is overrun with visitors.  Like many other tropical beaches this one has its share of trash that you have to step around : plastic bags and bottles, discarded food containers, bits of clothing.  So much money is made by the local businesses you would think that they would spend a little to clean up the treasure that nature has provided.
review: seminyak offer fabulous flat sandy day overrun visitor many tropical beach one share trash step around plastic bag bottle discard food container bits clothe much money make local business think spend little clean treasure nature provide

Content: A fabulous beach to walk along and visit iconic Seminyak eateries such as KU DE TAH, Potato Head, W Hotel and more. The waters are quite rough, so swim at your own risk- some areas are patrolled; there are many surfers too. There can be a lot of rubbish when there has been a storm. A great beach walk!!
review: fabulous walk along visit iconic seminyak eatery ku de tah potato head w hotel water quite rough swim risk area patrol many surfer lot rubbish storm great walk

Content: We went here for enjoying the sunset. Rent 2 beach chair for 100k and drinking cold beer while enjoying the sunset right in front of us. Paradise!
review: go enjoy sunset rent 2 chair 100k drinking cold beer enjoy sunset right front u paradise

Content: We spent New Year's Eve on this beach. Was a fab beach. Was busy being the end of the year. Plenty of seats bean bags. On the night it's self bean bags can be used with minimum spend of 150,000 rupiah. Not sure if this is the same cost throughout the year. Next morning tractors cleaned the beach so it became spotless once again
review: spent new year eve fab busy end year plenty seat bean bag night self bean bag use minimum spend 150000 rupiah sure cost throughout year next morning tractor clean become spotless

Content: Nice beach, not hassled, lots to do (surf / swim / bars) or just chill out. Telling me to write more but not much more to write :)
review: nice hassle lot surf swim bar chill tell write much write

Content: I went a couple of times to the beach but didn't get in the water, big waves mostly for surfers. Sand dirty, it seems tractors are not used everyday to clean the rubish.  Lots of sun shades and sunbathing stretchers for 3 AUD but you need to bargain otherwise you'll be paying 20 in AUD .Crowded in this time if the year.New year at the beach watching the fireworks was fine.Some good restaurants others not good at all.Smells like sweage in some areas.Anyway just average.Judge by yourself.
review: go couple time didnt water big wave mostly surfer sand dirty seem tractor use everyday clean rubish lot sun shade sunbathe stretcher 3 aud need bargain youll pay 20 aud crowd time yearnew year watch firework finesome good restaurant others good allsmells sweage areasanyway averagejudge

Content: It is a great beach but just like all beaches are. Mornings are great and so are the evenings with fantastic colors in the sky; and an awesome sunset. What makes it interesting is the party scene in the evenings during sunset. The beach is relatively clean. At various places there are small hut-like restaurants that offer chairs and towels for rent - about IDR 50k for an hour. Drinks like Bintang usually cost about IDR 25k. At some places, the beach is cleaner as it is in front of an expensive resort like ku-de-ta or potato head and the likes.The party scene lights up during evenings with colorful bean bags all over the place, colorful people on it and the colorful sky ... all making the place really colorful. The place is like a music fest of sorts in the evenings. Wonderful to be here during that time. Mornings are serene and great for a run. Sun rises from the other side and hence the coolness is longer in the mornings making it ideal for a run.In short, OK beach, not the best in the world. Great for partying and overall feel.
review: great beach morning great evening fantastic color sky awesome sunset make interest party scene evening sunset relatively clean various place small hutlike restaurant offer chair towel rent idr 50k hour drink bintang usually cost idr 25k place clean front expensive resort kudeta potato head likesthe party scene light even colorful bean bag place colorful people colorful sky make place really colorful place music fest sort evening wonderful time morning serene great run sun rise side coolness long morning make ideal runin short ok best world great party overall feel

Content: Hip, cafe culture. Good restaurants. Surf wear shops galore. May be good to grab a meal or chill at the numerous sports bars around the area.
review: hip cafe culture good restaurant surf wear shop galore may good grab meal chill numerous sport bar around area

Content: The beach was very dirty as was the water. We saw a number of dead animals on the beach and a lot if rubbish. Not the place for swimming or relaxing.
review: dirty water saw number dead animal lot rubbish place swim relax

Content: We love this beach because so beautiful and so clean. Easy to find good hotel, good shops, good restaurants and coffee shops.Suitable place for couple, family with kids and large groups.
review: love beautiful clean easy find good hotel good shop good restaurant coffee shopssuitable place couple family kid large group

Content: Walking along a beach is allows nice though the rubbish detracted from the experience a bit. We rented a beach bed under an umbrella in a clean section and it was really enjoyable.
review: walk along allows nice though rubbish detract experience bit rent bed umbrella clean section really enjoyable

Content: Wouldn't come to this beach other than to watch the sunset.  Water warm but the beach was quite dirty. Rubbish everywhere. I guess blame it on the people rather than the beach. Even saw a syringe :( the sunset was amazing though. Pull up a beanbag at one of the beach bars with a drink and just enjoy.
review: wouldnt come watch sunset water warm quite dirty rubbish everywhere guess blame people rather even saw syringe sunset amaze though pull beanbag one bar drink enjoy

Content: Visited briefly and it looked really nice, but just very hectic with tourists as to be expected in Seminyak.
review: visit briefly look really nice hectic tourist expect seminyak

Content: The Seminyak beach has many good restaurants. It was very vibrant and especially the sunset dining was great.
review: seminyak many good restaurant vibrant especially sunset dining great

Content: The beach is beautiful, less crowded than Legian Beach..You can come here just for relaxing..One of the top beach in Bali
review: beautiful less crowded legian beachyou come relaxingone top bali

Content: When dreaming of Bali we anticipated lazy days of the beach, which is where we headed out first thing when we arrived. We were so disappointed with the trash all over the beach, the swimming prohibition flags, and lack of any good place to lay out and make a good beach day possible. After less than an hour by the ocean we reevaluated our priorities and planned to spend the rest of our stay visiting the cultural sights instead.
review: dream bali anticipate lazy day head first thing arrive disappointed trash swim prohibition flag lack good place lay make good day possible less hour ocean reevaluate priority plan spend rest stay visit cultural sight instead

Content: Great beach at night Balinese families and travellers all mingle and relax  watching the sunset  , beautiful location
review: great night balinese family traveller mingle relax watch sunset beautiful location

Content: Our son did some surfing here with one of the locals. He is quite competent but needed someone to help with the local conditions. Would suit a beginner though. Importantly, there's a flagged and patrolled area outside the Oberoi Hotel for swimming where the undertow is a little less than elsewhere. There is some litter on the beach (but they clean outside the larger hotels incl the Oberoi) so those spots are cleaner and remember the sand is dark - but don't be put off. It's also great for a morning or afternoon walk. Hawkers are few and far between and the few that are there are not pushy.
review: son surf one local quite competent need someone help local condition suit beginner though importantly theres flag patrolled area outside oberoi hotel swim undertow little less elsewhere litter clean outside large hotel incl oberoi spot cleaner remember sand dark dont put great morning afternoon walk hawker far pushy

Content: Beautiful beach in Seminyak Bali, it's in between Kuta and petitenget beach and it's just perfect to chill here.
review: beautiful seminyak bali kuta petitenget perfect chill

Content: We liked this beach. We hired an instructor to teach us surfing. You can chose from local instructors or schools (lot of options). Waves were quite big, excellent for surfing.
review: like hired instructor teach u surf chose local instructor school lot option wave quite big excellent surfing

Content: Seminyak beach was bit let down. Nice beach but could be cleaner. Though it was buzzing with nightlife and activitities and it was enjoyable to soak in the atmosphere. The sea was beautiful but you have to watch when you walk for waste on the beach.
review: seminyak bit let nice clean though buzzing nightlife activitities enjoyable soak atmosphere sea beautiful watch walk waste

Content: Some of our first days in Bali and decided to take a walk to the nearest beach from our hotel, eventually made our way through several streets into the beach but not before having our bags checked by police, that was something quite bizarre until my partner explained to me that Bali has changed quite a lot since the terrorist attacks in 2002 and 2005.In any case, walked into the beach just to notice a sea of rubbish being washed ashore. Told my missus I wanted to take a swim but as I was getting closer four plastic bags discouraged my attempt to which we started to walk along the beach. If you happen to walk close to any hotel/pub/bar you will see a little more variation on the type of rubbish, ranging from bottles and smoke buds to condoms (I was lucky enough to just find the aluminium packaging.)Getting close to The Oberoi hotel (or whatever it was) no less than 6 people were laying on the beach under clear influence of way too much booze, two of them screaming obscenities to people walking around. Another couple under a similar situation minus the obscenities after that hotel and a lot more towards the Seminyak Beach Resort & Spa... we arrived at the beach around 4:30pm so all this probably happened between 4:30pm to 6pm?We end up going back to the hotel and crashing by the pool.I got no idea if Bali has become some kind of tourism dumpster in which people comes here to release any kind of inhibition while locals consent any behaviour in exchange of a constant stream of money from their wallets... at least in Seminyak.
review: first day bali decide take walk near hotel eventually make way several street bag check police something quite bizarre partner explain bali change quite lot terrorist attack 2002 2005in case walk notice sea rubbish wash ashore told missus want take swim get close four plastic bag discourage attempt start walk along happen walk close hotelpubbar will see little variation type rubbish ranging bottle smoke bud condom lucky enough find aluminium packaginggetting close oberoi hotel whatever less 6 people lay clear influence way much booze two scream obscenity people walk around another couple similar situation minus obscenity hotel lot towards seminyak resort spa arrive around 430pm probably happen 430pm 6pmwe end go back hotel crash pooli get idea bali become kind tourism dumpster people come release kind inhibition local consent behaviour exchange constant stream money wallet least seminyak

Content: The waves are very strong in Seminyak and hence time in the ocean would be limited. However the view of the strong waves lashing Seminyak is one of the best in Bali and that in itself demands a visit.
review: wave strong seminyak time ocean limited view strong wave lash seminyak one best bali demand visit

Content: Nice beach with every you need...very good for me because of the serfing possibility. . We have of course in greece very beautiful beaches but not these special waves. ...
review: nice every needvery good serfing possibility course greece beautiful beach special wave

Content: Unfortunately this beach is dirty. We had a stroll along beach not very pleasant dog walkers let dogs mess on beach and don't pick up.
review: unfortunately dirty stroll along pleasant dog walker let dog mess dont pick

Content: the beach has too much litter and its not really a safe swimming beach. the sand is that blackish sand, maybe i'm just spoilt by living in WA! Went to Nusa Dua last year and the beaches are  better there.
review: much litter really safe swimming sand blackish sand maybe im spoilt living wa go nusa dua last year beach well

Content: My family chose Seminyak beach as our main overnight place during our trip to Indonesia according to my friends' recommendation. The choice was right absolutely. The beach was clean, wide sandy beach with diversified services and beach entertaiment that we enjoyed. Stayed in W retreat resort by the beach front and we were really happy. The beach has not much tourists as other beaches in SE Asia we've stayed.
review: family choose seminyak main overnight place trip indonesia accord friend recommendation choice right absolutely clean wide sandy diversify service entertaiment enjoy stayed w retreat resort front really happy much tourist beach se asia weve stay

Content: I'm sure most travellers to Bali must be shocked at the current state of the main beaches.  Both Seminyak and Legian beaches were covered with trash, both in and out of the water - so much so that we avoided these beaches.The exception is the space in front of some of the major hotels, presumably they employ people to clean them.Hard to fathom why the local authorities haven't addressed this issue, it is a major blight on Bali. Would recommend heading out to Batu Bolong for your beach / surf fix, it is almost pristine.
review: im sure traveller bali must shock current state main beach seminyak legian beach cover trash water much avoid beachesthe exception space front major hotel presumably employ people clean themhard fathom local authority havent address issue major blight bali recommend head batu bolong surf fix almost pristine

Content: We stayed at a hotel overlooking Seminyak beach and loved it!!There were enough waves for some amateur surfing and body boarding but not too big to stop any kids from being able to play in the water.Long beautiful beach stretch also made it great for a morning run.
review: stayed hotel overlook seminyak love itthere enough wave amateur surf body board big stop kid able play waterlong beautiful stretch make great morning run

Content: Out of Kuta, Legian and Seminyak; Seminyak is the one with access to high-end beach clubs and hotels. However, Legian is better situated, waves are both for surfing and playing in water. There are more beach side warrungs and more sunbeds. Seminyak isn't bad either as long as you are chilling at one of the beach clubs.
review: kuta legian seminyak seminyak one access highend club hotel legian well situate wave surf play water side warrungs sunbeds seminyak isnt bad either long chill one club

Content: Been there, enjoyed the moment, nearly been blown away by the strong wind as we were there during the raining season.  However, found that many of the other tourist do enjoy surfing...
review: enjoy moment nearly blown away strong wind raining season find many tourist enjoy surf

Content: A nice beach lined with lots of wonderful bars and restaurants. Be careful when walking on the 'promenade' as bikes happily rush past you. Littering does appear to be a slight problem however the view does compensate for this. Visit if you are close by, but save the travel from elsewhere.
review: nice line lot wonderful bar restaurant careful walk promenade bike happily rush past littering appear slight problem view compensate visit close save travel elsewhere

Content: If you're travelling from another Bali just to visit this beach, then it's not worth it. Kuta Beach would be better. Lots of trash on Seminyak Beach and it's not really swim-able either.
review: youre travel another bali visit worth kuta good lot trash seminyak really swimable either

Content: Hired some comfortable beach chairs, slathered on some factor 30 and spent a beautiful day on Seminyak beach. It's not a great beach for swimming, but the water is pleasant for a quick dip.
review: hire comfortable chair slather factor 30 spent beautiful day seminyak great swimming water pleasant quick dip

Content: This beach is ruined by the huge amount of rubbish on the shore. It makes it completely unappealing for swimming. This is something that needs to be addressed on a major scale. With no central rubbish collection, locals throw items into rivers and it ultimately washes up on Seminyak (and other) beaches. My view is probably marred by the pristine Australian beaches i'm used to, but I'd avoid this spot. it was really pretty gross.
review: ruin huge amount rubbish shore make completely unappealing swim something need address major scale central rubbish collection local throw item river ultimately wash seminyak beach view probably mar pristine australian beach im use id avoid spot really pretty gross

Content: I thinks this beach is New Kuta Beach. We spent 15-20 minutes ride motorbike from Legian to Seminyak. Enjoying sunset on this beach is very great experience.
review: think new kuta spent 1520 minute ride motorbike legian seminyak enjoy sunset great experience

Content: The very ew is quite amazing, don't always buy food at the restaurants along the beach go for a walk and get some of the tasty cobs of corn cooked by the vendors it is very tasty and cheap.
review: ew quite amazing dont always buy food restaurant along go walk tasty cob corn cook vendor tasty cheap

Content: I have a preference for clean beaches - shame so much rubbish on these beaches. Good place to watch sunset - get a little tired of saying no thanks constantly for massages etc...
review: preference clean beach shame much rubbish beach good place watch sunset little tired say thanks constantly massage etc

Content: I like seminyak beach better than kuta beach. Better view to watch sunset and not messy. In the context of messy crowd (beach boys with their rental boards and selling beers). Not white sand though.Written by : aventuracognitio.wordpress.com
review: seminyak well kuta good view watch sunset messy context messy crowd boy rental board sell beer white sand thoughwritten aventuracognitiowordpresscom

Content: I like this beach not just because it's extremely  central and accessible, but because it has character and life. Compared with the overly commercial Kuta Beach, it has a better vibe. Even though there are many hotels, resorts, beach clubs, along the stretch of beach, especially from the Double Six to the Dhyana Pura areas, the beach still offers a waterside stretch that's great for photo taking, watching dogs (and horses) frollick in the sand, flying kites, or just strolling along the water's edge. Sunset is of course the favourite time of the day to lounge on one of the beanbag chairs provided by the beach clubs.
review: extremely central accessible character life compare overly commercial kuta well vibe even though many hotel resort club along stretch especially double six dhyana pura area still offer waterside stretch thats great photo take watch dog horse frollick sand fly kite stroll along water edge sunset course favourite time day lounge one beanbag chair provide club

Content: Restaurants and more restaurants and then  some - definitely for the younger generations- unless you like loud music, some crowds and average food. Close to a number of hotels so it is convenient for all.
review: restaurant restaurant definitely young generation unless loud music crowd average food close number hotel convenient

Content: Beach is clean and there are many good cafes on the beach where one can enjoy the food and drinks. Cafes on the beach are open till mid night and one can have a good sunset view.
review: clean many good cafe one enjoy food drink cafes open till mid night one good sunset view

Content: one of famous beach in bali, and there's so many famous cafe sorounding. you can see beautiful sunset here while enjoying snacks and beer :)

Content: this is a beautiful beach, with great crowd around. there are a bunch of bars playing good music. A walk in the evening could be very romantic!

Content: Hubbi and I knew we can't lounge for long at the beach...so we only wanted the beach chairs and umbrellas for a couple of hours and we were upfront about the short stay...still, we probably discussed with six different vendors and everyone of them was charging USD10 or more for the few hours we wanted to stay, crazy!!!We ended up sitting at one and got our price down to USD 8 per chair...for a bit over 2 hours we stayed :(Bali is so over-rated with tourists, it's often frustrating for travelers.
review: hubbi know cant lounge long beachso want chair umbrellas couple hour upfront short staystill probably discuss six different vendor everyone charge usd10 hour want stay crazywe end sit one get price usd 8 per chairfor bit 2 hour stay bali overrated tourist often frustrate traveler

Content: Try look at private beach due it less crowded. Open beach is bit pack with people and slightly not secure.

Content: Sunset by the beach was amazing from these two locations. Its a must visit destination for every traveler looking for a fabulous beachy time

Content: Seminyak Beach is nice, however it does not live up to the standards of beaches back in Australia. I come from a part of Australia with beautiful white sand any clean beaches, therefore it is hard to enjoy anywhere that's not like that. The sand looks a dirty colour, and there can be a lot of rubbish on the beach. On the plus side, the water is a beautiful temperature and you can get some nice surfing waves (although it is definitely a beach that your have to swim between the flags)
review: seminyak nice live standard beach back australia come part australia beautiful white sand clean beach hard enjoy anywhere thats sand look dirty colour lot rubbish plus side water beautiful temperature nice surf wave although definitely swim flag

Content: Nice beach for afternoon drinks or food. Definitely not the golden sands of our Australian beaches, but great for a refreshing dip with the added character of beach bars. The street hawkers are there but very polite and no hard sell. Beautiful sunsets.
review: nice afternoon drink food definitely golden sand australian beach great refresh dip add character bar street hawker polite hard sell beautiful sunset

Content: Bean bags etc. are set up so you can watch the sunset. You can also buy drinks..you will be bombarded with people trying to sell you things

Content: Not white sand like Nusa Dua but a good beach, not crowded, and with plenty of bars and cafes nearby

Content: Loved this beach. Beautiful white sand, and there were lots of people surfing. Could rent surf boards nearby.

Duration 1 hour and 2 hours.

Content: Perfect getaway from your busy work routine, I'm referring to Singaporean. Quiet, very calm and it helps to relief stress.

Content: Good clean beach with good surf on the doorstep of Seminyak. Tasty bars and cafe which supply beanbags if you buy a drink or food. Hawkers are good natured and no too aggressive ( just be polite, they're trying to make a living too) easy to hire surf or bogey boards and rips are ok. Clean water unlike Kuta.
review: good clean good surf doorstep seminyak tasty bar cafe supply beanbag buy drink food hawker good natured aggressive polite theyre try make living easy hire surf bogey board rip ok clean water unlike kuta

Content: Nice beach, lots of different bars and places to eat all the way along. Very good surf if that's your thing. Big waves a lot of the time. Can become pretty annoying getting pestered by the locals all the time. They are always trying to sell you stuff. Also if you want to lie on a sunbed you have to pay. But don't be afraid to haggle, there are so many people trying to get you on their sunbed so if they say a price that's too high then just go to the next man. Once you do have a sunbed then the guys running it are happy to bring you beers or whatever you want really.
review: nice lot different bar place eat way along good surf thats thing big wave lot time become pretty annoy get pester local time always try sell stuff want lie sunbed pay dont afraid haggle many people try sunbed say price thats high go next man sunbed guys run happy bring beer whatever want really

Content: The beach in Seminyak is good and the water is very clean.  The water is not super blue and the sand is not white so don't expect Hawaii or Bermuda.  But fun safe beach with many cool places to grab a drink to watch the sunset from.

Content: I was surprised that this beach was fairly clean. At first glance I thought OMG it looks like Patong Beach in Phuket Thailand, but boy was I wrong. We enjoyed swimming in the cool refreshing water and getting drinks from the beach bars that litter the beach.

Content: This is a mustTo wander down onto the beach at seminyak grab a spot at any one of a number of different bars on the beach listen to music add a cold beer and some quality snacks and you are in business one of life's wonderful multi cultural experiencesRecommend as a rite of passage

Content: You get the best views of the sunset on this beach! Never have we seen such a beautiful sunset and sunrise!

Content: Although a little packed at dusk, there's some great eateries further north of W Resort where you can lie down and watch the sunset on a sun bed. Certainly less traversed than further south at the likes of Double Six and also less hawkers. Check it out for a sunset or 5.

I know that we as tourists have a responsibility to do what we can and I hope that most of us do.  we don't think we will come back to Bali.

Content: Been down a few times this recent trip to bali. (Both at night and day)Can be very pretty particularly at sunset.Bit of a shame how dirty and polluted it is.Plenty of eateries and stalls selling bintang.Will probably go back again.Certainly would NOT go swimming here however.

Content: It’s peculiar to see offerings and some Hindu rituals happening on its long stretch where elegant resorts are present. While walking to look for cheap and good resto we even witnessed two live ducks being tossed into the sea along with some fruits for offering. The poor ducks got broken necks instantly because of the strong waves.

Content: Not too much hassling by sellers. Beds can be bartered for, then you are left in peace. Lovely San and a good swell in the sea, good for bodyboarding, surfing, not that I would do either but others were.
review: much hassling seller bed barter leave peace lovely san good swell sea good bodyboarding surf either others

Content: We went on off season so the beach was nearly empty except the crowds in the Potato Head Club.There were heaps of offerings on the beach so pay attention to them.The beach has weird smell so you might no want to jump in the water.
review: go season nearly empty except crowd potato head clubthere heaps offering pay attention themthe weird smell might want jump water

Content: Seminyak beach unlike Other nearby beaches have beds for hire most of the way down the beach which you can hire by the hour,most people come down around lunch time where you can have a nice meal at the beach bars.After a drink or meal you can lie on beds until sun goes down by which time more people arrive to watch this lovely spectacle ,this is a truly amazing sight.After sun disappears (6-30-7-00pm November,) people retreat to the bean bags set up on the sand outside the bars.The staff set up a makeshift stage and a band starts playing on the beach,you just lay back and soak in the atmosphere,brilliant.
