Content: well, personally i prefer seminyak than kuta beach, less people, less tourists, less crowded. the water isn't clear blue like nusa lembong or gigi islands but still its a nice place to come, sit, relax and enjoy the day.
review: well personally prefer seminyak kuta less people less tourist less crowded water isnt clear blue nusa lembong gigi island still nice place come sit relax enjoy day

Content: This was the first time my son was on a beach since he turned one. He had an absolute blast playing with the sand (probably ate quite a bit) and i had a great time jogging along the beach. crowd was well behaved and the sunsets were gorgeous.
review: first time son turn one absolute blast playing sand probably ate quite bit great time jog along crowd well behave sunset gorgeous

Content: We visited Seminyak beach on a number of occasions over 12 days. We took our children who are 7, 5 and 3 years old respectively. Great place for familes. The surf can get rough but safe-to-swim areas are flagged. The surf is great for learning how to body surf which our older children did. A really friendly place, we met lots of other families by the beach and it was easy to strike up conversations. We had a sunset dinner one night. Yes, it was expensive but it was entirely worth it to watch the sunset, drink in hand, delicious food close by, lounging on a bean bag. Loved it and the so did the kids. The water is warm. The kids adored swimming until it was dark.  The sellers can be a bit full on. If you make eye-contact, watch out! Generally though once we said 'no thanks' we were left in peace. Bargain for the sun lounges. On our first day we paid 100,000 rupiah for one hour, by our last day we were getting the same lounge for 50,000 rupish for two hours!!
review: visit seminyak number occasion 12 day take child 7 5 3 year old respectively great place familes surf rough safetoswim area flag surf great learn body surf old child really friendly place meet lots family easy strike conversation sunset dinner one night yes expensive entirely worth watch sunset drink hand delicious food close lounging bean bag love kid water warm kid adore swim dark seller bite full make eyecontact watch generally though say thanks leave peace bargain sun lounge first day pay 100000 rupiah one hour last day get lounge 50000 rupish two hour

Content: A must-see if you are in Bali. The restaurants along this beach are cheap and delicious, incredibly talented singers woo you as the sun goes down. Sipping on cocktails under brightly coloured umbrellas and fairy-lights is just perfect!
review: mustsee bali restaurant along cheap delicious incredibly talented singer woo sun go sip cocktail brightly colour umbrellas fairylights perfect

Content: Average beach; don't expect white sandy blue beach... Limited activities, only surfing, not allowed to swim there due to the waves... Walking a distance and you can see sewer-like water flowing towards the beach from the resorts. EWWW... On a side note, definitely nice for a sunrise/sunset stroll, but that's just about it.
review: average dont expect white sandy blue limited activity surf allow swim due wave walk distance see sewerlike water flow towards resort ewww side note definitely nice sunrisesunset stroll thats

Content: if you want you can avoid seminyak beack as its not that great. south bali beaches are better and if you wanna party then pls goto kuta..
review: want avoid seminyak beack great south bali beach well wanna party pls goto kuta

Content: This beach is clean, surfers seem to like this area. Food and surfing lessons are available. At sunset it is the place to go, sit on the beanbags, listen to music, have a cocktail and watch the sunset.
review: clean surfer seem area food surf lesson available sunset place go sit beanbag listen music cocktail watch sunset

Content: Our third  (and last) week at Seminyak Beach.Concluding: the beach is wonderful; but the (beach)restaurants here serve abstemious/average food; and certainly not cheap!But: you're on the beach: the sound of the waves, and so on.....that compensates a lot, you expect (and hope).But no: each beachrestaurant has its own stage with a very loud band playing. And of course you can discuss about music taste; but you cannot discuss about the volume of the music: you can hardly talk when they are playing   Every restaurant feels the urge to leave (like a dog) a smellflag.Our conclusion: spend your day at Seminyak Beach and for dinner: find a restaurant near Seminyak Square: several restaurants serve very good food (find them at TripAdvisor!!!). The price is often more than right and the music never dominates the atmosphere
review: third last week seminyak beachconcluding wonderful beachrestaurants serve abstemiousaverage food certainly cheapbut youre sound wave onthat compensate lot expect hopebut beachrestaurant stage loud band play course discus music taste discus volume music hardly talk play every restaurant feel urge leave dog smellflagour conclusion spend day seminyak dinner find restaurant near seminyak square several restaurant serve good food find tripadvisor price often right music never dominate atmosphere

Content: Spent half a day lazing around the beach with the occasional dip in the water. Peaceful atmosphere and saw several local smiles. Would highly recommend coming here.
review: spent half day laze around occasional dip water peaceful atmosphere saw several local smile highly recommend come

Content: This was the best among all the beaches I have seen in Bali. One of the most beautiful places to be at sunset. Highly recommend to visit at sunrise or sunset. Many clubs and restaurants along the beach. Most of the people leave the beach after sunset. Went there at 8 at night and saw the beach empty.
review: best among beach see bali one beautiful place sunset highly recommend visit sunrise sunset many club restaurant along people leave sunset go 8 night saw empty

Content: large, spread out beaches makes it great for sunbathing (if not interrupted by the locals)..it is a glistening beach with darkish sand and not so crystal clear water. The waves roll and roll and it is pretty dangerous for new swimmers. Everything is ridiculously over priced and can be bargained down to 90%.There are lots of families with young kids and cute dogs running around on leashes which makes it a nice, friendly beach.
review: large spread beach make great sunbathe interrupted localsit glisten darkish sand crystal clear water wave roll roll pretty dangerous new swimmer everything ridiculously price bargain 90there lot family young kid cute dog run around leash make nice friendly

Content: Though the beach gets slightly more crowded at sunset the water is shallow and you can just walk right in and swim for quite a distance. It is better than the kuta beach as there are less surfers and this beach is more about swimming and relaxing.
review: though get slightly crowd sunset water shallow walk right swim quite distance well kuta less surfer swim relaxing

Content: I was shocked there were so few people on this stretch of beach! Everyone seemed to crowd down around Kuta, but up in Seminyak we had so much room to ourselves.
review: shocked people stretch everyone seem crowd around kuta seminyak much room

Content: This area has got terrific atmosphere even at early morning.The locals are so friendly and they dont push for you to buy.Not like Kuta beach.The bars along the beach offer great value for money.Food and drink are all great value Always good for a laugh!
review: area get terrific atmosphere even early morningthe local friendly dont push buynot kuta beachthe bar along offer great value moneyfood drink great value always good laugh

Content: Better one. Better than Kuta and Legian. Seminyak is the house to many luxury and top end hotels and restaurants, I heard people swear by the night life. We found the beach bit cleaner than the other 2 Kuta and Liegian and this was one fantastic part around. Loved the roadside pubs and bars on the other side, surely a tourists paradise.
review: well one good kuta legian seminyak house many luxury top end hotel restaurant hear people swear night life find bit clean 2 kuta liegian one fantastic part around love roadside pub bar side surely tourist paradise

Content: Went in morning. Beach has great waves and look really beautiful and calm. Doesnt have many shops and things to do but if you are looking for peaceful time on beach Seminyak can be one of them.
review: go morning great wave look really beautiful calm doesnt many shop thing look peaceful time seminyak one

Content: Nice beach beach, with flag indicators from the many beach front hotel for surfing. Typical powerful wave good for surfing, not for swimmers. Facing west, thus can see nice sunsets in the evening, and on the other side, it is decorated with all lightings from beach restaurants. Many locals selling goods or surfing lesson etc, very much overpriced, and can usually reduced by half when you walk away. So the price requested is not tally with product or quality. There are some section of the beach which are public, others are sorted with bean bags and sun bed for rent belong to some operators, you just need to pick any one you like, and they will approach with price.Many restaurants, colorfully decorated along the beach road, only very few bicycle riders, and the rental is much more expensive than Sanur beach. Sanur beach is equally nice, and much more quite. Seller there also quotes more sensible price for goods.
review: nice flag indicator many front hotel surf typical powerful wave good surfing swimmer face west thus see nice sunset even side decorate lighting restaurant many local sell good surf lesson etc much overprice usually reduce half walk away price request tally product quality section public others sort bean bag sun bed rent belong operator need pick one will approach pricemany restaurant colorfully decorate along road bicycle rider rental much expensive sanur sanur equally nice much quite seller quote sensible price good

Content: This beach remains too crowded, and is a dirty one compared to other beaches in Bali. Hence it is good only to view the lovely view of the sunset.There are a lot of people playing volleyball on the beach, some budding sand artists, lots of hawkers and a number of options to eat and drink. This place is good for water sports.
review: remains crowd dirty one compare beach bali good view lovely view sunsetthere lot people play volleyball budding sand artists lot hawker number option eat drink place good water sport

Content: You must go and watch the sunsets. If on a budget sit on the plastic chairs v the beanbags and umbrellas
review: must go watch sunset budget sit plastic chair v beanbag umbrella

Content: We hired two over-priced sunbeds and proceeded to play in the waves with the kids. Once the hawkers walking our piece of beach had tried a couple of times, and been rebuffed, we could actually settle in, relax and enjoy ourselves. Lots of cigarette butts on the beach but otherwise it seemed fairly clean and it made a nice change from our hotel pool.
review: hire two overpriced sunbeds proceed play wave kid hawker walk piece try couple time rebuff actually settle relax enjoy lot cigarette butt seem fairly clean make nice change hotel pool

Content: The beach itself was ok at the waters edge. There were some dirty drains and small creeks flowing onto the Beach at various points carrying rubbish with them which takes away from the experience. It was nice to be able to sit at a bar or restaurant along the back of the beach and enjoy a cold drink or meal at sunset.
review: ok water edge dirty drain small creek flow onto various point carry rubbish take away experience nice able sit bar restaurant along back enjoy cold drink meal sunset

Content: I've been told Seminyak is way more quiet than Kuta. The beach has got another vibe, with a lot of colorful beach bars, but it's still quite busy. Prices are the same as in Kuta. Lovely place to hang out and watch the sunset, solo or with whoever you want 🙏.
review: ive tell seminyak way quiet kuta get another vibe lot colorful bar still quite busy price kuta lovely place hang watch sunset solo whoever want

Content: Very next to the 'W' and many other hotels (including Legian Bali) along its length.  We enjoyed the pleasant walk along the beach.  If you find a hotel along this beach, the sunsets will be enjoyable and likely to be visible from your ocean view room itself - but on the beach it will be much more fun...
review: next w many hotel include legian bali along length enjoy pleasant walk along find hotel along sunset will enjoyable likely visible ocean view room will much fun

Content: Better and quitter beach to chill at.. Sun beds over priced!!! Sand very hot so be careful and wear decent footwear!! Be prepared to get hassled a lot!!
review: well quitter chill sun bed price sand hot careful wear decent footwear prepare hassle lot

Content: Not a bad beach, not bad surf, but there are loads of beaches in the world like that. Nice sunsets, but hawkers abound! Do not buy anything here - VERY overpriced, no matter what you haggle down to. Go to Ubud or beyond for that. Nice place to get some food or a drink, but is priced accordingly.
review: bad bad surf load beach world nice sunset hawker abound buy anything overpriced matter haggle go ubud beyond nice place food drink price accordingly

Content: Stayed on the beach to enjoy the sunset with some juice and simple snacks. Juice was rich in taste, not too sweet. The 3 bnacks a little boring. The view was beautiful and I think that is what you pay for.
review: stay enjoy sunset juice simple snack juice rich taste sweet 3 bnacks little boring view beautiful think pay

Content: An afternoon in Bali is not complete without a relaxing drink on the beach.Seminyak beach has a number of warungs Resto and bars along the beach between double six and Jl Arjuna. Be prepared to be assaulted by the beach vendors plying there wares. But they are respectful if you just say no. so be it a Bintang or a cocktail the sunset is best viewed from a comfy beanbag chair on the sand above the high water markEnjoy !!
review: afternoon bali complete without relax drink beachseminyak number warungs resto bar along double six jl arjuna prepare assaulted vendor ply ware respectful say bintang cocktail sunset best view comfy beanbag chair sand high water markenjoy

Content: As stated above, this is the longest and widest beach I've been to - but what I've mostly liked is the myriad of restaurants and bars along the Seminyak-Legian section of the beach - some to recommend, such as Champlung, with great after-sunset live music :-)
review: state long wide ive ive mostly like myriad restaurant bar along seminyaklegian section recommend champlung great aftersunset live music

Content: This is a beautiful beach, which is kept clean and not too crowded. Watching the sunset from the beach was beautiful, and the restaurants along the beach front set-up lounging areas and some even have live music so you can enjoy the beach in the evenings.
review: beautiful keep clean crowd watch sunset beautiful restaurant along front setup lounge area even live music enjoy evening

Content: Nice beach, but you can't go more than 1 minutes without someone trying to sell you something and sell you hard on it. They basically harass you non stop.
review: nice cant go 1 minute without someone try sell something sell hard basically harass non stop

Content: We spent a few days here in our travels. With everything from amazing eateries fun water sports and beautiful sunsets this is a must see and play please while in Bali
review: spent day travel everything amaze eatery fun water sport beautiful sunset must see play please bali

Content: I spent an afternoon at Seminyak Beach body surfing and it was so much fun.  The waves are big but it didn't feel dangerous.  No undertow.  There were a few surfers in the evening but they mainly came out the next morning.  Very nice long beach for walking.  Great spot to watch the sunset.
review: spent afternoon seminyak body surf much fun wave big didnt feel dangerous undertow surfer even mainly come next morning nice long walk great spot watch sunset

Content: Lovely beach with beautiful sand and lovely clear waters. I visited this beach in October 2015 and every day was sunny with lots of people around-not too busy however! Beach loungers are not too expensive we paid 100,000 rupiahs for 2 beds. There are a few sales people selling various knick-knacks but not as much hassle as some other places I have been to. This is a long stretch of beach that connects to Kuta beach. Would definitely recommend this beach if youre staying in seminyak!
review: lovely beautiful sand lovely clear water visit october 2015 every day sunny lot people aroundnot busy lounger expensive pay 100000 rupiahs 2 bed sale people sell various knickknack much hassle place long stretch connects kuta definitely recommend youre stay seminyak

Content: Although the beach has some treasures as "La Plancha" beachclub to go at sunset, the beach isn't really nice for sunbathing. It was dirty and noisy. Not nice as may be beaches at the peninsula.
review: although treasure la plancha beachclub go sunset isnt really nice sunbathe dirty noisy nice may beach peninsula

Content: Go early to beat the heat, but extremely pleasant. Worthwhile and great for working out your bearings.
review: go early beat heat extremely pleasant worthwhile great working bearing

Content: Best enjoyed early morning and late evening, with friends and a cocktail in hand, an Asian margarita for example.
review: best enjoy early morning late evening friend cocktail hand asian margarita example

Content: Its really nice to relax in one of the many bars there and watch the beautiful sundown. Many of them habe beanbags in the sand. Best time is from 90 Minutes before official sundown. Only downturn are the sellers that constantly ask you if you want to buy something like wtches, sunglasses, art and many more.
review: really nice relax one many bar watch beautiful sundown many habe beanbag sand best time 90 minute official sundown downturn seller constantly ask want buy something wtches sunglasses art many

Content: Depending on the time of your visit, this place offers varying experiences. It is very clean most of the months but during the winter months, the tide brings back all the plastic waste on the beach. A good place to laze around, get a cheap but wonderful foot massage and get entertained by numerous hawkers around
review: depend time visit place offer vary experience clean month winter month tide brings back plastic waste good place laze around cheap wonderful foot massage entertain numerous hawker around

Content: One of the best sunset in bali another kuta beach, near by seminyak central, petitenget temple, and alot people come to see the beautiful sunset and white sand
review: one best sunset bali another kuta near seminyak central petitenget temple alot people come see beautiful sunset white sand

Content: The water was clear, the beach and sand was clean. However, having been spoiled by West Australian and Queensland beaches, it was hard to rate this in the same category. However, there were lots of beachgoers making the most of the beach and thoroughly enjoying themselves
review: water clear sand clean spoil west australian queensland beach hard rate category lots beachgoers make thoroughly enjoy

Content: Seminyak beach has less hustle and bushel then Kuta. Same black volcanic sand but a bit more rubbish as there are not so many Hotel, so less cleaning done. Dirty creeks run straight in to the sea, so i did not bother to have a swim. It's good for a cheap sun set, if you don't mind no bands playing and you bring your own drinks.
review: seminyak le hustle bushel kuta black volcanic sand bit rubbish many hotel less clean do dirty creek run straight sea bother swim good cheap sun set dont mind band play bring drink

Content: Very very pretty at sunset and at night but during day just not that greatRubbish on beach which was disappointing Rips like nobody's business and tonnes of idiots swimming in there !Constant hagglers too who were pretty damn persistentStick to pool until 4 pm!
review: pretty sunset night day greatrubbish disappointing rip nobodys business tonne idiot swim constant haggler pretty damn persistentstick pool 4 pm

Content: The beach up this end is much nicer that the Kuta/Legian end it seems to be cleaner around the nice resorts.
review: end much nicer kutalegian end seem clean around nice resort

Content: I am living withing walking distance to this pure beauty. Sunset at any given day is always a fun-filling one, either for sunset run, power walk, or lazily siting with a drink.
review: live withing walk distance pure beauty sunset give day always funfilling one either sunset run power walk lazily sit drink

Content: We came here and found a great little Bar called La Plancha. Could have stayed here for hours!! Amazing beach and such great atmosphere.
review: come found great little bar call la plancha stay hour amaze great atmosphere

Content: Dead flat, mid sized waves, super sunsets and a choice of reclining lounges or bean bags. It's difficult for an Australian to review a beach and go wow! Definitely not the reason your would come to Bali.
review: dead flat mid size wave super sunset choice recline lounge bean bag difficult australian review go wow definitely reason come bali

Content: A beautiful beach for a sunset walk before dinner at one of the nearby restaurants, like La Lucciola! Not crowded in the evenings, easy access, easy parking, stunning views.
review: beautiful sunset walk dinner one nearby restaurant la lucciola crowd evening easy access easy park stunning view

Content: Nice beach for learning surving and gòod for take the family walking to the beach..also many good beach reataurant sorrounding
review: nice learn surving gòod take family walk beachalso many good reataurant sorrounding

Content: Such a shame but the increase in rubbish and nearby creeks that are best described as open drains are a blight on what was once a delight
review: shame increase rubbish nearby creek best describe open drain blight delight

Content: The beach is not as nice as I originally thought, though it is clean enough and quiet. Sadly, it covers with lots of volcanic sand which has made it less attractive.
review: nice originally think though clean enough quiet sadly cover lot volcanic sand make less attractive

Content: We walked along the beach after breakfast there were other couples happily walking along which was lovely to see. I loved the sea mist but the sand was so hot with no shoes eek! Awesome waves go check it out.
review: walk along breakfast couple happily walk along lovely see loved sea mist sand hot shoe eek awesome wave go check

Content: The people are welcoming and wonderful and the beaches are absolutely gorgeous.. I rented a private villa within walking distance and was nice taking in the sites on our walk to the beach..
review: people welcome wonderful beach absolutely gorgeous rented private villa within walk distance nice take site walk

Content: The beach was fantastic and watching the sunrise along the beach was beatutiful. Many people fly kites on the beach to and there is easy access through many of the well known restaurants like the potato head restaurant.
review: fantastic watch sunrise along beatutiful many people fly kit easy access many well know restaurant potato head restaurant

Content: if you like the clean and wonderful sunshine you must come to seminyak beach, t's less crowded than kuta beach, there are many restaurants there. and this place has a lot tourists.
review: clean wonderful sunshine must come seminyak t less crowd kuta many restaurant place lot tourist

Content: Such a great place to chill. Nice bars and restaurants around to eat. Plenty of loungers to have a nice beer too. The best sunsets you could possibly see
review: great place chill nice bar restaurant around eat plenty lounger nice beer best sunset possibly see

Content: Beatiful swimming beach fantastic for sunsets. We loved the cheap beach warongs that served basic cheap eats and cheap beer. You can hire a beach chair for $5 all day and they bring out the bean bags after sunset. Much cleaner than Kuta Beach.
review: beatiful swim fantastic sunset love cheap warongs serve basic cheap eats cheap beer hire chair 5 day bring bean bag sunset much clean kuta

Content: We watched the sunset from the beach and it was beautiful. The fine soft sand just makes you so wanna play with it.
review: watch sunset beautiful fine soft sand make wanna play

Content: Though low season, it was a large beach, quiet, perfect for just relaxing under the sun! There are a few restaurants nearby and you can rent a beach chair for a pretty good price if needed. The sand here - amazing.
review: though low season large quiet perfect relax sun restaurant nearby rent chair pretty good price need sand amaze

Content: I cruised down here to watch the sunset the last 2 nights. There is plenty of room for everyone. The surfers, the swimmers, the tanners, the drinkers and even the dogs. The beach itself has more of a brown sand, but it is not rocky and very flat. You'll be surprised at how close some of the waves get to you. There are a couple of very trendy bars here as well to sip cocktails in. Definitely worth a visit.
review: cruise watch sunset last 2 night plenty room everyone surfers swimmer tanner drinker even dog brown sand rocky flat youll surprise close wave couple trendy bar well sip cocktails definitely worth visit

Content: Beautiful, white-sand beach, clean, with great atmosphere especially at night with good restaurants and live music. Very romantic especially at night.
review: beautiful whitesand clean great atmosphere especially night good restaurant live music romantic especially night

Content: Thoroughly recommend a lazy afternoon and evening whiling away the time slouched on a beanbag at one of Seminyak beach bars. Any will do, they're all the same pretty much - just choose the one with tunes you can tolerate and plonk yourself down.  The service is efficient and friendly, the food comforting and delicious, and the Bintang washes it down smoothly. What more could you ask? Oh, and then there's those sunsets...magic.
review: thoroughly recommend lazy afternoon even whiling away time slouch beanbag one seminyak bar will theyre pretty much choose one tune tolerate plonk service efficient friendly food comfort delicious bintang wash smoothly ask oh there sunsetsmagic

Content: We went to Seminyak beach a few times during our stay in Seminyak. It is a nice beach for sunsets. When it gets dark the atmosphere on the beach is great. Only downside is the waves are extremely strong.
review: go seminyak time stay seminyak nice sunset get dark atmosphere great downside wave extremely strong

Content: Walking distance frm Seminyak Square. But we unsure of the exact shortcuts to the beach. So we had our long way walk till we found Ku De Ta restaurant, But we didnt enter from here as there is security check to enter the restaurant. So we just walk ahead and found ourself nearly at the end before reaching to 'Legian Bali' . So we guessed that we have made the wrong moves by not always asking for direction. Choices of turn right or left facing beach . We decided to turn left and walk few miles before reaching seminyak beach (this time round, we made e right choice.) Seminyak beach , full of tourist and lots of restaurant, noisy but really njoyed, surfers, eyecathing on horse riding pass u and there will be people approaching to u that can make hair braiding. Nicely doNe!! We end our day there by ordering cocktail and walk back to Ku De Ta restaurant and ask the security if we can exit here. He smile and say yes..

Content: Beach is small, a bit dirty and with super hot sands. Nevertheless, the beach is pretty with great seaview.
review: small bit dirty super hot sand nevertheless pretty great seaview

Content: love this part of the beach in Bali has so much to offer in the way of café/bars music all day and people watching a great place to spend the day swimming, surfing or just hanging out
review: love part bali much offer way cafébars music day people watch great place spend day swim surf hanging

Content: Pretty sad & boring beach. Went for sunrise but looks of the beach was disappointing. Taking a bath is also not allowed.
review: pretty sad boring go sunrise look disappoint take bath allow

Content: Seminyak Beach has it all sun, surf, sand, people, restaurants for every taste, live entertainment and if that has not fulfilled your day sit back at the end of it and enjoy the beautiful sunset.
review: seminyak sun surf sand people restaurant every taste live entertainment fulfil day sit back end enjoy beautiful sunset

Content: Great overnight stay. Very clean rooms, comfy bed. Great variety for breakfast. Pool was very clean as well
review: great overnight stay clean room comfy bed great variety breakfast pool clean well

Content: Beaches are full of people which is good, but people make more and more mess and nobody cleans it. The garbage bin are only anywhere. So instead of  beautiful view you can see just plastic garbage on the beach. What is the worst,  no one can see it.

Content: Beautiful sunset and view. an easy stroll from the Dusun Villa, approx 500m leisurely walk. Then stop at Mexicolla for a quick drink and eat

Content: I back here again and again.  Enjoying the sunburn at 9 am till 5 pm.  Take lunch here, many cafe around.  Then waiting the sunset.  The cafe start preparation, put table and chair for visitors at the beach.  Enjoying long island and beer before dinner, meanwhile the sun start hiding, flashing the tinge blushing the sky

Content: Nice large beach.. it was clean in front of our hotel but not so much further along the beach. Nice spot to go for a run before it gets too hot.
review: nice large clean front hotel much along nice spot go run get hot

Content: Definitely go to the beach for Sunset Drinks. The few 'Bean Bag' Beach clubs are great and the food is surprisingly good (go 'right' along from The Cocoon resort) . The sunset is amazing and the new Railler Bintang will please most people (new Lemon flavoured beer = Shandy in a bottle)
review: definitely go sunset drink bean bag club great food surprisingly good go right along cocoon resort sunset amazing new railler bintang will please people new lemon flavour beer shandy bottle

Content: Loved this beach, lovely sunset and amazing beach bars! Clean beach. Watched one of the most amazing sunsets here!
review: love lovely sunset amazing bar clean watch one amazing sunset

Content: The sunset is very nice, but by Australian standards the beach sucks.Lots of cigarette butts to dodge and human sewage running off the hotels into the ocean.

Content: Loved the beach - rented beach chairs from the locals.  who were very attentive.  Always there to bring you beers or coconut drinks
review: love rented chair local attentive always bring beer coconut drink

Content: There's just no other sunset like it on earth. The huge red perfectly circular orb, slowly descending into the endless horizon is romantic, breathtaking and truly spectacular. The beach offers plenty of beanbag restaurants to kick back, sip a Bintang and take in this truly awe inspiring spectacle with the ones you love. The redness of the dying light is otherworldly, ethereal and awakens light in even the hardest of hearts.
review: there sunset earth huge red perfectly circular orb slowly descend endless horizon romantic breathtaking truly spectacular offer plenty beanbag restaurant kick back sip bintang take truly awe inspire spectacle one love redness die light otherworldly ethereal awakens light even hard heart

Content: Right beside it's sister beach at legain, Seminyak is the less crowded of the two. However, they are both pretty similar in terms of what they have to offer. Surf and drink vendors line the beach offering surf lessons and board rental. Salesmen of sunglasses and henna artists will also offer their wares and services to you. If you love to surf, the place here is pretty great. However, be warned that they can be quite strong for a beginner surfer, so don't go too far out! In fact, if you are a beginner, it might be better to surf at Legain. Also, there are more surfers in Legain so it would be easier for anyone to spot you if you're in trouble. *In fact I had to be saved by a lifeguard after getting swept out by a riptide!
review: right beside sister legain seminyak less crowd two pretty similar term offer surf drink vendor line offer surf lesson board rental salesman sunglasses henna artist will offer ware service love surf place pretty great warn quite strong beginner surfer dont go far fact beginner might better surf legain surfer legain easy anyone spot youre trouble fact save lifeguard get swept riptide

Content: Beautiful place to sit back relax and watch the sun set. Shopping is good and you don't have to indulge if you don't want to. Have a drink and take it all in.
review: beautiful place sit back relax watch sun set shopping good dont indulge dont want drink take

Content: We loved the beach, there are chairs & umbrellas for hire. A few food places locally for all budgets. Lots of locals selling anything from bracelets to watches, sunglasses, painting etc. the waves are amazing, but quite fierce at times so not great for kids, unless they don't go very far in the water. Fair few surfers enjoying the waves when we were there.
review: love chair umbrellas hire food place locally budget lots local sell anything bracelet watch sunglass paint etc wave amaze quite fierce time great kid unless dont go far water fair surfer enjoy wave

Content: Nice clean sand, great waves but not too dangerous. Huge beach with clean waters and good atmosphere.
review: nice clean sand great wave dangerous huge clean water good atmosphere

Content: Amazing beach with good basic facility and nice views. Amazing sun set. A good place for night life and family holidays
review: amaze good basic facility nice view amaze sun set good place night life family holiday

Content: I think Kuta is the best one but for me Seminyak beach is great one for Sunset, the wave not as big as in Kuta but it great for beginner surfing. I did surfing but i can"t do it. I ill come here again!
review: think kuta best one seminyak great one sunset wave big kuta great beginner surf surf cant ill come

Content: We read that beaches in Bali are nothing to rave about so didn't have a high expectation. Actually Seminyak beach as well the adjoining beaches exceeded our expectations. We stayed at the Oberoi, which is located on Seminyak beach. Everyday, we walked either north towards the W hotel or south towards the airport for 2-3 hours. For the most part, the beach has fine white sand and is clean and empty. There are quite a few "natural" waterways draining into the ocean on the beach. Our hotel claims it's from the rice fields, but these waterways smelled awfully like sewer. In between the luxury hotels, there would be the odd house with a garbage dump right on the beach. The southern end of the beach is a bit rowdy and touristy but has better sand. If you go in the morning before the partiers wake up, then it's serene and romantic. Sunsets are gorgeous!
review: read beach bali nothing rave didnt high expectation actually seminyak well adjoin beach exceed expectation stay oberoi locate seminyak everyday walk either north towards w hotel south towards airport 23 hour part fine white sand clean empty quite natural waterway drain ocean hotel claim rice field waterway smell awfully sewer luxury hotel odd house garbage dump right southern end bit rowdy touristy good sand go morning partiers wake serene romantic sunset gorgeous

Content: We visited this beach a number of times during our stay in Bali. During the day the beach is covered with lounge chairs and umbrellas to hire (we were quoted $20 for an hour) as well as people selling just about everything. In the evening, the lounges are mostly away, the bars open up and the people flock to see the sunset. The beach is wide and the water is cool and refreshing. It is relatively clean and there is plenty of space for everyone.
review: visit number time stay bali day cover lounge chair umbrellas hire quote 20 hour well people sell everything evening lounge mostly away bar open people flock see sunset wide water cool refresh relatively clean plenty space everyone

Content: We walked for a very long time but definitely worth it and so many bars along the way to pop into. Unbeatable sunset viewing!
review: walk long time definitely worth many bar along way pop unbeatable sunset viewing

Content: It's the Australians version of the Brits spain. HOWEVER,  the beach is all but spotless. They charge sooo much (for Asia) for beds but they're some of the comfiest beds we've had in a year of beaches in Asia. By the end of the day the sea ia so far out and the waves were so big we gave up but that's because were lazy.Looked great for surfing.
review: australian version brit spain spotless charge sooo much asia bed theyre comfy bed weve year beach asia end day sea ia far wave big give thats lazylooked great surfing

Content: A lovely clean beach to swim, surf, relax on or just look at. Not as protected as Sanur but much cleaner and prettier than Kuta
review: lovely clean swim surf relax look protect sanur much clean pretty kuta

Content: Ok, so you will have to pay somewhere between AUD$15-25 for 2 sun lounges on the beach for 1/2 to a whole day, about AUD$10 for a good sarong, massage, kites, sunglasses etc, and yes you will get hassled by the local entrepreneurs to buy from them.This is their island.  This is how they make money to live, pay the bills and put food on the table.Have fun. Be friendly, and make an attempt to speak at lest 2-3 words in their language.If you are rude and disrespectful, the you deserve the same in response.We had a great 5 days in Seminyak by following a few simple rules.Don't ask the price unless you intend to buy.Don't ask to see unless you intend to buy.Be realistic in your haggling.This is modern day Bali where everyone has a motor scooter and needs to pay high rents to live close enough to the tourist area to work.These humans that work the beach have families to support and are absolutely flabbergasted when rich tourists who spend $000's to come to Bali then get upset at paying $20 for 2 lounges for 4-5 hours on one of the best spots on the planet. So!Be polite and smile.Learn a little Bahasa (That's Indonesian - Language on business in Bali).Selamat - Pagi, Siang, Sore (Morning, Afternoon 11-2, Afternoon 2-5)Tidak Terama Kasih - No thank youTerama Kasih - Thank youSatu/Dua/Tiga Jam - One/two/three hoursMahal - ExpensiveDiskoun - Discount pleaseWe came back after 5 years and Kathy still sells Sarongs and does a great back, neck, foot massage, and of course hair braiding.Billy The Kid and Charlie Brown sell watches and sunglasses.Denny does an amazing Henna Tattoo - Both my girls got them And all of this right in font of Ku De Ta, so you can walk up and use the foot/body showers to rinse off the sand/salt in between swims, and of course to head up and grab a delicious snack/lunch. We had lunch there two days and it was fantastic!Salt and pepper calamaris was great. Great curries and sate. Steak and chips, steak sandwiches etc.And of course a bar.Definitely worth a visit and to come back to.
review: ok will pay somewhere aud1525 2 sun lounge 12 whole day aud10 good sarong massage kit sunglass etc yes will hassle local entrepreneur buy themthis island make money live pay bill put food tablehave fun friendly make attempt speak l 23 word languageif rude disrespectful deserve responsewe great 5 day seminyak follow simple rulesdont ask price unless intend buydont ask see unless intend buybe realistic hagglingthis modern day bali everyone motor scooter need pay high rent live close enough tourist area workthese human work family support absolutely flabbergast rich tourist spend 000s come bali upset pay 20 2 lounge 45 hour one best spot planet sobe polite smilelearn little bahasa thats indonesian language business baliselamat pagi siang sore morning afternoon 112 afternoon 25tidak terama kasih thank youterama kasih thank yousatuduatiga jam onetwothree hoursmahal expensivediskoun discount pleasewe come back 5 year kathy still sell sarong great back neck foot massage course hair braidingbilly kid charlie brown sell watch sunglassesdenny amaze henna tattoo girl get right font ku de ta walk use footbody shower rinse sandsalt swim course head grab delicious snacklunch lunch two day fantasticsalt pepper calamari great great curry sate steak chip steak sandwich etcand course bardefinitely worth visit come back

Content: Personally I thing if you're in the area and not planning to spend the day at one of the oh so trendy beach clubs dotted around you're better off at Double Six.  The beach is often too wavy for swimming and depending on the time of day it can be quite dirty.  If you're nearby it's not a bad way to spend the day, but I certainly wouldn't make an effort.

Content: Not my favourite beach. As it's a public beach, I felt that it was not well maintained. Obviously there's trash everywhere, and because they allow dogs to loiter, watch where you step! You may end up stepping on dog poo - which would be unpleasant. Also there are warungs set up near the entrance to the beach, but no proper trash disposal, so quite smelly unfortunately. Unsightly.

Content: Best beach to have in the morning and evening. You can go around 5.30pm and wait the sunset. Sunset is amazing.Many good cafe.

Content: Lovely clean beaches with a great selection of food choices and bars along the beach strip. Our favourite restaurant for lunch was Champlung for nice relaxing lunch with great variety of food and very cold bintangs. Staff friendly and provide quick service

Content: The Seminyak beach is long and wide, you can walk, walk and walk or stay wherever you want and watch people. Sunsets are so beautiful! Sea is not too quiet but you can still enjoy it. Beach is clean (city workers continuously clean it).

Content: Like others beach in Bali.. Like Kuta, and Legian.. this beach one of best beach to enjoy Sunset in Bali. Worth to Go.. You can walk from Kuta Beach, Legian Beach, Double Six, then Seminyak Beach
review: others bali kuta legian one best enjoy sunset bali worth go walk kuta legian double six seminyak

Content: Spent many days and nights on Sminyak beach. The beach is huge and when we went in August it was busy enough but not packed. Plenty of bars/restuarants and many sun loungers to lie on, laid on the sand one day but even a light breeze will cover you and you stuff in sand. We generally paid 200K rupiah for two beds, sometimes more, sometimes less. The waves can get quite big so I think it's best to excercise caution, the pull of the sea is incredibly strong and if you're not a strong swimmer (or drunk) you could get into trouble quite quickly. The water was pretty clear.. It's one of the cleaner beaches we visited on the island. Quite a lot of people trying to sell you bracelets, paintings or massages but a smile and a no thank you and they'll leave you alone. Don't let that put you off coming here. At susnset you can sit on beanbags at the numerous restaurants and watch the sun go down while acoustic musicians play/sing. Too many playing Hotel California though! But very chilled way to spend an evening.

Content: Massive tidal movement here so a very very wide beach. The beach itself is OK but wouldn't rush there for a swim. Legian itself is a crazy place after 3pm when the traffic hits town and the Muslims that live here are all trying to get to prayer time.Other than that go a bit further south for a swim at Tuban. It's on the other sie of Kuta. Quieter, don't need to pay for a sun lounge, just drop your towel and in you go. The water is deeper and so cooler as well. Good friendly people down her.

Content: My wife & I spent many hours on this beach drinking and relaxing on the sun beds at Willys Bar. Willy is a great guy, very friendly and accomodating, my wife does'nt like the taste of Bintang so we asked Willy if he would get us some Heiniken in for the following days, we paid him up front for what we thought we would drink and for the next few days we had ice cold Heinikens on call. The boys will also deliver your lunch! Nasi Goreng or Mi  Goreng for about $2.50 Au. Great beach good bunch of locals. We visited Oct 2014 and again this year Sept 2015.

If you want a chair and some shade you have to pay around $10-20 per couple. I would recommend heading there in the evening to watch the sunset, have a cocktail and listen to some live acoustic music at one of the many restaurants which supply bean bags and cute colourful shades.

Content: It is a beautiful white sand beach in Seminyak.  It was fantastic to run on the beach, and you could enjoy a lovely view to sunset on the beach.  My boyfriend and I were staying at the Seminyak Beach Resort and we loved this beach.

Content: The color of the sea water and the sand is not as what I imagined. The water is not blue, the sand is dark, rough and not white. But I do appreciate the beauty of the Mother Nature there. Strong waves are perfect for surfing. The beach is clean, food is great, though a little expensive - but still worth it! (I stayed there 3 nights and all restaurants in the area turned out amazing). I just wish they have more seafood restaurants that would sell more of lobsters, mantis, crabs... I couldnt find one though, most of the restaurants serve little prawns, sea bass, scallop, some other kinds of fish only. Maybe I would search for more next time.

Lots of people playing on the beach, lounge chairs for hire. At night warungs with cheap food and drink, bean bags and entertainment. Everything a beach should be.

Content: Seminyak Beach is perfect for couples or any solo traveler who desire to experience the beauty of nature. This particular beach in Bali offers tourists with perfect ambiance which enables you to appreciate Balinese beaches. Many resorts and villas are built along the beach, so accessibility is great!Don't forget to catch the Sunset moments when you are in Semminyak Beach..

Content: My 3rd visit to Seminyak. Going to the beach is always on the itinerary.  The sand is fine and clean and it a joy to walk, jog or just stroll especially in the early morning or evening to enjoy the cool breeze. On this 3rd visit, we decided to walk the entire stretch of the beach from Kuta back to Petitengit. It was a most enjoyable hour and a half walk with sandals in our hands, stopping now and then to take photos of the scenery and the people around us building sand castles, flying kites and playing beach volley ball and soccer.  We also get the know some of the beautiful hotels, pubs and restaurants along the beach.  It was also a good workout before we wash up and head to La Lucciola for our gourmet dinner!

Content: It's definitely more laid back than Kuta's. Some say its also more sophisticated. Wet part is dominated mostly by surfers, while sandy and dry one, by lazy vacationers under umbrellas. Food and drinks are available too. Decent restaurants and bars are just across the road behind. Some experts would say that fresh young Indonesian meat is for sale here too (mostly in the afternoon though). It has what it takes to have enjoyable few hours.
review: definitely lay back kutas say sophisticated wet part dominate mostly surfers sandy dry one lazy vacationer umbrellas food drink available decent restaurant bar across road behind expert say fresh young indonesian meat sale mostly afternoon though take enjoyable hour

Content: A beach, smelly and the water was not really good to swim in. There are sections which are pristine (outside hotels) but some of it includes a sewerage run-off so be careful.

Content: A beach full of  beautiful and colourful cafes/bars. A sunset walk followed by some drinks and dinner under those colourful umbrellas is a good option for chillaxed evenings. But if you want clean sparkling water and silence then this in not the beach. Its got its own charm with a touristy touch.

Content: As we were staying nearby we spent four hours at this beach from 10am-2pm.The sands are a mixture of the usual colour and light grey, restaurants and hotel  pools line the small beach.There is a lot less people here than at Kuta and Legian beaches so it's ideal if you want a more chilled out beach experience in Bali.If swimming make sure you take extra care, swimming within the designated areas (flags) and not venturing out too far as the currents are strong. Would definitely not recommended any kids going into the sea.Overall, a nice beach for a break from the crowds.

Content: The beach all along that coast is lovely and wide. The sand is nice and fine and you can rent loungers and parasols from the various beach bars. Its the perfect place to watch the sun set while sipping on a cold Bintang. The water is warm but there is generally some surf. I ticked off learning to surf on Seminyak Beach from my bucket list.
review: along coast lovely wide sand nice fine rent lounger parasols various bar perfect place watch sun set sip cold bintang water warm generally surf tick learning surf seminyak bucket list

Content: I went here for new years night and it was one of the best nights of my life - music, dancing, drinks, fun, amazing fireworks, brilliant people just perfect night!

Content: I visited the place with our little one.Big beach with lots of good surf. Days of wave did alternate so easy wave days were good for the little ones to paddle and stay safe.Disappointed though with the cleanness of the beach. Rubbish floating around the waters edge.Also  certain parts smelt so a sewage outlet may have been near by.The beaches volcanic residue means bathing suits get ruined so only wear dark coloured ones if you plan to do beach sand castle building. It would have been nice to have more beach restaurants as there were only big ones attached to hotels. The ones that were there had a high security manned setup, so not sure if the Bali bombing in Dec 2004 (?) stopped all all the smaller restaurants doing business. Would still visit the beach but keep it cleaner please.

Content: Nice long stretch of beach. Good for walks. Seems popular for surfing. The bars and music along the beach set the holiday scene.Occasionally there are sewerage run offs which smell pretty unpleasant. Didn't entice me to swim.I hear the sunsets are spectacular but unfortunately the volcanic ash created such a haze, that the sun was swallowed by thick cloud and no sunsets were to be enjoyed.

Content: I guess a surfer who grew up riding the beautiful spots on Sydney's Northern Beaches is going to have a tough measuring stick!  Not a great beach break, however I did get one memorable 177m / 28.7km ride.  No headlands or reefs of interest.  The trade-winds blow cross-shore fairly early in the day.  You can rent deck chairs.  Shopping and bar in the area are good.  Potatohead and Ku De Ta are great - Check em out.  Better of surf the Bukit Peninsula!

Content: Love the soft sands and calming sea! We went to the beach around the evening so it is great to look at. At night, there are a lot of restaurants that will set up chairs and table at the beach. You get to listen to the sound of the waves as you dine. A great experience indeed! however, you have to plan your route around tot he beach. The first time when we arrived, we were not clear of how to go and ended up arriving after the sun sets. We went there for a second time to catch the sunset. A tip, plan and ask clearly on how to go!

Content: Lovely beach, interesting waves, loads of food, it's like the perfect set up, but the open sewers running onto and across the beach, which people ignore and simply walk through, kind of grosses me out. It's like this on other beaches along this southern stretch of coast too so it's just one of those things. Unless you want to walk for miles along the beach you may not even notice it. I noticed it a lot! The touts are there but they are not aggressive or persistent. Mainly just selling sarongs and paintings and sometimes quite odd things. But they don't pressure or annoy, they are just there.  Unlike the JetSki and paragliding touts in Patong who block your path and follow you and won't leave you alone!

Content: Horse back riding.Back massage.ManicurePedicureFoot scrubTemporary tattooHair braidesLearn to wake board / surfJust soak up the sun and zzzzzz under the umbrella as you lay on the beach chair. Charges for 3 hours is 100,000 Rupiah. Full day - walk around and ask best price - haggle like crazy. Then pick a good spot to unwind.While peddlars are lesser than say Kuta and Denpasar beach, be firm when they start peddling you trinklets and unwanted services. Eye contact with them - Dont. They come and surround you like bees to a flower.Take a stroll along the coastline. I couldnt as I sprain my foot. Yet the peddlars were most understanding and made me more comfortable. Pedicure, foot scrub, nail varnish and back massage by three ladies. And free trinklets - wrist bands 😍😍 Bring a beach towel should you find the chairs rental steep. Bottled water, sun screen / block, hat, sunglasses and a good book.What I was looking for - a hammock under coconut trees to lay down with coconut juice / water. Alas.... bean bags and beach chairs aplenty.

Nothing to make it a must visit beach over other Bali beaches.

Content: Having spent a week on the east coast at Sanur, I can safely say Seminyak's beach is far better, hands down. It's sandier, lighter and cleaner, plus it has much bigger and more impressive waves and fabulous sunsets. My family happily spent all day on the beach watching the surfers at play. The only negative is the hawkers trying to flog you their kites, hats, sarongs and watches. That said compared to other tourist hotspots they were not at all aggressive and quickly moved on after a quick no.We were staying at the Seminyak Beach Resort & Spa with attractive infinity pool overlooking the beach. I did spot two cheeky families rock up to the beach in front and then let their children enter the hotel pool. The hotel security didn't bat an eyelid, which was disappointing. Anyway it's a great beach, not at all crowded and the sunset views are pretty special. No need to traipse all the way over to join the crowds at Tanah Lot.

Content: I consider myself a bit of an expert on nice beaches.  Seminyak is a great beach with nice sand.  It's a very wide beach, and when the tide is out it can be 200 meters or more wide.  There is no drop off, and the bottom is sandy.  Great for surfing, body surfing and swimming.  There are some rip currents when the surf is big, so pay attention to the flags.  You can also rent chairs with umbrellas if you don't want to lay in the sand.  Plenty of restaurants on the beach, and great for sunsets.  I'd give it 5 stars,but…  there is a definite problem with the amount of plastic garbage that washes up on the beach.  And here's my suggestion - the government should take a portion of the entry tax they collect and hire people to pick up the beach.  People work for very little in Bali.  Start on one end and just pick it up.  With tourism seemingly the main industry in Bali, I'm surprised they don't do a better job.  And the hawkers can become a bit much as well.  I mean, I don't really need a painting of an elephant or buddah.
review: consider bit expert nice beach seminyak great nice sand wide tide 200 meter wide drop bottom sandy great surf body surf swim rip current surf big pay attention flag rent chair umbrellas dont want lay sand plenty restaurant great sunset id give 5 starsbut definite problem amount plastic garbage wash heres suggestion government take portion entry tax collect hire people pick people work little bali start one end pick tourism seemingly main industry bali im surprise dont good job hawker become bit much well mean dont really need paint elephant buddah

Content: Seminyak beach is a great place to go for so many possibilities. Deserted or almost so in early morning for a great run on the beach (half marathon distance possible !), crowded in the evening with seaside bars pumping their music, great waves to enjoy, many fantastic restaurants to eat in if you venture a bit into the streets, great shopping within walking distance, the occasional ceremony with Balinese people gathering to let their offerings go into the sea, an evening drink at La Luciola. Yes, Seminyak is polluted, too crowded and not as authentic as it used to be 15 years back but it's still one of the best place to visit in the area !

Content: the boys say that the hamburgers in the black bread rolls are the best. They had burger meals with chips and lemonade.

Content: We heard so much about Seminyak Beach therefore we decided to visit this popular place on a weekday.  We walked for about 15 minutes from Seminyak Square and reached the beach through KudeTa at about 5.00pm.   The beach was quite crowded with both locals and foreigners, and there were a lot of sellers who approaches you all the time with their junks.  The beach is not that clean compared to those on the eastern side of the island.
review: heard much seminyak decide visit popular place weekday walk 15 minute seminyak square reach kudeta 500pm quite crowd local foreigner lot seller approach time junk clean compare eastern side island

Content: nice beach for see sun set, walk a long the beach to see a lot of nice restaurant such as kudeta, lauciola, potato head beach club and many others. use your sun screen for protection. don forget bring a sarong if you want to visit petitenget temple.
review: nice see sun set walk long see lot nice restaurant kudeta lauciola potato head club many others use sun screen protection don forget bring sarong want visit petitenget temple

Content: Loved the fact that it was not as crowded with beach visitors, benches etc and that it was still enough people around that you could enjoy the buzz of the beach. Watching surfers, having the kids play in the waves and sand and going for runs made it our favourite beach in Seminyak.
review: love fact crowd visitor bench etc still enough people around enjoy buzz watch surfer kid play wave sand go run make favourite seminyak

Content: A long shallow beach which felt safe, and provided just enough swell to allow some fun on the boogie boards. It was quite clean (though it looks much nicer at high tide than low), and economical sun beds and umbrellas for hire, along with surf & boogie boards.
review: long shallow felt safe provide enough swell allow fun boogie board quite clean though looks much nicer high tide low economical sun bed umbrellas hire along surf boogie board

Content: I like the beach and it's a great place to eat and drink, be mindful of the many junk sellers who may harass you at times. Also remember a beach chair should cost no more than $5AUD a day. I'd advise going to outer beaches if you are looking to surf.
review: great place eat drink mindful many junk seller may harass time remember chair cost 5aud day id advise go out beach look surf

Content: Nice beach away from the crowded area kuta, with vibrant store and villa, the waves is good. Waiting for sunset here is a must.
review: nice away crowded area kuta vibrant store villa wave good wait sunset must

Content: Hit the beach early with the locals as it's the best part of the day to get some exercise done before hitting the pool or what evere else you have planned!
review: hit early local best part day exercise do hit pool evere plan

Content: The beach was alright and a nice place to chill and relax, but there's a lot nicer beach around Bali - I really recommend Uluwatu!!
review: alright nice place chill relax there lot nicer around bali really recommend uluwatu

Content: The beach itself is pretty dirty and not as idyllic as I thought it would be however that's why the hotels have pools. Still a great place to visit and see a sunset
review: pretty dirty idyllic think thats hotel pool still great place visit see sunset

Content: Atmosphere and views was great. We relaxed on the beach while the children played in the sand and we had a beer
review: atmosphere view great relaxed child play sand beer

Content: It's really a beautiful beach and it's good for sunset. Many cafes and rstaurant around there so that we can eat dinner while waiting for sunset. It's romantic and beautiful^^
review: really beautiful good sunset many cafe rstaurant around eat dinner wait sunset romantic beautiful

Content: Great to wander down to the beach just before sunset and lob in a bean bag, order a drink, maybe a meal listen to the music and watch the sun set over the ocean - Perfect!
review: great wander sunset lob bean bag order drink maybe meal listen music watch sun set ocean perfect

Content: Great place to chill out and have a beer on the beach, Seminyak is renowned for the finer things in Bali, though people say it's expensive that's only by Bali standards, you can expect to pay Australian prices at the restaurants.
review: great place chill beer seminyak renowned fine thing bali though people say expensive thats bali standard expect pay australian price restaurant

Content: The beach was not pleasant at all. The sand was streaked with black, obviously from oil, which meant there weren't very many people on the beach either. I suspect that it's visited mainly in the late afternoon evening due to all the bars/restaurants on the beach, but in the morning it's just gross.
review: pleasant sand streak black obviously oil mean werent many people either suspect visit mainly late afternoon even due barsrestaurants morning gross

Content: Its the beach side of Kuta without the mess of it. Its a little more expensive for everything i.e. surfboards and beach chairs but its worth the additional expense as its far more quaint, especially with KudeTa playing nice lounge music in the background
review: side kuta without mess little expensive everything ie surfboard chair worth additional expense far quaint especially kudeta play nice lounge music background

Content: Bali has changed so much over the past 10 years but one thing that has remained the same is the amazing sun set views that you get to experience from the beach.
review: bali change much past 10 year one thing remain amazing sun set view experience

Content: The beaches in the built up areas of Bali are a bit hit and miss. Unfortunately the practice of making offerings the the Gods on the beach, Many of which containing, plastic wrapped lollies and cigarettes, leads to a beaches strewn with debris. It is such a shame. The Seminyak beach had rubbish floating in it which is a bit disconcerting for an Australian but the warm water and beautiful blue skies are bound to draw you in and out past the shoreline mess.
review: beach build area bali bit hit miss unfortunately practice make offering god many contain plastic wrap lolly cigarettes lead beach strew debris shame seminyak rubbish float bit disconcert australian warm water beautiful blue sky bound draw past shoreline mess

Content: It has an amazing Sunset and the beach is really clean and you can just sit on the many shacks on the beach and enjoy the sunset alongwith a drink
review: amazing sunset really clean sit many shack enjoy sunset alongwith drink

Content: Went there for the sunset. The beach is really pretty and crowded. Good mix of locals and foreigners. However the toilets are very rundown and doesn't offer much privacy, so you should wear your swimwear there, otherwise it is hard to change. Many restaurants and bars lining the beach to choose from, but most of them are pricey. Beware of local men secretly taking photos of girls in swimwear.
review: go sunset really pretty crowd good mix local foreigner toilet rundown doesnt offer much privacy wear swimwear hard change many restaurant bar line choose pricey beware local men secretly take photos girl swimwear

Content: Visiting Bali for the first time was so exciting and Seminyak Beach was one of the great spots that we really enjoyed. We will came back again soon.
review: visit bali first time excite seminyak one great spot really enjoy will come back soon

Content: Ummmm.... it's a beach. What can I say. When we were there, there we night markets, shows and so on but we just got scammed that day so in a less then happy mood. Still, having said that, the wife did like the night life and it made her smile so you take what you want out of that
review: ummmm say night market show get scammed day less happy mood still say wife night life make smile take want

Content: Lovely beach where you can relax,swim and unwindThere are bars on the beach with music and diningThere's also a bean bag bar which is so bohoThere are tables with lamps and beanbags-finished off nicely with a Bintang !:)
review: lovely relaxswim unwindthere bar music diningtheres bean bag bar bohothere table lamp beanbagsfinished nicely bintang

Content: The sea was too choppy to go in, and there were pesky peddlers bugging you to buy something. Most people were in the pool in nearby resorts.
review: sea choppy go pesky peddler bug buy something people pool nearby resort

Content: We stayed at the Oberoi (see my review) and visited the beach several times to see the amazing sunset. I've got an old iphone4 and people thought my pics were photo shopped....they were not. The sea, sand and sky did all the talking.....and it was all talking to the sun as it said selemat malam for the night. WOW AMAZING!
review: stayed oberoi see review visit several time see amazing sunset ive get old iphone4 people think pic photo shoppedthey sea sand sky talkingand talk sun say selemat malam night wow amazing

Content: I love Seminyak Beach with its long stretches of sand and surf! It is a great place to take a long walk or run before the sun gets too hot, and then a swim afterwards. I enjoyed a lounger and drink on the beach, but made a mistake when making a purchase with a hawker of goods. One buy and I was inundated with people trying to sell me overpriced goods. I found that my no must have sounded more like a yes to them, because I ended up with foot and hand massages, plucked eyebrows, jewellery and other goods, most of which I paid too much for. But for all that, I did enjoy myself! I learnt a huge lesson on not being a sucker for a friendly lady who had supposedly not made any sales that day as she had just come a funeral! I had a good laugh that day and did come away with a sense of fun and joy even though I had been shamelessly been taken advantage of. You just need to be stronger than me! It is a glorious beach though!
review: love seminyak long stretch sand surf great place take long walk run sun get hot swim afterwards enjoy lounger drink make mistake making purchase hawker good one buy inundated people try sell overprice good find must sound yes end foot hand massage pluck eyebrows jewellery good pay much enjoy learnt huge lesson sucker friendly lady supposedly make sale day come funeral good laugh day come away sense fun joy even though shamelessly take advantage need strong glorious though

Content: This beach has a beautiful sunset advantage point, the colours of the sky is amazing that I couldn't stop taking pictures of it. It's very touristy and so many people on it, so if you're wanting a quiet beach go elsewhere.
review: beautiful sunset advantage point colour sky amaze couldnt stop taking picture touristy many people youre want quiet go elsewhere

Content: Some nice beach bars with not bad music ,we didn't do any sunbathing on the beach so I can't give an accurate review on that but I was informed that the sea was not too clean
review: nice bar bad music didnt sunbathe cant give accurate review inform sea clean

Content: the most popular spot to have a sunset, most people flock to this area however some people just simply hang around at the public area of the beach and others just spread out to the nicest restaurant or bar around the beach. It is the trendy beach in the island
review: popular spot sunset people flock area people simply hang around public area others spread nice restaurant bar around trendy island

Content: The beach was really rough, the current dragged our 9 year old out a couple of times so we couldn't really relax and enjoy the swim.  Great for surfers though!  The sand was that yucky black kind that sticks to everything, you need a chair to sunbake.
review: really rough current drag 9 year old couple time couldnt really relax enjoy swim great surfer though sand yucky black kind stick everything need chair sunbake

Content: Average beach, good crowd...Good place to watch the sunset! We tried many restaurants along this beach..Overall good experience..
review: average good crowdgood place watch sunset try many restaurant along beachoverall good experience

Content: Great views but pit about the volcanic soil making the beach black and the pollution. I will not swim in the water.
review: great view pit volcanic soil make black pollution will swim water

Content: Just sit on the beach and watch the sunset. It's probably one of the most relaxing thing to do in Bali.
review: sit watch sunset probably one relax thing bali

Content: This can be totally skipped. Private beaches at many hotels are much better maintained than the public beach.
review: totally skipped private beach many hotel much well maintain public

Content: I visited in 2010 for the first time and was taken aback by the stunning sunset, however even then the beach itself wasn't great, and it grossly deteriorated ever since. Dirty, grey-ish sand, lots of rubbish, which is not cleaned. The water was murky and muddy, and wasn't inviting at all. One of the locals on a later visit also advised me that it wasn't 'good' to swim, especially after the rain, when all the inland rubbish gets washed via the streams into the bay. I saw lots of nasties floating in those streams, so would agree with that advice. It's such a shame that no one takes responsibility for keeping it clean, as it would have attracted many more tourists if it was maintained. The sunsets are beautiful and many people come to the beach-side bars just for it. Any beach-going experience will most certainly be interrupted by the local hawkers trying to sell you something.
review: visited 2010 first time take aback stunning sunset even wasnt great grossly deteriorate dirty greyish sand lot rubbish cleaned water murky muddy wasnt invite one local later visit advise wasnt good swim especially rain inland rubbish get washed via stream bay saw lot nasties float stream agree advice shame one take responsibility keep clean attract many tourist maintain sunset beautiful many people come beachside bar beachgoing experience will certainly interrupt local hawker try sell something

Content: the beach if further away from city center or kuta/legian area and seminyak is considered as expensive area now.not much to say about the beach frankly; it's the same as other beaches in bali imo.
review: away city center kutalegian area seminyak consider expensive area nownot much say frankly beach bali imo

Content: Relaxing. A real holiday feel, especially at sunset when you are able to choose amongst the many restaurants along the beach, find a bean bag to relax on, eat drink and listen to live music. I prefer swimming in the beaches not so populated, which there are plenty of. Seminyak is great for good food and shopping also. It does need to be careful not to become to pricey as this may deter a lot of travellers. Ubud for day spas is an absolute must!
review: relax real holiday feel especially sunset able choose amongst many restaurant along find bean bag relax eat drink listen live music prefer swim beach populate plenty seminyak great good food shop need careful become pricey may deter lot traveller ubud day spas absolute must

Content: I like the beach, coffee plantation and rice plantation.  The food in Bali is very good. One of the Indonesia restaurant known as Warung Mina located at Jln Kayu Putih No. 19, the food is excellent and value for money.
review: coffee plantation rice plantation food bali good one indonesia restaurant know warung mina locate jln kayu putih 19 food excellent value money

Content: Nice views, but dirty beach. The local authority needs to do more to tidy up after all the bogans! Other than that very nice, with friendly beach bars. For the gay traveller seek out Bali Joes, who will give you an amazing welcome. And COOOOOOLD beers!
review: nice view dirty local authority need tidy bogans nice friendly bar gay traveller seek bali joes will give amazing welcome coooooold beer

Content: Aaah... this is hard to write. I love being by the ocean and on a beach, and this beach has pros and cons.The views of the sunset are outstanding at this beach. There are many eating and drinking possibilites everywhere, and the ocean is clean if a little rough - hence the amount of surfers that congregate here to do their thing.The road leading to the beach is constantly busy with mopeds and Vespa-like vehicles. It is something to watch the weaving in and out fo these riders, and it's a wonder how they do not fall off their vehicles, or hit people or things as they go... but they don't! What I didn't care for was the constant being asked to buy things from the local sellers on the beach. In truth I felt sorry for them. They were only trying to make a living by selling local stuff to tourists. But mostly, the tourists just want a beach holiday without the albeit friendly (but intrusive and cnstant all the same) harassment to buy all kinds of stuff. I was only here four days, but it really began to get on my nerves by the end of the second day.The beach itself might disappoint someone if they were epecting tropical white sandy beaches... the sand is a dark brown/grey due to its volcanic origin.All in all, not my favourite beach in the world, but I can see me being on it again, once I have forgotten how annoying the sellers can be.
review: aaah hard write love ocean pros consthe view sunset outstanding many eat drink possibilites everywhere ocean clean little rough amount surfer congregate thingthe road lead constantly busy moped vespalike vehicle something watch weave fo rider wonder fall vehicle hit people thing go dont didnt care constant ask buy thing local seller truth felt sorry try make live sell local stuff tourist mostly tourists want holiday without albeit friendly intrusive cnstant harassment buy kind stuff four day really begin nerve end second daythe might disappoint someone epecting tropical white sandy beach sand dark browngrey due volcanic originall favourite world see forgotten annoy seller

Content: There's no better way to unwind after a hot day walking the Seminyak streets for a bargain or visiting the local attractions than to sit on Seminyak beach. Take in the sunset while sitting in the Seminyak sand drinking a beer or cocktail. The many local establishments serve light meals and drinks amongst beanbags and dim lights.
review: there well way unwind hot day walk seminyak street bargain visit local attraction sit seminyak take sunset sit seminyak sand drink beer cocktail many local establishment serve light meal drink amongst beanbag dim light

Content: Great beach, not white sand but full of atmosphere. At night the beach bars extend out onto the beach, great music, beautiful sunsets. Lots of safe swimming
review: great white sand full atmosphere night bar extend onto great music beautiful sunset lot safe swimming

Content: We like to meet up with friends along this section of the beach, rent 2 long chairs and umbrella for 50,000rp for the day and then make sure to swim between the flags as there are strong rips along the beach.
review: meet friend along section rent 2 long chair umbrella 50000rp day make sure swim flag strong rip along

Content: Crazy, never seen a beach commercialized like this.  Now view as all the umbrellas and beach chairs take up all the natural space.  Sad.  Rainy season its full of trash due to the winds & currents as rains wash rubbish into the seas. Island of the Gods must be pissed.  Bukit beaches or outside the commercial zones are more pleasant.  However there can be nice sunsets from that side.

Content: Seminyak beach in June was pretty clean and rubbush free (for a Bali beach). It was great to people watch with Ex-Pats walking their 'horse-like' dogs and locals participating in ceremonies as the sun rises. The sand is still pretty grey but the setting is lovely worth the effort of a walk in the steamy air.

Content: You should be there in the morning and sunset! The endless Indian Ocean makes you WOW! Some people jog on the beach in the morning and some people walk their dogs in the noon time. I love it day and night!
review: morning sunset endless indian ocean make wow people jog morning people walk dog noon time love day night

Content: Well we found it to be very dirty  the sand after walking a short distance leaves a blackish residue on your feet, so for us walking along the pathways beside the beach was fine. We found much the same conditions at other beaches, however one very positive note, the sunsets are spectacular.  For the rest of our flexible holiday we headed inland, maybe no ocean but jungle is something else. Additionally where we live in Australia we are right on the beach so perhaps a little spoilt!
review: well find dirty sand walk short distance leave blackish residue foot u walk along pathway beside fine find much condition beach one positive note sunset spectacular rest flexible holiday head inland maybe ocean jungle something additionally live australia right perhaps little spoilt

Content: We had a swim around nine in the morning. Tthe beach was clean and the water warm and lovely. Our hotel Sarinande was just a short walk back.
review: swim around nine morning tthe clean water warm lovely hotel sarinande short walk back

Content: Plenty of beachfront restaurants to watch sunset from along Seminyak Beach. Book a restaurant and arrive early enough for sunset, one with happy hour even better
review: plenty beachfront restaurant watch sunset along seminyak book restaurant arrive early enough sunset one happy hour even well

Content: We walked from our resort in Seminyak down the beach to Legian.  Took about an huor and was enjoyed by mum, dad and 4 kids.  Lots of beach bars/resorts along the way to buy drinks.  Also a few hagglers selling sunglasses which was funny for the kids to deal with
review: walk resort seminyak legian take huor enjoy mum dad 4 kid lot barsresorts along way buy drink haggler sell sunglass funny kid deal

Content: We stayed at the beach and walked in the surf every morning. The food is so good with a view of the sunset. We enjoyed the fitness room, too!Since it was an anniversary trip, the hotel upgraded us to a beautiful suite with a private pool at the Garden. This morning, I saw huge lizard about 2 feet long. He was afraid of me and hurriedly dove into the pond and swam away.  There are beautiful grounds, flowers, and solicitous staff. It is truly a paradise. Tonight, we are going on an elephant ride in the sunset.
